src: 1939 m. rugsėjo 17 d. Lenkijos gynyba jau buvo įveikta, o vienintelė viltis buvo atsitraukti bei persitvarkyti palei Rumunijos prietiltį. Tačiau šie planai paseno beveik per naktį, kai daugiau nei 800 000 Sovietų Sąjungos Raudonosios armijos kareivių, įsiveržę į rytinius Lenkijos regionus, pažeisdami Rygos taikos sutartį, Sovietų ir lenkų nepuolimo sutartį ir kitas dvišales bei daugiašales tarptautines sutartis, sukūrė Baltarusijos ir Ukrainos frontus.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish defenses were already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganize along the Romanian border. However, these plans were outdated almost overnight, when more than 800,000 Soviet Red Army soldiers, invading eastern Polish regions, violating the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish non-aggression treaty and other bilateral and multilateral international treaties, created the Byelorussian and Ukrainian fronts.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Italams Šiaurės Afrikoje nesisekė beveik nuo pat pradžių. Per savaitę nuo 1940 m. birželio 10 d., kai Italija paskelbė karą, britų vienuoliktasis husarų būrys užėmė fortą „Capuzzo“ Libijoje. Į rytus nuo Bardijos surengtoje pasaloje britai paėmė į nelaisvę Italijos 10-osios armijos vyriausiąjį inžinierių generolą Lastuccį. Birželio 28 d. maršalas Italo Balbo, Libijos gubernatorius ir akivaizdus Musolinio įpėdinis, žuvo apšaudytas savų, kai leidosi Tobruke.
mt: It was not easy for the Italians in North Africa from the very beginning. In the first week of June 1940, when Italy declared war, the British 11th Hussars took the fort "Capuzzo" in Libya. In a battle east of Bardia, the British captured the chief engineer of the 10th Army, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, Governor of Libya and an obvious heir to Mussolini, was killed by his own men when he was leaving Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Italams Šiaurės Afrikoje nesisekė beveik nuo pat pradžių. Per savaitę nuo 1940 m. birželio 10 d., kai Italija paskelbė karą, britų vienuoliktasis husarų būrys užėmė fortą „Capuzzo“ Libijoje. Į rytus nuo Bardijos surengtoje pasaloje britai paėmė į nelaisvę Italijos 10-osios armijos vyriausiąjį inžinierių generolą Lastuccį. Birželio 28 d. maršalas Italo Balbo, Libijos gubernatorius ir akivaizdus Musolinio įpėdinis, žuvo apšaudytas savų, kai leidosi Tobruke.
mt: It was not easy for the Italians in North Africa from the very beginning. In the first week of June 1940, when Italy declared war, the British 11th Hussars took the fort "Capuzzo" in Libya. In a battle east of Bardia, the British captured the chief engineer of the 10th Army, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, Governor of Libya and an obvious heir to Mussolini, was killed by his own men when he was leaving Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Tibeto budizmas pagrįstas Budos mokymu, tačiau buvo išplėstas mahajanos meilės keliu ir daugybe Indijos jogos metodų. Iš esmės Tibeto budizmas yra labai paprastas. Jį sudaro Kundalini joga, meditacija ir visa apimančios meilės kelias. Kundalini jogoje kundalini energija (nušvitimo energija) sužadinama įvairiomis jogos pozomis, kvėpavimo pratimais, mantromis ir vizualizacijomis. Tibeto meditacijos centras yra „Deity Yoga“ („Dieviškoji joga“). Vizualizuojant įvairias dievybes, išvalomi energetiniai kanalai, suaktyvinamos čakros ir pasiekiamas nušvitimas.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but was expanded through the Mahayana path of love and a variety of Indian yoga methods. Essentially, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini yoga, meditation, and the all-encompassing path of love. Kundalini yoga awakens the Kundalini energy (energy of enlightenment) through various yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras, and visualizations. The meditation center of Tibet is "Deity Yoga" (Divine Yoga). By visualizing various deities, energetic channels are cleansed, chakras are activated, and enlightenment is achieved.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Programa prasidėjo 8:30 val. vietos laiku (15:00 UTC). Visoje šalyje garsūs dainininkai prie Šri Šijamos kojų giedojo bhadžanus, t. y. religines giesmes. Vakarą pradėjo dainininkas Sanju Sharma, po kurio pasirodė Jai Shankaras Choudhary'is. Numerį atliko ir Chhappanas Bhogas Bhajanas. Prie jo prisijungė dainininkas Raju Khandelwalas. Tada Lakkha Singh ėmėsi bhadžanų giedojimo iniciatyvos. 108 Chhappan Bhog patiekalai (hinduizme 56 skirtingi valgomi dalykai, pavyzdžiui, saldainiai, vaisiai, riešutai, patiekalai ir t. t., aukojami dievybei) buvo patiekti Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh taip pat pristatė čapan bog bajan. Dainininkas Raju Khandelwalis jam pritarė.
mt: The program began at 8:30 am local time (15:00 UTC). Famous singers from all over the country sang bhajans, or religious hymns, at the feet of Sri Shyama. In the evening, Sanju Sharma sang, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. Chhappan Bhog was performed by Chhappan Bhog. Raju Khandelwal joined him. Then Lakkha Singh took the initiative to sing bhajans. 108 Chhappan Bhog offerings (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, such as sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes, etc., offered to the deity) were offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also presented chapan bog bajan. Raju Khandelwal agreed.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: Šventė prasidėjo specialiu visame pasaulyje žinomos „Cirque du Soleil“ cirko trupės pasirodymu. Vėliau grojo Stambulo valstybinis simfoninis orkestras, janyčarų grupė ir dainavo atlikėjai Fatih Erkoç bei Müslüm Gürses. Tada į sceną išėjo šokantys dervišai. Turkijos diva Sezen Aksu pasirodė su Italijos tenoru Alessandro'u Safina ir Graikijos dainininke Haris Alexiou. Baigdama, Turkijos šokių grupė „Fire of Anatolia“ atliko pasirodymą „Troja“.
mt: The celebration began with a special performance by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil circus troupe. Later, the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a military band, and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses performed. Dervishes then danced on stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The Turkish dance group "Fire of Anatolia" performed "Troy" to end the celebration.
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: Keleiviams buvo suteikta vandens, nes jie laukė 32 laipsnių karštyje. Kavalerija yra armija, kovojanti ant arklio. Balnas dar nebuvo išrastas, todėl asirų kavalerija kovojo ant plikų arklių nugarų. Būti užstrigus ant amerikietiškųjų kalnelių bet kiek laiko būtų mažų mažiausiai nepatogu, o pirmam žmogui išlaipinti prireikė mažiausiai valandos.“
mt: Passengers were given water as they waited in 32 degree heat. Cavalry is an army that fights on horseback. Blankets had not yet been invented, so Assyrian cavalry fought on the backs of bare horses. It would be at least somewhat uncomfortable to be stuck on American hills for any amount of time, and it would take at least an hour to unload the first man.
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Pasak naujausio biuletenio, jūros lygio rodmenys nurodė susidariusį cunamį. Tikrai buvo užfiksuotas cunamio aktyvumas šalia Pago Pago ir Niujė. Nepranešta apie Tongoje didžiulę žalą ar sužeistuosius, bet laikinai nebuvo elektros, dėl to, anot pranešimo, Tongos institucijos negavo perspėjimo apie cunamį iš Ramiojo vandenyno cunamių perspėjimo centro. Keturiolika mokyklų Havajuose, įsikūrusių pakrantėje arba šalia jų, buvo uždarytos nuo trečiadienio nepaisant panaikintų įspėjimų.
mt: The latest bulletin reports sea level measurements indicating a tsunami.  A tsunami was definitely generated near Pago Pago and Niue.  No damage or casualties were reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, according to the report, because Tongan institutions did not receive a warning from the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.  Fourteen schools in Hawaii, located on the coast or near it, were closed on Monday despite the cancellation of the warnings.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny's Reidas, Naujosios Zelandijos A1GP komandos vairuotojas porininkas, šiandien pateko į istoriją didžiausiu greičiu pervažiavęs prieš 48 metus pastatytą Oklendo uosto tiltą Naujojoje Zelandijoje, tai vyko nepažeidžiant įstatymų. Ponas Reidas sugebėjo septynis kartus per tiltą 160 km / h greičiu vairuoti Naujosios Zelandijos A1GP automobilį „Black Beauty“. Naujosios Zelandijos policijai nepavyko panaudoti savo greičio radarų, kad pamatytų, kokiu greičiu važiuoja ponas Reidas, nes „Black Beauty“ yra labai žemas – vienintelį kartą policijai pavyko užfiksuoti poną Reidą, kai jis sulėtėjo iki 160 km/h greičio.
mt: Jonny Reid, teammate of New Zealand A1GP team, today made history by crossing the Auckland Harbour Bridge, built 48 years ago, at the highest speed ever. Mr. Reid managed to drive the New Zealand A1GP car "Black Beauty" seven times over the bridge at 160 km/h speed without breaking any laws. New Zealand police failed to use their speed radars to see how fast Mr. Reid was driving, as "Black Beauty" is very low to the ground, and the only time police managed to catch Mr. Reid was when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Vidutinio stiprumo žemės drebėjimas sudrebino Montaną pirmadienį, 10:08 val. Kol kas nei Jungtinių valstijų geologijos tarnyba (USGS), nei Nacionalinis žemės drebėjimų informacijos centras negavo jokių žinių apie padarytą žalą. Žemės drebėjimo centras buvo maždaug 20 km (15 mylių) į šiaurę-šiaurės rytus nuo Dilono ir apie 65 km (40 mylių) į pietus nuo Bjuto.
mt: A moderate earthquake shook Montana on Monday, 10:08 am.  So far, neither the United States Geological Survey (USGS) nor the National Earthquake Information Center has reported any damage.  The earthquake's epicenter was about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Dabar ji veikia kaip centrinė aikštė ir joje visada vyksta daug dalykų, tiek dieną, tiek naktį. Kalėjimas liūdnai pagarsėjo po to, kai jį perėmus JAV pajėgoms, jame buvo aptiktas netinkamas elgesys su kaliniais.
mt: It now serves as a central courtyard and is always full of activity, both day and night. The prison gained notoriety after it was handed over to U.S. forces, when mistreatment of prisoners was discovered.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Grupė atšaukė Maujo Karo memorialiniame stadione rengtą koncertą, kuriame turėjo dalyvauti 9 000 žmonių, ir atsiprašė gerbėjų. Grupės vadybos įmonė „HK Management Inc.“ nenurodė pirminės priežasties, kai ji atšaukė pasirodymą rugsėjo 20 d., tačiau kitą dieną suvertė kaltę logistikai.
mt: 9,000 people were to attend the concert at the Mauk War Memorial Stadium, but the group canceled and apologized to fans. The group's management company, HK Management Inc., did not disclose the original reason for the cancellation on September 20, but the next day blamed logistics.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: Pranešama, kad kol teisėsaugos pareigūnų nebuvo Biškeko gatvėse, buvo itin paplitęs plėšikavimas visą parą. Biškeką vienas stebėtojas apibūdino kaip skęstantį „anarchijoje“, nes būriai žmonių klaidžiojo gatvėmis ir plėšė plataus vartojimo prekių parduotuves. Keli Biškeko gyventojai apkaltino pietiečius protestuojus įstatymų pažeidimu.
mt: It was reported that while police were absent from the streets of Bishkek, looting was rampant throughout the day. One observer described Bishkek as "dying in anarchy," as crowds of people roamed the streets and looted shops selling consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed the protesters for breaking the law.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

mt: It was reported that while police were absent from the streets of Bishkek, looting was rampant throughout the day. One observer described Bishkek as "dying in anarchy," as crowds of people roamed the streets and looted shops selling consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed the protesters for breaking the law.
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Anksčiau „Ring“ vadovas Jamie Siminoffas pastebėjo, kad įmonė buvo įkurta, nes jis negirdėjo savo garaže esančios parduotuvės durų skambučio. Jis pasakė, kad įrengė „WiFi“ durų skambutį. Siminofas teigė, kad pardavimai po jo pasirodymo „Shark Tank“ epizode 2013 m., kuriame laidos žiuri atsisakė finansuoti startuolį, šoktelėjo į viršų. 2017 m. pabaigoje Siminoffas pasirodė prekybos televizijos kanale „QVC“. Taip pat „Ring“ susitarė be teismo su konkuruojančia saugos įmone „ADT Corporation“.
mt: Previously, "Ring" CEO Jamie Siminoff noted that the company was founded because he did not hear the doorbell chime in his store. He said he installed a "WiFi" doorbell chime. Siminoff said that sales after his appearance on the 2013 episode of "Shark Tank", where the show's judges refused to finance the entrepreneur, skyrocketed. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping television channel "QVC". "Ring" also settled with its competitor security company "ADT Corporation" without trial.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: PBS laida yra gavusi daugiau kaip du tuzinus Emmy apdovanojimų, ji rodyta trumpiau tik už „Sesame Street“ ir „Mister Rogers' Neighborhood“. Kiekvienos laidos serijos metu buvo sutelkiamas dėmesys į tam tikros knygos temą ir tada ta tema buvo nagrinėjama naudojan kelias istorijas. Kiekvienoje laidoje taip pat turi būti pateiktos rekomendacijos, kokių knygų vaikai turėtų ieškoti atėję į biblioteką. Johnas Grantas iš Bafalo „WNED“ („Reading Rainbow“ rodžiusios televizijos stoties) sakė: „Reading Rainbow“ mokė vaikus, kodėl reikia skaityti, ... meilės skaityti – [laida] skatino vaikus pasiimti knygą ir skaityti“. Kai kurie žmonės, įskaitant Johną Grantą, mano, kad prie serialo pabaigos prisidėjo tiek finansavimo krizė, tiek edukacinių televizijos programų filosofijos pokytis.
mt: PBS has received more than two dozen Emmy awards, it is shown shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show focused on a particular book and then that theme was explored using several stories. Each episode also had to provide recommendations of which books children should look for when coming to the library. John Grant of Buffalo's WNED (the Reading Rainbow-televised station) said: "Reading Rainbow" taught children why they should read,... love to read – [the show] encouraged children to take a book and read it. " Some people, including John Grant, believe that the series' end contributed to both a funding crisis and a change in educational television philosophy.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Amsterdamo ir Anne Frank muziejaus pareigūnai nurodo, kad medis užkrėstas grybeliu ir kelia pavojų visuomenės sveikatai, nes gali bet kada nulūžti. Jį buvo numatyta nukirsti antradienį, tačiau jis buvo išgelbėtas po skubaus teismo sprendimo.
mt: Officials from the Amsterdam and Anne Frank museums say the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a threat to public health, as it could fall at any time. It was scheduled to be cut down on Monday, but it was saved after a last-minute court ruling.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: Gyvūnų išvadavimo judėjimas ir Karališkoji žiauraus elgesio su gyvūnais prevencijos draugija (angl. The Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals, RSPCA) vėl ragina visose Australijos skerdyklose įrengti privalomas vaizdo stebėjimo kameras. Karališkosios žiauraus elgesio su gyvūnais prevencijos draugijos (RSPCA) Naujojo Pietų Velso vyriausiasis inspektorius David O'Shannessy teigė ABC, kad priežiūra ir patikros skerdyklose turi būti įprasta praktika Australijoje. „Stebėjimo kameros būtų aiškus signalas žmonėms, dirbantiems su gyvūnais, kad jų gerovei teikiama pirmenybė.“
mt: The RSPCA and Animal Liberation Australia again urge all Australian abattoirs to install mandatory CCTV cameras. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC that monitoring and auditing should be a standard practice in Australia. "CCTV would be a clear signal to people working with animals that their welfare is a priority."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Red Leiko bendruomenėje šiandien po Jeffo Weise ir trijų iš devynių aukų laidotuvių sklinda žinios, kad dėl kovo 21 d. šaudynių mokykloje buvo areštuotas kitas moksleivis. Valdžios atstovai oficialiai beveik nieko nesakė, tik patvirtino šiandienos suėmimą. Tačiau informacijos apie tyrimą turintis šaltinis leidiniui „Minneapolis Star-Tribune“ teigė, kad tai buvo Louisas Jourdainas, šešiolikmetis Raudonojo ežero genties vado Floydo Jourdaino sūnus. Šiuo metu nežinoma, kokie bus pateikti kaltinimai ar kas atvedė institucijas pas berniuką, bet nepilnamečių byla pradėta tirti federaliniame teisme.
mt: In the Red Lake community today, after the funerals of Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims, news spread that another student was arrested in connection with the March 21 shootings at the school. Government officials officially said little, only confirming an arrest today. However, a source familiar with the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, the 16-year-old son of Red Lake tribal chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known what charges will be filed or what led authorities to the boy, but the juvenile case is being investigated in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Kaip teigė protesto organizatoriai, Vokietijos miestuose, pavyzdžiui, Berlyne, Kelne, Hamburge ir Hanoveryje, susirinko maždaug 100 000 žmonių. Policijos skaičiavimu, Berlyne susirinko 6500 protestuotojų. Protestai taip pat vyko Paryžiuje, Sofijoje (Bulgarija), Vilniuje (Lietuva), Valetoje (Malta), Taline (Estija) ir Edinburge bei Glazge (Škotija). Londone maždaug 200 žmonių surengė protestą prie kai kurių didžiausių autorių teisių savininkų biurų. Praėjusį mėnesį Lenkijai pasirašius prekybos susitarimą dėl kovos su klastojimu (angl. ACTA), šalyje vyko dideli protestai, dėl kurių Lenkijos vyriausybė nusprendė kol kas neratifikuoti susitarimo. Latvija ir Slovakija atidėjo prisijungimą prie ACTA.
mt: 100,000 people protested in cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, Hanover, Paris, Sofia (Bulgaria), Vilnius (Lithuania), Valletta (Malta), Tallinn (Estonia) and Edinburgh and Glasgow (Scotland). London saw about 200 people protest outside some of the largest copyright holders' offices. Last month, after Poland signed the ACTA agreement to combat counterfeiting, the country saw large protests, which led the Polish government to decide to not ratify the agreement for now. Latvia and Slovakia have postponed joining ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: Pranešta apie 60 netinkamai veikiančių „iPod“ perkaitimo atvejų, kurių metu iš viso kilo šeši gaisrai, o keturi žmonės patyrė nedidelių nudegimų. Japonijos Ekonomikos, prekybos ir pramonės ministerija (angl. Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry Ministry (METI)) teigė žinojusi apie 27 su įrenginiais susijusius nelaimingus atsitikimus. Praėjusią savaitę METI paskelbė, kad „Apple“ pranešė apie 34 papildomus perkaitimo incidentus, kuriuos įmonė pavadino „nerimtais“. Ministerija atsakė pavadindama „Apple“ ataskaitos atidėjimą „tikrai apgailėtinu“.
mt: 60 faulty iPods have been reported to have overheated, with six fires and four minor injuries. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said it knew of 27 incidents involving the devices. Last week, METI said Apple had reported 34 additional overheating incidents, which it called "disturbing." The ministry called Apple's delay in reporting the incidents "truly deplorable."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: „Apple“ generalinis direktorius Styvas Džobsas prietaisą pristatė atėjęs į sceną ir išsitraukęs „iPhone“ iš džinsų kišenės. Sakydamas 2 valandų trukmės kalbą jis pareiškė: „Šiandien „Apple“ siekia iš naujo išrasti telefoną, ketiname šiandien kurti istoriją.“
mt: Apple CEO Steve Jobs pulled the iPhone from his jeans pocket and introduced it to the stage. Saying a two-hour speech he announced: "Today Apple is reinventing the phone, we're going to create history today."
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Šiuo metu einanti senatorės pareigas pirmoji Argentinos ponia Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner apie savo kandidatūrą į prezidento postą paskelbė vakar vakare La Platos mieste, kuris yra už 50 kilometrų (31 mylios) nuo Buenos Airių. Kad ketina kandidatuoti į prezidento postą, Kirchner paskelbė Argentinos teatre, ten pat, kur 2005 m. pradėjo savo kampaniją kandidatuodama į Senatą kaip Buenos Airių provincijos delegacijos narė.
mt: The current senator, the first woman to hold the office, Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president last night in La Plata, a city about 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. She announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine theater, the same place where in 2005 she began her campaign for the Senate as a delegate from the Buenos Aires province.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

Kad ketina kandidatuoti į prezidento postą, Kirchner paskelbė Argentinos teatre, ten pat, kur 2005 m. pradėjo savo kampaniją kandidatuodama į Senatą kaip Buenos Airių provincijos delegacijos narė.

Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Be to, ACMA nustatė, kad nors vaizdo įrašas buvo perduodamas srautu internete, „Big Brother“ nepažeidė internetinio turinio cenzūros įstatymų, nes medija nebuvo laikoma „Big Brother“ svetainėje. Transliavimo paslaugų įstatyme numatytas interneto turinio reguliavimas, tačiau kad būtų laikomas interneto turiniu, jis turi fiziškai būti serveryje.
mt: In addition, ACMA found that while the video was being streamed over peer-to-peer networks, "Big Brother" did not breach the internet content censorship laws, as the media was not hosted on the "Big Brother" website.  The Broadcasting Services Act requires regulation of internet content, but for it to be considered internet content, it must be physically hosted on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: Be to, ACMA nustatė, kad nors vaizdo įrašas buvo perduodamas srautu internete, „Big Brother“ nepažeidė internetinio turinio cenzūros įstatymų, nes medija nebuvo laikoma „Big Brother“ svetainėje. Transliavimo paslaugų įstatyme numatytas interneto turinio reguliavimas, tačiau kad būtų laikomas interneto turiniu, jis turi fiziškai būti serveryje.
mt: In addition, ACMA found that while the video was being streamed over peer-to-peer networks, "Big Brother" did not breach the internet content censorship laws, as the media was not hosted on the "Big Brother" website.  The Broadcasting Services Act requires regulation of internet content, but for it to be considered internet content, it must be physically hosted on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: Peteras Costello, Australijos iždininkas ir žmogus, kuris greičiausiai pakeis ministrą pirmininką Johną Howardą liberalų partijos lyderio vietoje, išreiškė palaikymą Australijos branduolinės energetikos pramonei. P. Costello tvirtino, kad kai tik branduolinės energijos gamyba taps ekonomiškai perspektyvi, Australija turėtų siekti ja naudotis. „Jei ji taps komercinė, turėtume ją turėti. Tai reiškia, kad atominei energijai iš principo neprieštaraujama“, – sakė Costello.
mt: Peter Costello, Australia's treasurer and the man most likely to replace Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, expressed support for Australia's nuclear power industry. Costello said that when nuclear power becomes economically viable, Australia should seek to use it. "If it becomes commercial, we should have it. It means that nuclear power is not inherently objectionable," Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Buvo tik aštuoniolika medalių per dieną, todėl daugeliui šalių nepavyko užlipti ant medalių pakylos. Tarp jų ir Nyderlandai, kurių slidinėjimo stovint moterų atstovė Anna Jochemsen vakar „Super-G“ varžybose finišavo devinta, ir Suomija su Katja Saarinen, kuri tame pačiame renginyje užėmė dešimtą vietą. Australas Mitchellas Gourley finišavo vienuoliktas vyrų slalomo milžino stovint rungtyje. Varžovas iš Čekijos Oldrichas Jelinekas finišavo šešioliktas slalomo milžino sėdint rungtyje. Arly Velasquezas iš Meksikos finišavo penkioliktas vyrų didžiojo slalomo sėdint rungtyje. Adamas Hallas iš Naujosios Zelandijos finišavo devintas vyrų didžiojo slalomo stovint rungtyje. Lenkijos vyrų silpnaregių gretose slidininkas Maciej Krezel ir vedlė Anna Ogarzynska baigė tryliktieji „Super-G“ etapą. Pietų Korėjos Jong Seork Park baigė dvidešimt ketvirtas vyrų „Super-G“ sėdint etapą.
mt: 18 medals were awarded per day, so many countries did not make the podium. Among them were the Netherlands, whose women's downhill skier Anna Jochemsen finished ninth in the women's downhill, and Finland with Katja Saarinen, who finished tenth in the same event. Australian Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's slalom giant slalom. Czech Oldrich Jelinek finished eighteenth in the men's slalom giant slalom. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's giant slalom. Adam Hall of New Zealand finished ninth in the men's giant slalom. In the women's giant slalom, Polish skier Maciej Krezel and Anna Ogarzynska finished twenty-third. South Korean Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's giant slalom.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: Teismo procesas vyko Karališkajame Birmingemo teisme, o baigėsi rugpjūčio 3 d. Įvykio vietoje suimtas laidos vedėjas neigė išpuolį ir teigė, kad strypu gynėsi nuo butelių, kuriuos į jį mėtė apie trisdešimt žmonių. Bleikas taip pat buvo nuteistas už bandymą pakreipti bylos nagrinėjimo eigą. Teisėjas pasakė Blake, kad jo įkalinimas „beveik neišvengiamas“.
mt: The trial was held at the Royal Courts of Justice, and ended on August 3. The club's bouncer denied the attack and claimed he was defending himself from bottles thrown by about thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake that his imprisonment was "almost inevitable".
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Kiti darbotvarkės Balyje klausimai yra likusių pasaulio miškų išsaugojimas ir dalijimasis technologijomis, padedančiomis besivystančioms tautoms augti mažiau taršiais būdais. JT taip pat tikisi įkurti fondą, padėsiantį pasaulinio atšilimo paveiktoms šalims susidoroti su poveikiu. Pinigai galėtų būti skirti nuo potvynių apsaugotiems namams, geresniam vandens tvarkymui ir pasėlių diversifikacijai.
mt: Other issues on the agenda in Bali are the preservation of the world's remaining forests and sharing of technologies that help developing countries grow less polluting. The UN also hopes to set up a fund to help countries affected by climate change deal with the impact. Money could be used to protect homes from floods, improve water management and diversify crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: Nigerija anksčiau paskelbė, kad planavo prisijungti prie AfCFTA likus savaitei iki susirinkimo. Afrikos Sąjungos prekybos ir pramonės komisaras Albert Muchanga pranešė, kad Beninas ketina prisijungti. „Dar nesusitarėme dėl kilmės ir tarifų lengvatų taisyklių, tačiau turimos sistemos pakanka, kad galėtume pradėti prekiauti nuo 2020 m. liepos 1 d.“, teigė komisaras.
mt: Nigeria had previously announced that it would join the AfCFTA before the end of the week. African Union Trade and Industry Commissioner Albert Muchanga said Benin would join. "We have not agreed on the rules of origin and tariff concessions, but our systems are in place to start trading from July 1, 2020," the commissioner said.
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Kritikų įvertinimo ji susilaukė gyvendama Atlantoje, kurioje ji pripažinta už naujoviškų metodų taikymą mokant miesto vaikus. 2009 m. ji išrinkta nacionaline metų superintendente. Apdovanojimo metu Atlantos mokyklų testų rezultatai buvo labai pagerėję. Netrukus „Atlanta Journal-Constitution“ paskelbė ataskaitą, rodančią, kad yra problemų dėl testų rezultatų. Ataskaitos duomenys parodė neįtikėtinai spartų testų balų padidėjimą ir leido teigti, kad mokykla viduje aptiko problemas, bet nesiėmė jokių veiksmų, remdamasi išvadomis. Tolesniems įkalčiams parodžius, kad Hall kartu su kitais 34 švietimo pareigūnais klastojo testų dokumentus, kaltinimai pareikšti 2013 m.
mt: 2009, she was named Georgia's Superintendent of the Year. At the time, Atlanta's school test scores had improved dramatically. Soon after, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with the test scores. The report's data showed unusually rapid test score gains and allowed the school to identify problems within the school, but did not take any action based on the findings. Later, after further allegations that Hall and 34 other education officials had cheated on test documents, charges were filed against her in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Viena bomba susprogo už gubernatoriaus kanceliarijos. Per dvi valandas šalia vyriausybės pastatų sprogo dar trys bombos. Kai kuriuose pranešimuose oficialus nurodomas žuvusiųjų skaičius yra aštuoni, oficialūs šaltiniai tvirtina, kad buvo sužeista iki 30, tačiau galutiniai skaičiai dar nėra žinomi.
mt: One bomb exploded behind the governor's office. Over two hours, three more bombs exploded near government buildings. Official death toll is eight, but official sources claim up to 30 were injured, but final numbers are not yet known.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 21 metų amžiaus Jesus prisijungė prie „Manchester City“ 2017 m. sausį ir žais už 27 GBP milijonų atlyginimą. Anksčiau žaidė Brazilijos „Palmeiras“ klube. Nuo tada brazilas sužaidė 53 klubo varžybas ir įmušė 24 įvarčius.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City in January 2017 for a £27 million fee. Previously played for Brazilian club Palmeiras. Since then, the Brazilian has played 53 club games and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Šįryt apie 10 valandą vietos laiku Mekoje, šventajame musulmonų mieste, sugriuvo nakvynės namai. Pastate gyveno daug piligrimų, atvykusių aplankyti šventojo miesto chadžo išvakarėse. Bendrabučio svečius daugiausia sudarė Jungtinių Arabų Emyratų piliečiai. Mirčių skaičius siekia mažiausiai 15; tikėtina, kad jis dar didės.
mt: 15 people were killed and many more injured when a hotel collapsed in Mecca, the holiest city of Islam, early this morning. The hotel was mostly occupied by Emirati pilgrims visiting the holy city for the Hajj. The death toll is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Palydovai, kurie abu svėrė daugiau kaip 1 000 svarų ir skriejo maždaug 17 500 myl. / val. greičiu, susidūrė 491 mylios aukštyje virš Žemės. Mokslininkai teigia, kad susidūrimas sukėlė didelį sprogimą. Jie vis dar bando nustatyti, kokio masto buvo katastrofa ir kaip tai paveiks Žemę. Nuolaužas stebi Jungtinių Valstijų gynybos departamento strateginė komanda. Trajektorijos analizė bus paskelbta viešoje svetainėje.
mt: Two satellites, both weighing more than 1,000 pounds and traveling at about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the collision caused a large explosion. They are still trying to determine the extent of the disaster and how it will affect the Earth. The debris is being tracked by a U.S. Department of Defense strategic command. Trajectory analysis will be released on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: 2008 m. 400 turtingiausių amerikiečių sąraše Battenas užėmė 190-ąją vietą, o jo turtas buvo įvertintas 2,3 mlrd. USD. Jis baigė Virdžinijos universiteto Meno ir mokslo kolegiją 1950 m. ir daug prisidėjo prie tos institucijos vystymo.
mt: 2008 Forbes 400 richest Americans list, Batten was ranked 190th, with a net worth of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's College of Arts and Sciences in 1950 and has been a major donor to the institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: Kalifornijos gubernatorius Arnoldas Schwarzeneggeris pasirašė įstatymo projektą, pagal kurį nepilnamečiams draudžiama parduoti ar nuomoti smurtinius vaizdo žaidimus. Įstatymo projekte reikalaujama, kad smurtiniai vaizdo žaidimai, parduodami Kalifornijos valstijoje, būtų pažymėti žyma „18“, o jų pardavimas nepilnamečiui būtų laikomas nusikaltimu ir baudžiamas 1000 JAV dol. bauda.
mt: California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill into law that prohibits minors from buying or renting violent video games. The bill requires that violent video games sold in California be labeled with an "18" rating, and that their sale to minors be considered a crime and punishable by a $1000 fine.
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: Diuvalis, vedęs ir turintis du suaugusius vaikus, nepaliko didelio įspūdžio su istorija susijusiam Mileriui. Paprašytas komentaro, Mileris atsakė: „Mikas posėdžio metu daug kalba... Ruošiausi, todėl, tiesą sakant, negirdėjau, ką jis kalbėjo“.
mt: Duval, who is married and has two adult children, did not leave a lasting impression on Miller, who is associated with the history. Asked for comment, Miller replied, "Mike talks a lot during meetings... He's prepared, so, to be honest, I didn't hear what he said."
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: Prieš antrąjį svarstymą po antradienį, Ministro Pirmininko kanceliarijoje, vykusio 25 minučių susitikimo su Naujosios Demokratų partijos lyderiu Jacku Laytonu, premjeras Stephenas Harperis sutiko išsiųsti vyriausybės „švaraus oro įstatymą“ visų partijų komitetui peržiūrai. Susitikęs su premjeru Laytonas paprašė konservatorių aplinkosaugos įstatymo pakeitimų: „kruopštaus ir išsamaus perrašymo“. Nuo tada, kai federalinė vyriausybė nusprendė perimti Mersey ligoninės Devonporte, Tasmanijoje, finansavimą, valstijos vyriausybė ir kai kurie federaliniai parlamento nariai kritikavo šį veiksmą kaip triuką prieš prasidedant federaliniams rinkimams, kurie bus paskelbti iki lapkričio. Tačiau premjeras Johnas Howardas pasakė, kad įstatymu siekiama tik apsaugoti ligoninės infrastruktūrą, kad Tasmanijos valdžia jos nepablogintų – tam papildomai skiriama 45 milijonai AUD.
mt: Before the second reading on Tuesday, after a 25-minute meeting at the Prime Minister's office with New Democratic Party leader Jack Layton, Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's "clean air bill" to all-party committee review. Layton asked Harper to amend the Conservative government's air pollution bill: "a thorough and detailed rewrite". Since the federal government decided to take over the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, its state government and some federal parliamentarians criticized this move as a pre-election stunt, with federal elections to be held before November. However, Prime Minister John Howard said the bill was only intended to protect the hospital's infrastructure, so the Tasmanian government would not destroy it – an additional $45 million AUD was allocated.
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Gyvūnų, kurie pastipo suėdę užteršto gyvūnų ėdalo, šlapimo mėginiuose rasta cianuro rūgšties ir melamino. Reaguojant šioms dviem medžiagoms susiformuoja kristalai, trukdantys kepenų veiklai, sakė universiteto tyrinėtojai. Tyrėjai pastebėjo, kad į kačių šlapimą pridėjus melamino ir cianuro rūgšties susiformavo kristalai. Lyginant infraraudonųjų spindulių spektroskopijos (FTIR) metu, šių kristalų sudėtis atitinka ir paveiktų naminių gyvūnų šlapime randamas medžiagas.
mt: Animals that ate contaminated pet food were found to have cyanide and melamine in their urine, said university researchers. Researchers noticed that adding melamine and cyanide to cat urine formed crystals. Comparing infrared light spectra (FTIR), the composition of these crystals matches the chemicals found in contaminated pet food.
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: „Xinhua“ pranešė, kad trečiadienį vyriausybės tyrėjai atkūrė dviejų skrydžių „juodųjų dėžių“ registratorių duomenis. Kiti imtynininkai taip pat pagerbė Luną. Tommy Dreameris yra pasakęs: „Luna buvo pirmoji ekstremalių situacijų karalienė“. Mano pirmasis vadovas. Luna mirė dviejų mėnulių naktį. Visiškai unikaliai, kokia buvo ir ji pati. Stipri moteris.“ Dastinas „Goldastas“ Runelsas pakomentavo:, „Luna buvo tokia pat keistuolė kaip ir aš... Galbūt net labiau... Myliu ją ir pasiilgsiu jos... Tikiuosi, ji dabar geresnėje vietoje“.
mt: “Xinhua” reported that on Tuesday government officials restored the data of two black box flight recorders. Other wrestlers also praised Luna. Tommy Dreamer has said: “Luna was the first queen of extreme situations.” My first boss. Luna died two months ago. Completely unique, how she was and she herself. Strong woman.” Dastin “Goldast” Runels commented: “Luna was as weird as I am … Maybe even more … I love her and I will miss her … I hope she is in a better place now.”
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Nors automobiliui atsitrenkiant į namą jo viduje buvo trys žmonės, nė vienas iš jų nenukentėjo. Tačiau vairuotojas sunkiai susižalojo galvą. Kelias, kuriame įvyko avarija, buvo laikinai uždarytas, kol skubios pagalbos tarnybos išlaisvino vairuotoją iš raudonojo „Audi TT“. Iš pradžių jis buvo paguldytas į Jameso Pageto ligoninę Didžiajame Jarmute. Vėliau jis buvo perkeltas į Adenbruko ligoninę Kembridže.
mt: Though the car hit the house with three people inside, none of them were injured. However, the driver was seriously injured in the head. The road where the accident occurred was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. Initially he was taken to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was later transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Varžybos prasidėjo 10:00 val. ryte esant puikiam orui, neskaitant vėlesnės dulksnos, kuri greitai baigėsi – puiki diena septyneto regbio turnyrui. Konstrukcija yra geometrinio objekto (pavyzdžiui, trikampio) sukūrimo metodas, naudojant įrankių rinkinį. Nors žaisdama su savo pietinėmis seserimis Pietų Afrika neabejotinai atrodė praradusi įgūdžius, turnyrui įsibėgėjant ji stabiliai tobulėjo. Jų disciplinuota gynyba, kamuolio valdymo įgūdžiai ir puikus komandinis darbas padarė juos išskirtinius ir buvo aišku, kad tai yra komanda, kurią norint įveikti reikės pasistengti.
mt: The match began at 10:00 am with good weather, except for a later dust storm, which quickly ended – a great day for the Rugby Sevens tournament. The construction is a geometric object (e.g. triangle) creation method using a toolset. While playing with their southern sisters South Africa undoubtedly looked to have lost its skills, the tournament progressed it steadily improved. Their disciplined defense, ball handling skills and good teamwork made them stand out and it was clear that this was a team that would need to be beaten.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Per pastaruosius tris dešimtmečius nepaisant to, kad išliko komunistine valstybe, Kinija išplėtojo rinkos ekonomiką. Pirmosios ekonominės reformos įvyko vadovaujant Deng Siaopingui. Nuo to laiko Kinijos ekonomika išaugo 90 kartų. Praėjusiais metais Kinija pirmą kartą eksportavo daugiau automobilių nei Vokietija ir aplenkė Jungtines Valstijas tapdama didžiausia šios pramonės rinkos dalimi. Per 2 dešimtmečius Kinijos BVP gali tapti didesnis nei JAV.
mt: Over the past three decades, despite remaining a communist state, China has expanded its market economy. The first economic reforms took place under Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown 90-fold. Last year, China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States to become the largest player in this industry. Over two decades, China's GDP may surpass that of the United States.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: „Mes stengsimės sumažinti anglies dioksido emisijas už BVP vienetą žymiu skaičiumi nuo 2005 m. lygio iki 2020 m.“, – teigė Hu. Jis nepaminėjo nurėžtų sumų skaičių, sakydamas, kad jie bus paskaičiuoti atsižvelgiant į Kinijos ekonominį pajėgumą. Hu besivystančias šalis paragino „pirmiausia vengti seno įpročio teršti ir valyti vėliau“. Jis pridūrė, kad „vis dėlto negalima jų prašyti prisiimti įsipareigojimų, kurie neatitinka vystymosi etapo, atsakomybės ir gebėjimų“.
mt: "We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a certain number from the 2005 level to 2020," Hu said. He did not mention specific reduction targets, saying they would be worked out taking into account China's economic capacity. Hu urged developing countries to "first avoid the old habit of burning and then cleaning up later." He added that "however, they should not be asked to take on commitments that do not match their stage of development, responsibility and capacity."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: Medicinos labdaros organizacija „Mangola“, „Medecines Sans Frontieres“ ir Pasaulio sveikatos organizacija teigia, kad tai yra didžiausias šalyje užfiksuotas protrūkis. „Gydytojai be sienų“ atstovas Richardas Veermanas pasakė: „Angola susiduria su pačiu didžiausiu protrūkiu ir padėtis išlieka labai bloga“.
mt: Medical charity Médecins Sans Frontières, the World Health Organization and the Angolan Red Cross say this is the largest outbreak ever recorded in the country. MSF's Richard Weermane said: "Angola is facing the worst outbreak ever and the situation remains very bad."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Generalinis prokuroras, Kieras Starmeris QC, šį rytą pranešė apie kaltinimus Huhne ir Pryce. Huhne'as atsistatydino, o jį ministrų kabinete pakeis parlamento narys Edas Davey'is. Tikėtina, kad Davey'io paliekamą verslo ministro postą perims parlamento narys Normanas Lambas. Planuojama, Huhne ir Pryce į Vestminsterio teisėjų teismą atvyks vasario 16 d.
mt: The Attorney General, Keir Starmer QC, announced charges against Huhne and Pryce this morning. Huhne resigned, and he will be replaced in the cabinet by MP Chris Huhne. It is expected that Huhne's successor as Business Secretary will be MP Norman Lamb. Huhne and Pryce are expected to appear at Westminster Magistrates' Court on February 16.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: Šioje prancūziškoje Camille'io Saint-Saenso operoje pasakojama apie menininką, „kurio gyvenimą užvaldė meilė narkotikams ir Japonijai“. Todėl atlikėjai ant scenos rūko kanapių suktines, o pats teatras auditoriją skatina prisijungti.
mt: This French opera by Camille Saint-Saens tells the story of an artist whose life was dominated by love of drugs and Japan. So the performers smoke marijuana cigarettes on stage, and the theater encourages the audience to join in.
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: Leonovas, taip pat žinomas kaip „11-asis kosmonautas“, priklausė pradinei Sovietų Sąjungos kosmonautų grupei. 1965 m. kovo 18 d. jis atliko pirmąjį žmogaus išėjimą į atvirą kosmosą (EVA) – vienas už erdvėlaivio išbuvo daugiau kaip dvylika minučių. Už savo darbą jis pripažintas „Sovietų Sąjungos didvyriu“ – tai aukščiausias įvertinimas Sovietų Sąjungoje. Po dešimties metų jis vadovavo sovietinei „Apollo“ – „Soyuz“ misijos, simbolizuojančios kosmoso lenktynių pabaigą, daliai.
mt: Leonov, also known as the "Eleventh Cosmonaut", was a member of the original group of Soviet cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first human EVA – one of the two spent more than twelve minutes outside the spacecraft. For his work he was awarded the title of "Soviet Hero" – the highest honor in the Soviet Union. Ten years later he led the Soviet "Apollo" – "Soyuz" mission, symbolizing the end of the space race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: Po avarijos Gibsonas buvo nugabentas į ligoninę, bet netrukus mirė. Sunkvežimio vairuotojas, kuriam yra 64 metai, avarijos metu sužalotas nebuvo. Pats automobilis buvo patrauktas iš įvykio vietos tą pačią dieną maždaug 12:00 val. Grinvičo laiku. Garaže, netoli kurio įvyko avarija, dirbęs asmuo sakė: „Buvo vaikų, laukiančių, kada galės pereiti gatvę, ir jie visi rėkė bei verkė“. Jie visi bėgo iš avarijos vietos.
mt: After the crash Gibson was taken to the hospital, but later died. The truck driver, who is 64 years old, was not injured. The truck was towed away from the scene of the accident at around 12:00 pm Greenwich time. A person who worked in the garage near the scene of the accident said: "There were children waiting to cross the street, and they were all crying and screaming." They all ran away from the scene of the accident.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Atlikti darbai daugiausia buvo teoriniai, tačiau programa buvo sukurta siekiant imituoti Šaulio žvaigždyno stebėjimus. Poveikis, kurio tikėjosi komanda, būtų sukeliamas atoslūgio jėgų tarp galaktikos tamsiosios medžiagos ir Paukščių Tako tamsiosios medžiagos. Kaip Mėnulis traukia žemę, sukeldamas potvynius ir atoslūgius, taip ir Paukščių Takas jėga veikia Šaulio galaktiką. Mokslininkai padarė išvadą, kad tamsioji materija veikia kitą tamsiąją materiją taip pat, kaip ir bet kuri įprasta materija. Šioje teorijoje teigiama, kad didžioji dalis tamsiosios medžiagos aplink galaktiką yra susitelkusi halo pavidalu ir sudaryta iš daugybės smulkių dalelių.
mt: The team's work was mostly theoretical, but the program was created to simulate observations of the Sagittarius dwarf galaxy. The effect they hoped to see would be a gap between the dark matter of the Sagittarius dwarf galaxy and the dark matter of the Local Group's dark matter halo. As the Moon pulls the Earth, causing tides and gaps, so too does the Local Group's dark matter pull on the Sagittarius dwarf galaxy's dark matter. Scientists concluded that dark matter acts on dark matter in the same way that any normal matter does. In this theory, it is said that most of the dark matter around the galaxy is in a halo shape and made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Diskusijas sukėlė nesutarimai dėl išlaidų uraganui Katrina palengvinti ir rekonstrukcijai; jas kai kurie fiskaliniai konservatoriai su humoru pavadino „Bušo Naujojo Orleano sandoriu“. Liberalai rekonstrukcijos darbus ypač kritikavo dėl to, kad rekonstrukcijos sutartys sudarytos neva tik su Vašingtono įmonėmis.
mt: The discussions were sparked by disagreements over funding to ease the effects of Hurricane Katrina and reconstruction; some fiscal conservatives humorously dubbed the reconstruction plans the "Bush New Orleans Deal". Liberals criticized the reconstruction contracts for being awarded only to Washington companies.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: Kai kapsulė pasieks Žemės atmosferą maždaug 5 val. ryte (rytų laiku), tikimasi šviesų šou šiaurės Kalifornijoje, Oregone, Nevadoje ir Jutoje. Kapsulė atrodys panašiai kaip krintanti žvaigždė, skrodžianti dangų. Kapsulė keliaus maždaug 12,8 kilometrų, arba 8 mylių, per valandą greičiu – pakankamai greitai, kad nukeliautų iš San Francisko į Los Andželą per vieną minutę. „Stardust“ pasieks naują visų laikų rekordą ir taps greičiausiu į Žemę grįžusiu erdvėlaiviu: pagerins ankstesnį 1969 m. gegužės mėn. rekordą, kai grįžo „Apollo X“ komandos modulis. „Jis judės virš šiaurės Kalifornijos vakarinės pakrantės ir nušvies dangų nuo Kalifornijos iki centrinio Oregono per Nevadą ir Aidahą iki Jutos“, – pasakė „Stardust“ projekto vadovas Tomas Duxbury.
mt: When the capsule reaches Earth's atmosphere around 5 a.m. local time, it is expected to put on a light show in northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will look like a falling star, burning up the sky. The capsule will travel about 12.8 kilometers, or 8 miles, per hour, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. "Stardust" will set a new all-time record and become the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth: improving on the previous 1969 May record when the Apollo X command module returned. "It will fly over the north coast of California and light up the sky from California to central Oregon through Nevada and Idaho to Utah," said Tom Duxbury, Stardust project manager.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Pitsburgo (Pensilvanija) vaikų ligoninėje dirbusi gydytoja apkaltinta nužudymu sunkinančiomis aplinkybėmis, kai jos motina trečiadienį buvo rasta negyva automobilio bagažinėje, nurodė Ohajo pareigūnai. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29 metų amžiaus, buvo surasta Ohajo Blu Ašo priemiestyje maždaug už 15 mylių į šiaurę nuo Sinsinačio. Gulėjo šalia kelio ant žemės su marškinėliais ir apatiniais – panašu, kad buvo suvartojusi daug vaistų. Jį parodė pareigūnams kelią prie savo juodo „Oldsmobile Intrigue“, esančio už 500 mylių. Ten jie rado 53 metų Sarojos Balasubramanian kūną, padengtą krauju suteptomis antklodėmis. Policija nurodė, kad kūnas čia buvo apie dieną.
mt: A pediatrician at a Pittsburgh (Pennsylvania) hospital was charged with murder in a case of aggravated circumstances, when her mother was found dead in a car trunk on Monday, officials in Ohio said. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Ohio Blue Ash, about 15 miles north of Cincinnati. She was lying on the ground near the road with her pants and underwear on, apparently having taken a lot of drugs. She was shown to police the way to her black "Oldsmobile Intrigue," which was about 500 miles away. There they found the body of 53-year-old Saroj Balasubramanian, covered in blood stains on the head. Police said the body was there about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Tai didžiausias pirkinys per visą „eBay“ istoriją. Įmonė tikisi diversifikuoti pelno šaltinius ir išpopuliarėti ten, kur įsitvirtinusi „Skype“, pavyzdžiui, Kinijoje, Rytų Europoje ir Brazilijoje.
mt: It is the largest purchase in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its revenue streams and popularize where Skype has already established itself, such as China, Eastern Europe and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Kovai nutrūkus po to, kai sužeistieji buvo nugabenti į ligoninę, apie 40 iš kitų likusių kalinių liko kieme ir atsisakė grįžti į savo kameras. Derybininkai mėgino ištaisyti padėtį, bet kalinių reikalavimai nėra aiškūs. Tarp 22 ir 23 val. kalnų vasaros laiku kaliniai kieme sukėlė gaisrą. Greitai riaušių dujomis apsiginklavę pareigūnai įžengė į kiemą ir užspeitė kalinius į kampą ašarinėmis dujomis. Ugniagesių ekipažai galiausiai užgesino gaisrą apie 11:35 val.
mt: After the riot ended after the injured were taken to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates remained in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to resolve the situation, but the inmates' demands are unclear. Between 22 and 23 hours of mountain summer time, inmates in the yard started a fire. Quickly equipped with riot control agents, officials entered the yard and sprayed the inmates with tear gas. Firefighters eventually extinguished the fire around 11:35.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: Komentarai per tiesioginę televizijos transliaciją buvo pirmas kartas, kai aukštesni Irano šaltiniai pripažino, kad sankcijos neturi jokio poveikio. Tai apima finansinius apribojimus ir Europos Sąjungos draudimą eksportuoti žalią naftą, kuri Irano ekonomikoje sudaro 80 proc. iš užsienio gaunamų pajamų. Savo naujausiose mėnesinėse ataskaitose tarptautinė organizacija, jungianti naftą eksportuojančias valstybes (OPEC) teigia, kad žalios naftos eksportas nukrito iki žemiausio lygio per du dešimtmečius ir yra 2,8 mln. barelių per dieną. Šalies aukščiausiasis lyderis ajatola Ali Chamenėjus apibūdino priklausomybę nuo naftos kaip „spąstus“, būdingus šaliai dar iki 1979 m. revoliucijos laikų, iš kurių reikėtų išsivaduoti.
mt: Comments during a live television broadcast were the first time that senior Iranian officials acknowledged that sanctions have no effect. This includes financial restrictions and the European Union's ban on exporting crude oil, which makes up 80 percent of Iran's foreign income. In its latest monthly reports, the international organization that unites oil exporting countries (OPEC) says that crude oil exports have fallen to the lowest level in two decades and are 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's highest leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, described dependence on oil as "a burden", characteristic of the country before the 1979 revolution, from which it is necessary to emancipate.
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: Prancūzijoje balsavimas tradiciškai buvo veikla, nelabai susijusi su technologijomis: balsuotojai įeina į kabiną ir įdeda popieriaus lapą su pažymėtu kandidatu į voką. Pareigūnams patikrinus rinkėjo tapatybę, rinkėjas įmeta voką į balsadėžę ir pasirašo balsavimo ritinėlį. Prancūzijos rinkimų įstatymas gana griežtai kodifikuoja procesą. Nuo 1988 m. balsavimo dėžės turi būti permatomos, kad rinkėjai ir stebėtojai galėtų matyti, jog balsavimo pradžioje nėra vokų ir kad nepridedama kitų vokų, tik tie, kuriuos įmeta tinkamai suskaičiuoti ir teisę balsuoti turintys rinkėjai. Kandidatai gali siųsti atstovus stebėti kiekvieną eigos etapą. Vakare griežtų stebėtojų stebimi savanoriai skaičiuoja balsus atlikdami konkrečias procedūras.
mt: In France, voting traditionally was a manual process, not very much related to technology: voters enter a booth and deposit a piece of paper with a marked candidate for office. Officials check the voter's identity, the voter deposits the ballot into a ballot box, and signs a voting slip. The French electoral code very precisely codifies the process. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent, so that voters and observers can see that there are no ballots in the box at the beginning of the voting, and that no ballots are added, only those cast by eligible voters. Candidates can send representatives to observe each step of the process. In the evening, strict observers, watched by volunteers, count the ballots following specific procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.
