src: Jei informacija pasitvirtins, šiuo radiniu bus užbaigtos aštuonerius metus trukusios P. Alleno vykdomos „Musashi“ paieškos. Sudarius jūros dugno žemėlapį, nuolaužos buvo rastos naudojant nuotoliniu būdu valdomą povandeninę transporto priemonę. Pranešama, kad vienas turtingiausių pasaulio žmonių P. Allenas, visą gyvenimą domėjęsis karu, didelę dalį savo turto investavo į jūrų tyrinėjimus ir pradėjo „Musashi“ paieškas.
mt: If the information is confirmed, this discovery will end the eight-year search for the ship Musashi, led by P. Allen.  The wreckage was found using a remotely operated underwater vehicle.  It is reported that one of the richest men in the world, P. Allen, who spent his life interested in war, invested a large part of his fortune in ocean exploration and began the search for the Musashi.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Televizijos pranešimuose matomi iš elektrinės kylantys balti dūmai. Vietos valdžios institucijos įspėja gyventojus, kurių namai stovi netoli gamyklos, likti namuose, išjungti oro kondicionierius ir negerti vandentiekio vandens. Remiantis Japonijos branduoline agentūra, elektrinėje aptikta radioaktyvaus cezio ir jodo. Valdžios institucijos spėja, kad tai rodo, jog konteineriai, kuriuose yra urano degalų, galėjo įtrūkti ir pratekėti.
mt: Television reports show white smoke rising from the plant. Local government agencies warn residents living near the plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and not drink tap water. According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been detected at the plant. Government agencies speculate that this indicates that the containers holding uranium fuel may have leaked and spilled.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll Pietų Afrikos KwaZulu-Natal regione aptiko vaistams ypač atsparią tuberkuliozę (XDR-TB). Duodamas interviu jis teigė, kad naujasis variantas „kelia labai didelį nerimą dėl labai didelio mirtingumo“. Kai kurie pacientai galėjo užsikrėsti ligoninėje, mano dr. Mollis; bent du iš jų buvo ligoninės darbuotojai. Per vienus metus užsikrėtęs žmogus gali užkrėsti apie 10–15 artimų kontaktų. Tačiau XDR-TB procentinė dalis visoje tuberkulioze sergančiųjų grupėje yra maža; 6 000 iš 330 000 Pietų Afrikoje užsikrėtusių žmonių bet kuriuo momentu.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal region discovered a highly resistant form of tuberculosis (XDR-TB). In an interview he said the new variant "causes great concern because of the high mortality". Some patients may have contracted the disease in the hospital, Dr. Moll said; at least two were hospital employees. In one year an infected person can infect about 10–15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of tuberculosis patients is small; 6,000 out of 330,000 South Africans are infected at any given time.
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: „NextGen“ – tai sistema, kuria remdamasi FAA tvirtina, kad jei orlaiviai skristų trumpesniais maršrutais, kasmet sutaupytų milijonus litrų degalų bei sumažintų anglies dvideginio išmetimą. Jai naudojama palydovinė technologija, o ne senesnė antžeminių radarų technologija, kad oro eismo kontrolieriai galėtų tiksliau nustatyti orlaivius ir suteikti pilotams tikslesnės informacijos.
mt: "NextGen" is a system that FAA claims will allow aircraft to fly shorter routes, saving millions of gallons of fuel and reducing carbon dioxide emissions each year. It uses satellite technology, not older ground-based radar technology, to allow air traffic controllers to more precisely track aircraft and provide pilots with more accurate information.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Istorikai kritikavo ankstesnę FTB politiką dėl netinkamo išteklių panaudojimo lengvai išsprendžiamiems atvejams, ypač pavogtų automobilių atvejams, su tikslu pagerinti agentūros sėkmės rodiklį. Kongresas 2005 m. fiskaliniu laikotarpiu pradėjo finansuoti nepadorumo iniciatyvą ir nurodė, kad FTB turi skirti 10 agentų suaugusiųjų pornografijai.
mt: Historians criticized the agency's previous policy of using scarce resources on easily solved cases, especially stolen car cases, in order to improve the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the anti-fraud initiative in the 2005 fiscal year and directed the agency to assign 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: „JAS 39C Gripen“ maždaug 9:30 val. vietos laiku (0230 UTC) rėžėsi į pakilimo taką ir sprogo; dėl to oro uostas buvo uždarytas komerciniams skrydžiams. Išsiaiškinta, kad pilotas – eskadrilės vadas Dilokritas Pattavee. Vietos žiniasklaida praneša, kad į įvykio vietą vykęs oro uosto ugniagesių automobilis apsivertė.
mt: 9:30 local time (0230 UTC) a "JAS 39C Gripen" crashed into the runway and exploded; the airport was closed to commercial flights. It was determined that the pilot was squadron leader Dilokritas Pattavee. Local media reported that the airport's fire truck that was sent to the scene of the accident flipped over.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Septintajame dešimtmetyje Brzezinskis dirbo Johno F. Kennedžio patarėju, o vėliau Lyndono B. Johnsono administracijoje. Per 1976 m. atrenkamuosius rinkimus jis patarinėjo Karteriui dėl užsienio politikos, tada po Henrio Kisingerio nuo 1977 m. iki 1981 m. dirbo Nacionalinio saugumo patarėju (NSP). Dirbdamas NSA, jis Karteriui padėjo diplomatiškai tvarkyti pasaulio reikalus, pvz., pasiekti 1978 m. Kemp Deivido susitarimų; normalizuoti JAV ir Kinijos santykius aštuntojo dešimtmečio pabaigoje; spręsti Irano revoliuciją, po kurios sekės Irano įkaitų krizė 1979 m.; ir sovietų invaziją Afganistane 1979 m.
mt: In the 1970s Brezinski served as an adviser to John F. Kennedy, and later in the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 presidential election, he advised Carter on foreign policy, and then after Henry Kissinger, from 1977 to 1981, served as National Security Adviser (NSA). As NSA, he helped Carter diplomatically deal with world affairs, such as the 1978 Camp David Accords; normalize U.S. and Chinese relations at the end of the 1970s; resolve the Iranian Revolution, which was followed by the Iranian hostage crisis of 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan in 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Kroatijos sostinėje Zagrebe gimęs Bobekas išgarsėjo žaisdamas Belgrado „Partizan“ komandoje. Jis prisijungė prie jų 1945 m. ir pasiliko iki 1958 m. Žaisdamas šioje komandoje per 468 rungtynes jis pelnė 403 įvarčius. Niekas taip dažnai nežaidė ir neįmūšė tiek daug įvarčių kaip Bobekas. Po Danelovo užkariavimo Anglija patyrė ilgą taikos periodą.
mt: Bobek was born in Zagreb, Croatia. He became famous playing for Belgrade Partizan. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958, playing in 468 games and scoring 403 goals. Nobody scored and won as many goals as Bobek. After the Danelow victory, England experienced a long period of peace.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: Kroatijos sostinėje Zagrebe gimęs Bobekas išgarsėjo žaisdamas Belgrado „Partizan“ komandoje. Jis prisijungė prie jų 1945 m. ir pasiliko iki 1958 m. Žaisdamas šioje komandoje per 468 rungtynes jis pelnė 403 įvarčius. Niekas taip dažnai nežaidė ir neįmūšė tiek daug įvarčių kaip Bobekas. Po Danelovo užkariavimo Anglija patyrė ilgą taikos periodą.
mt: Bobek was born in Zagreb, Croatia. He became famous playing for Belgrade Partizan. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958, playing in 468 games and scoring 403 goals. Nobody scored and won as many goals as Bobek. After the Danelow victory, England experienced a long period of peace.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: Hesperonychus elizabethae rūšis priklauso Dromaeosauridae šeimai ir yra Velociraptoriaus pusbrolis. Buvo manoma, kad šis visiškai plunksnuotas šiltakraujis plėšrusis paukštis vaikščiojo ant dviejų kojų su nagais kaip velociraptorius. Antrasis jo nagas buvo didesnis, dėl jo buvo suteiktas pavadinimas hesperonychus, reiškiantis „vakarų nagas“.
mt: Hesperonychus elizabethae is a member of the Dromaeosauridae family and is a cousin of Velociraptor. It was thought to be a feathered, warm-blooded, carnivorous bird that walked on two legs with claws like velociraptor. Its second toe was larger, and it was given the name hesperonychus, meaning "western claw".
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Šventėje, skirtoje paminėti pirmąsias poros, kuri susituokė praėjusiais metais, vestuvių metines, dalyvavo mažiausiai 100 žmonių. Pasak pareigūnų, oficialūs metinių renginiai planuojami vėlesnei datai. Prieš metus pora susituokė Teksase ir atvyko į Bafalą atšvęsti su draugais ir šeimos nariais. Bafale gimęs 30 metų vyras buvo vienas iš keturių šaudynėse žuvusių žmonių, tačiau jo žmona nebuvo sužeista.
mt: 100 people attended the celebration of the first anniversary of the couple who married last year. Officials say official anniversary celebrations are planned for a later date. The couple married in Texas last year and came to Bafal to celebrate with friends and family. The 30-year-old man who was born in Bafal was one of four people killed in the shooting, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Laive „Luno“ buvo 120–160 kubinių metrų kuro, kai jis sulūžo, o stiprus vėjas ir bangos nustūmė jį prie molo. Dvylika įgulos narių išgelbėti sraigtasparniais. Vienintelė patirta trauma – sulaužyta nosis. Šis 100 metrų ilgio laivas buvo pakeliui pasiimti savo įprastų trąšų krovinių, ir iš pradžių pareigūnai baiminosi, kad iš laivo gali išsilieti krovinys.
mt: 120–160 cubic metres of fuel was on board the ship when it broke up, and strong winds and waves pushed it towards the pier. Twelve crew members were rescued by helicopters. The only injury suffered was a broken nose. This 100-metre-long ship was on its way to collect its usual fertilizer cargoes, and officials initially feared that the ship could leak its cargo.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Prie Vautier pasiekimų, nesusijusių su režisūra, galima paminėti 1973 m. bado streiką prieš tai, kas, jo manymu, buvo politinė cenzūra. Prancūzijos įstatymai pasikeitė. Jo aktyvi veikla prasidėjo esant 15 metų amžiaus, kai per II pasaulinį karą prisijungė prie Prancūzijos pasipriešinimo. Jis aprašė save 1998 m. knygoje. XX a. 7-ajame dešimtmetyje jis grįžo į vėl nepriklausomą Alžyrą mokyti filmų režisūros.
mt: Other than his filmmaking, Vautier is known for his activism, including a 1973 hunger strike against what he saw as political censorship. French laws changed. His active life began at age 15, when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He described himself in a 1998 book. In the 1970s, he returned to independent Algeria to teach film directing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Į Romą dalyvauti laidotuvėse nuvyko daugiau kaip keturi milijonai žmonių. Šv. Petro aikštėje vykusiose laidotuvėse dalyvavusių žmonių skaičius buvo toks didelis, kad ne visiems į jas pavyko patekti. Įvairiose Romos vietose įrengta keletas didelių televizijos ekranų, kad žmonės galėtų stebėti ceremoniją. Daugelyje kitų Italijos miestų ir kitur, ypač Lenkijoje, buvo surengtos panašios transliacijos, kurias stebėjo daug žmonių.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome. So many people attended the funeral in St. Peter's Square that not everyone could get in. Large TV screens were set up in various parts of Rome so people could watch the ceremony. Similar broadcasts were held in other Italian cities and elsewhere, especially in Poland, where many people watched.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Kaip pranešama, Macbeth gatvėje dėl dujų nuotėkio įvyko sprogimas bute. Kaimynui paskambinus ir pranešus apie dujų nuotėkį, dujų bendrovės pareigūnas išvyko į įvyko vietą. Kai atvyko pareigūnas, apartamentuose įvyko sprogimas. Apie rimtus sužalojimus nepranešta, bet mažiausiai penki žmonės, per sprogimą buvę įvykio vietoje, buvo gydomi dėl patirto šoko. Bute nebuvo jokių žmonių. Tuo metu iš šios vietovės evakuota beveik 100 gyventojų.
mt: A gas leak in Macbeth Street caused an explosion in a flat. A neighbour called the gas company and a representative came to the scene. When the representative arrived, the flat exploded. There are no reports of serious injuries, but at least five people who were at the scene of the explosion were treated for shock. The flat was unoccupied. At the time, almost 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Žuvo Nicholas Aldenas (25 m.) ir Zachary Cuddebackas (21 m.). Z. Cuddebackas buvo vairuotojas. Edgarui Veguillai buvo sužalota ranka ir žandikaulis, o Kristofferiui Schneideriui prireikė plastinės veido operacijos. Ukos ginklas neiššovė, kol buvo nutaikytas į penkto vyro galvą. Šnaideris kenčia nuo nuolatinio skausmo, viena akimi nemato, trūksta dalies kaukolės, o veidas rekonstruotas naudojant titaną. Schneideris davė parodymus naudodamas vaizdo ryšį iš Jungtinių Valstijų armijos karinių oro pajėgų bazės savo gimtojoje šalyje.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback were killed. Z. Cuddeback was the driver. Edgar Veguilla suffered a broken hand and a fractured jaw, while Kristoffer Schneider required plastic surgery to his face. The gun did not fire until it was aimed at the fifth man's head. Schneider suffers from constant pain, is blind in one eye, lacks part of his skull, and his face was reconstructed using titanium. Schneider gave his testimony using video link from the United States Army Air Force base in his home country.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Ir golfą, ir regbį ketinama sugrąžinti į olimpines žaidynes. Tarptautinis olimpinis komitetas šiandien Berlyne vykusio valdybos posėdžio metu balsavo, kokias sporto šakas įtraukti į olimpines žaidynes. Iš septynių sporto šakų olimpinėmis kandidatėmis atrinktas regbis ir golfas. Buvo įdėta pastangų, kad skvošas, karatė ir riedučių sportas patektų į Olimpinių žaidynių programą, kurie balsavimo metu nepateko į 2015-ųjų Olimpines žaidynes. Balsavimą dar turi ratifikuoti visas TOK per spalį Kopenhagoje įvyksiantį susitikimą.
mt: Golf and rugby are to be reinstated into the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted on which sports to include in the Olympic Games at a meeting in Berlin today. Of the seven sports, rugby and golf were chosen as Olympic candidates. Efforts were made to include squash, karate and roller sports, which did not make it into the 2015 Olympic Games. The vote must be ratified by all IOC members at a meeting in Copenhagen in November.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: 1759 m. rugsėjo 24 d. Arthuras Guinnessas pasirašė Šv. Jokūbo vartų alaus daryklos, esančios Dubline (Airija) 9 000 metų nuomos sutartį. Po 250 metų Ginesas išaugo į pasaulinį verslą, pelnantį daugiau nei 10 milijonų eurų (14,7 mln. JAV dolerių) kasmet.
mt: 1759 September 24 Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000-year lease on the St. James's Gate Brewery in Dublin (Ireland). After 250 years, Guinness grew into a global business, earning more than €10 million (14.7 million U.S. dollars) annually.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Patvirtinta, kad paukščių gripo atmaina H5N1, nuo kurios žmogus gali mirti, užkrėsta negyva laukinė antis, pirmadienį rasta pelkėje netoli Liono, rytinėje Prancūzijos dalyje. Prancūzija yra septintoji šalis Europos Sąjungoje, labiausiai kenčianti nuo šio viruso; kitos šalys – Austrija, Vokietija, Slovėnija, Bulgarija, Graikija ir Italija. Įtariami H5N1 atvejai Kroatijoje ir Danijoje lieka nepatvirtinti.
mt: It was confirmed that the avian flu strain H5N1, which can kill humans, infected a dead wild duck found in a marsh near Lyon, eastern France, on Monday. France is the seventh country in the European Union to be affected by the virus; other countries are Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected H5N1 cases in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: JT taikdariai, atvykę į Haitį po 2010 m. žemės drebėjimo, buvo kaltinami dėl ligos platinimo, nes jos židinys buvo šalia karių stovyklos. Ieškinyje nurodoma, kad atliekos iš JT stovyklos nebuvo tinkamai dezinfekuotos, todėl į Artibonito upės – vienos didžiausių Haityje – intaką pateko bakterijų. Prieš atvykstant kariuomenei, Haitis nuo XIX a. pradžios nebuvo susidūręs su problemomis, susijusiomis su šia liga. Haičio teisingumo ir demokratijos institutas nurodė nepriklausomus tyrimus, kuriuose teigiama, kad netyčia paskleisti ligą Haityje galėjo Nepalo JT taikos palaikymo batalionas. Šios ligos ekspertės Jungtinėse Tautose Danielle'ės Lantagne teigimu, protrūkį greičiausiai sukėlė taikdariai.
mt: JT peacekeepers, who arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, were accused of spreading the disease, as its epicenter was near the military camp. The report states that the samples from the JT camp were not properly decontaminated, so the bacteria entered the Artibonite River, one of the largest in Haiti. Before the arrival of the military, Haiti had not encountered problems related to this disease since the nineteenth century. The Haitian Institute of Justice and Democracy commissioned an independent study, which states that the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion may have accidentally spread the disease in Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, an expert on this disease in the United Nations, says that the outbreak was most likely caused by peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: JT taikdariai, atvykę į Haitį po 2010 m. žemės drebėjimo, buvo kaltinami dėl ligos platinimo, nes jos židinys buvo šalia karių stovyklos. Ieškinyje nurodoma, kad atliekos iš JT stovyklos nebuvo tinkamai dezinfekuotos, todėl į Artibonito upės – vienos didžiausių Haityje – intaką pateko bakterijų. Prieš atvykstant kariuomenei, Haitis nuo XIX a. pradžios nebuvo susidūręs su problemomis, susijusiomis su šia liga. Haičio teisingumo ir demokratijos institutas nurodė nepriklausomus tyrimus, kuriuose teigiama, kad netyčia paskleisti ligą Haityje galėjo Nepalo JT taikos palaikymo batalionas. Šios ligos ekspertės Jungtinėse Tautose Danielle'ės Lantagne teigimu, protrūkį greičiausiai sukėlė taikdariai.
mt: JT peacekeepers, who arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, were accused of spreading the disease, as its epicenter was near the military camp. The report states that the samples from the JT camp were not properly decontaminated, so the bacteria entered the Artibonite River, one of the largest in Haiti. Before the arrival of the military, Haiti had not encountered problems related to this disease since the nineteenth century. The Haitian Institute of Justice and Democracy commissioned an independent study, which states that the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion may have accidentally spread the disease in Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, an expert on this disease in the United Nations, says that the outbreak was most likely caused by peacekeepers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: Airijos vyriausybė pabrėžia, kad reikia skubiai priimti parlamentinius teisės aktus padėčiai ištaisyti. Vyriausybės atstovas spaudai sakė, kad „ir visuomenės sveikatos, ir baudžiamojo teisingumo požiūriais dabar svarbu kuo greičiau priimti teisės aktus“. Įsiteisėjus nekonstituciniams pakeitimams, sveikatos ministras išreiškė susirūpinimą tiek žmonių, pasinaudojusių laikinu minėtų medžiagų teisėtu prieinamumu, gerove, tiek pateiktais su narkotikais susijusiais kaltinimais.
mt: The Irish government has stressed the need to quickly pass parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. A government spokesman told the press that "from both a public health and a criminal justice perspective, it is now important to pass legislation as quickly as possible." The health minister expressed concern over both the people who had taken advantage of the temporary availability of the mentioned substances legally, and the charges brought against those involved in the distribution of narcotics.
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: Los Andželo policijos departamento atstovas Christopheris Garcia sakė, kad atliekamas tyrimas dėl įtariamojo neteisėto patekimo į teritoriją, o ne dėl vandalizmo. Ženklas nebuvo fiziškai sugadintas; modifikacija buvo atlikta naudojant juodus brezentus, dekoruotus taikos ir širdies ženklais, kad „O“ raidė būtų skaitoma kaip „e“.
mt: A spokesperson for the Los Angeles Police Department said the investigation was for an alleged illegal entry into the country, not for vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black banners, decorated with peace and heart symbols, so that the "O" letter would be read as "e".
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: Karnas yra plačiai žinomas, bet prieštaringai vertinamas anglų kalbos mokytojas, mokęs Modernaus švietimo ir karaliaus šlovės mokykloje, kuris teigė, kad mokė 9000 mokinių savo karjeros viršūnėje. Savo pastabose jis vartojo žodžius, kuriuos kai kurie tėvai laikė vulgariais, ir, kaip pranešama, klasėje jis kalbėjo nešvankiai. „Modern Education“ apkaltino jį be leidimo išspausdinus dideles reklamas ant autobusų ir melavus, kad jis yra vyriausiasis anglų kalbos mokytojas. Jis taip pat anksčiau buvo apkaltintas autorių teisių pažeidimu, tačiau kaltinimai pateikti nebuvo. Buvęs mokinys sakė, kad „per pamokas jis naudojo slengą, pastabose mokė bendravimo su priešinga lytimi ir elgėsi kaip mokinių draugas“.
mt: A widely known but controversial English teacher at Modern Education and King's Glory School, who claimed to have taught 9000 students at the peak of his career, was accused of using words that some parents considered vulgar, and reportedly spoke in a rude manner in class. "Modern Education" accused him of illegally publishing large advertisements on buses and lying that he was the school's oldest English teacher. He was also previously accused of copyright infringement, but charges were not filed. A former student said that "during class he used slang, taught communication with the opposite sex, and acted as a student's friend."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Buvęs Filipinų policininkas Honkongo turistus laikė įkaitais nuvaręs jų autobusą Filipinų sostinėje Maniloje. Rolandas Mendoza šovė ginklu M16 į turistus. Keli įkaitai buvo išgelbėti ir buvo patvirtinta, kad iki šiol mažiausiai šeši yra negyvi. Anksčiau buvo paleisti šeši įkaitai, įskaitant vaikus ir senolius, bei fotografai iš Filipinų. Fotografai vėliau susikeitė su viena pagyvenusia moterimi, kuriai reikėjo į tualetą. Mendoza nušautas.
mt: A former Philippine policeman held Hong Kong tourists hostage by driving their bus into the Philippine capital's financial district. Rolando Mendoza fired an M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages were rescued and at least six were confirmed dead. Earlier, six hostages, including children and elderly, and photographers from the Philippines were released. The photographers later exchanged with one elderly woman who needed to use the bathroom. Mendoza was shot.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brazilija yra didžiausia Romos katalikų valstybė Žemėje, o Romos katalikų bažnyčia nuolat priešinosi tos pačios lyties asmenų santuokos legalizavimui šalyje. Nacionalinis Brazilijos kongresas dėl įteisinimo diskutuoja 10 metų, o tokios civilinės santuokos šiuo metu yra teisėtos tik Pietų Rio Grandėje. Pradinį įstatymo projektą parengė San Paulo merė Marta Suplicy. Pasiūlytas teisės aktas buvo pakeistas ir dabar yra Roberto Jefferson rankose. Protestuotojai tikisi, kad peticiją pasirašys 1,2 mln. žmonių, o tada ją lapkričio mėn. pateikti Nacionaliniam kongresui.
mt: Brazil is the largest Catholic country in the world, and the Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has been debating the legalization for 10 years, and such civil unions are currently legal only in the state of South Rio Grande. The initial bill was drafted by the mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed law was amended and is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope that the petition will be signed by 1.2 million people, and then submitted to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: Nuo reginio pradžios praėjus penkioms minutėms, pradėjo pūsti vėjas, o po minutės jo greitis jau siekė 70 km/h... tada pradėjo lyti, tačiau taip smarkiai ir gausiai, kad lašai odą badė kaip adatos, tada iš dangaus pasipylė kruša, žmonės pradėjo panikuoti, rėkti ir vienas kitą mindyti. Pamečiau savo seserį ir jos draugą, pakeliui pamačiau du neįgaliuosius vežimėliuose, žmonės tiesiog šokinėjo per juos ir stumdėsi“, – pasakojo Armand Versace.
mt: 5 minutes after the start of the storm, the wind started to blow, and after a minute its speed already reached 70 km/h... then it started to rain, but so hard and heavy that the drops stung like needles, then hail fell from the sky, people started to panic, scream and hit each other. I ran to my sister and her boyfriend, on the way I saw two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumped over them and pushed each other“, – said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Meteorologų teigimu, tikėtina, kad audra, siaučianti apie 1040 km (645 myl.) į vakarus nuo Žaliojo Kyšulio salų, greičiausiai išsisklaidys prieš pasiekdama sausumą. Fredo vėjai šiuo metu siekia 105 mylias per valandą (165 km/val.) ir juda į šiaurės vakarus. Fredas yra visų laikų stipriausias užregistruotas atogrąžų ciklonas Atlanto pietuose ir rytuose nuo pat stebėjimo iš palydovų pradžios ir tik trečias didžiausias žinomas uraganas į rytus nuo 35° vakarų ilgumos.
mt: Meteorologists say the storm, which is moving west of the Cocos Islands at 1040 km (645 miles) per hour, is likely to dissipate before reaching land. Fred winds currently reach 105 mph (165 km/h) and are moving northwest. Fred is the strongest Atlantic hurricane ever recorded south and east of 35° west longitude and the third largest known hurricane to the east of 35° west longitude.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: 802.11n standartas veikia ir 2,4 GHz, ir 5,0 GHz dažnyje. Tai leis jam vėl veikti su 802.11a, 802.11b ir 802.11g, jei pagrindinė stotis turi du radijo ryšius. 802.11n sparta yra daug didesnė negu jo pirmtakių ir teoriškai gali pasiekti maksimalaus 600 Mbit/s pralaidumo.
mt: 802.11n operates in both 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz bands. This will allow it to coexist with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, if the main station has two radio links. 802.11n speed is much higher than its predecessors and theoretically can reach a maximum of 600 Mbit/s throughput.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Olimpinio aukso laimėtojas 100 m ir 200 m plaukimo laisvuoju stiliumi rungtyse ir trijose estafetėse Sandraugos žaidynėse, tačiau dėl skundų jo fizinė forma kelia abejonių. Jis negalėjo vartoti vaistų nuo skausmo, nes žaidynių metu jie draudžiami.
mt: 100 m and 200 m freestyle gold medalist at the 2008 Summer Olympics, but due to complaints about his physical form, he was unable to use painkillers during the games.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Jungtinių Valstijų geologijos tarnybos tarptautiniame žemės drebėjimų žemėlapyje prieš savaitę nebuvo užfiksuota jokių žemės drebėjimų Islandijoje. Islandijos meteorologijos tarnyba taip pat pranešė, kad per pastarąsias 48 valandas Heklos teritorijoje neįvyko jokių žemės drebėjimų. Didelis seisminis aktyvumas, sukėlęs fazės pasikeitimą, užfiksuotas kovo 10 d. šiaurės rytinėje ugnikalnio viršūnės kalderos pusėje. Pranešta apie kalno papėdėje susidariusius tamsius debesis, nesusijusius su vulkaniniu aktyvumu. Debesys sukėlė sumaištį dėl to, ar išsiveržimas iš tikrųjų įvyko.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's International Seismic Event Map did not show any earthquakes in Iceland in the past week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported that there were no earthquakes in the Hekla region in the past 48 hours. A large seismic event, causing a phase change, was recorded on March 10 in the north-eastern caldera of the volcano's summit. It was reported that dark clouds had formed at the foot of the mountain, unrelated to volcanic activity. The clouds caused confusion as to whether an eruption had actually occurred.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported that there were no earthquakes in the Hekla region in the past 48 hours. A large seismic event, causing a phase change, was recorded on March 10 in the north-eastern caldera of the volcano's summit. It was reported that dark clouds had formed at the foot of the mountain, unrelated to volcanic activity. The clouds caused confusion as to whether an eruption had actually occurred.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Nepilotuojamas Mėnulio tyrimų zondas „Chandrayaan-1“ paleido zondą „Moon Impact Probe“, kuris skriejo Mėnulio paviršiumi 1,5 kilometrų per sekundę (3 000 mylių per valandą) greičiu ir sėkmingai nusileido netoli Mėnulio pietų poliaus. Mėnulio zonde buvo ne tik trys svarbūs moksliniai prietaisai, bet ir Indijos nacionalinės vėliavos atvaizdas, nudažytas ant visų pusių.
mt: The unmanned lunar probe Chandrayaan-1 launched a probe, which flew over the lunar surface at 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 mph) and successfully landed near the lunar south pole. The lunar probe was not only three important scientific instruments, but also an image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Pirmieji ligos atvejai šį sezoną buvo užfiksuoti liepos pabaigoje. Ligos nešiotojai yra kiaulės, o uodai ją perduoda žmonėms. Šis protrūkis paskatino Indijos vyriausybę imtis tokių priemonių kaip kiaulių gaudytojų dislokavimas stipriai paveiktose vietose, tūkstančių uodų užuolaidų paskirstymas ir pesticidų purškimas. Vyriausybė žadėjo keliolika milijonų vakcinos nuo encefalito buteliukų, kurie padės pasiruošti sveikatos institucijoms kitiems metams. Planai šiemet pristatyti vakcinas į istoriškai labiausiai paveiktas teritorijas buvo atidėti dėl lėšų trūkumo ir mažo prioriteto, palyginti su kitomis ligomis.
mt: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is spread by pigs, and the flies carry it to humans. This outbreak prompted the Indian government to take measures such as relocating pig hunters to heavily affected areas, distributing thousands of fly traps, and spraying pesticides. The government promised to distribute twelve million vaccine bottles, which will help prepare health institutions for the next year. Plans to introduce vaccines this year to historically most affected areas were postponed due to lack of funds and low priority compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Siūlomas pakeitimas jau patvirtintas abejuose rūmuose 2011 m. Per šią įstatymų leidžiamąją sesiją atliktas pakeitimas: Atstovų rūmai iš pradžių išbraukė antrą sakinį, o paskui Senatas pritarė panašiai formuluotei. Nepavykus įteisinti antrąją bausmę, siūlančią uždrausti tos pačios lyties civilines santuokas, galėtų atverti kelią civilinėms santuokoms ateityje. Pasibaigus šiam procesui, 2015 m. arba 2016 m. HJR-3 vėl peržiūrės kiti išrinkti teisės aktų leidėjai, kad procesas būtų tęsiamas.
mt: The proposed amendment has already been approved by both chambers in 2011. During this legislative session, the House first struck down the second sentence, and then the Senate approved a similar amendment. If the second penalty is not enacted, it could open the door for civil unions in the future. After this process is complete, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by other elected law makers in 2015 or 2016 to continue the process.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: „Panamos popieriais“ bendrai vadinami apie dešimt milijonų Panamos advokatų kontoros „Mossack Fonseca“ dokumentų, nutekintų į spaudą 2016 metų pavasarį. Dokumentai parodė, kad keturiolika bankų padėjo turtingiems klientams paslėpti milijardus JAV dolerių turto, kad būtų išvengta mokesčių ir kitų nuostatų. Didžiosios Britanijos laikraštyje „The Guardian“ buvo rašoma, kad „Deutsche Bank“ kontroliavo maždaug trečdalį iš 1200 priedangos įmonių, naudotų šiam tikslui. Protestai vyko visame pasaulyje, keletas asmenų buvo patraukti baudžiamojon atsakomybėn, o Islandijos ir Pakistano vyriausybių lyderiai atsistatydino.
mt: 2016 spring, the so-called "Panama Papers" were leaked to the press. The documents showed that fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of dollars in assets to avoid taxes and other regulations. The Guardian reported that Deutsche Bank controlled about a third of the 1200 shell companies used for this purpose. Protests occurred worldwide, some people were charged with criminal liability, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Oro transporto katastrofos yra dažnos Irane, kurio senstantis lėktuvų parkas yra prastai prižiūrimas tiek civilinių, tiek karinių operacijų metu. Dėl tarptautinių sankcijų nebuvo galima įsigyti naujų orlaivių. Savaitės pradžioje sudužus policijos sraigtasparniui, žuvo trys žmonės, o dar trys buvo sužeisti. Praėjusį mėnesį Irane įvyko didžiausia oro katastrofa per daugybę metų, kai sudužo į Armėniją skridęs lėktuvas ir žuvo 168 lėktuvu skridę žmonės. Mešhede tą patį mėnesį kitas oro laineris nuvažiavo nuo kilimo tako, trenkėsi į sieną pražudydamas septyniolika žmonių.
mt: Air crashes are common in Iran, where its aging fleet of aircraft is poorly maintained during both civilian and military operations. Due to international sanctions, it was not possible to purchase new aircraft. Last week, a police helicopter crashed, killing three people and injuring three others. Last month, Iran suffered its worst air disaster in decades when a plane crashed into Armenia, killing 168 people on board. In Mashhad, another airliner veered off the runway and crashed into a wall, killing 17 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Šiandien 12.00 val (GMT laiku) Irako studijų grupė pateikė savo ataskaitą. Įspėjama, kad šiuo metu niekas negali garantuoti, jog veiksmai Irake sustabdys religinį karą, didėjantį smurtą ar judėjimą link chaoso. Ataskaita pradedama raginimu pradėti atviras diskusijas ir siekti susitarimo Jungtinėse Valstijose dėl politikos Artimųjų Rytų atžvilgiu. Ataskaitoje griežtai kritikuojamas beveik kiekvienas vykdomosios valdžios dabartinės politikos dėl Irako aspektas ir raginama nedelsiant pakeisti veiksmų kryptį. Pirma iš jos 78 rekomendacijų yra ta, kad iki šių metų pabaigos turėtų būti imtasi naujos diplomatinės iniciatyvos, siekiant apsaugoti Irako sienas nuo priešiškų intervencijų ir atkurti diplomatinius santykius su jo kaimynais.
mt: 12:00 GMT today, the Iraqi Study Group presented its report. It warns that no one can guarantee that current actions in Iraq will stop religious war, increasing violence or movement towards chaos. The report begins with a call to start open discussions and seek agreement in the United States on policy in the Middle East. The report strongly criticizes almost every aspect of the current administration's policy in Iraq and calls for immediate change in direction. The first of its 78 recommendations is that by the end of this year a new diplomatic initiative should be undertaken to protect Iraq's borders from hostile interventions and to reestablish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Anot ANSA, „policijai susirūpinimą kėlė pora aukščiausio lygio incidentų, kurie, kaip jie bijojo, galėjo sukelti didžiulį įpėdinystės karą. Policija teigė, kad Lo Piccolo buvo viršiausias, nes jis buvo Provenzano dešinioji ranka Palerme ir jo didesnė patirtis pelnė jam vyresniosios kartos bosų pagarbą, šiems vykdant Provenzano politiką veikti kuo mažiau, tuo pačiu metu stiprinant savo galios tinklą. Šias vadeivas suvaldė Provenzano'as, nutraukęs Riina'os vykdomą karą prieš valstybę, 1992 m. pareikalavusį kovotojų su mafija Giovannio Falcone'ės ir Paolo Borsellino gyvybių.“
mt: According to ANSA, "police were concerned about a pair of high-level incidents, which, as they feared, could have triggered a major succession war. Police said that Lo Piccolo was the top dog, because he was Provenzano's right hand in Palermo and his greater experience earned him the respect of the older bosses, who were carrying out Provenzano's policy of doing as little as possible, while strengthening his power network. These directives were issued by Provenzano, who ended Riina's war against the state, which in 1992 demanded the lives of the anti-mafia fighters Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Eidama 54 metus mirė Japonijos dziudo kovotoja Hitoshi Saito, laimėjusi du olimpinius aukso medalius. Oficiali mirties priežastis – intrahepatinio tulžies latako vėžys. Ji mirė antradienį Osakoje. Saito yra ne tik olimpinis ir pasaulio čempionas, bet iki mirties buvo visos Japonijos dziudo federacijos mokymo komiteto pirmininkas.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, who won two Olympic gold medals, died of liver cancer. He died on Monday in Osaka. Saito was not only an Olympic and world champion, but until his death he was the chairman of the All Japan Judo Federation's education committee.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Per šią kelionę Iwasaki daug kartų susidūrė su problemomis. Jį apiplėšė piratai, Tibete užpuolė pasiutęs šuo, Nepale jis pabėgo iš santuokos, o Indijoje – buvo suimtas.
mt: On this trip Iwasaki encountered problems many times. He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, escaped a marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella nesuvaldė automobilio ir greitai po starto baigė varžybas. Jo komandos draugas Fernandas Alonsas didžiąją lenktynių dalį pirmavo, tačiau situacija pasikeitė, kai jam sustojus punkte tikriausiai buvo netinkamai uždėtas dešinysis priekinis ratas. Michaelis Schumacheris užbaigė lenktynes netrukus po Alonso, nes lenktynių metu vykusiose kovose buvo sugadinta pakaba.
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and retired early in the race. His teammate Fernando Alonso led most of the race, but the situation changed when he stopped in the pits, presumably with the right front wheel not properly attached. Michael Schumacher finished the race shortly after Alonso, as the race was marred by a crash.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella nesuvaldė automobilio ir greitai po starto baigė varžybas. Jo komandos draugas Fernandas Alonsas didžiąją lenktynių dalį pirmavo, tačiau situacija pasikeitė, kai jam sustojus punkte tikriausiai buvo netinkamai uždėtas dešinysis priekinis ratas. Michaelis Schumacheris užbaigė lenktynes netrukus po Alonso, nes lenktynių metu vykusiose kovose buvo sugadinta pakaba.
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and retired early in the race. His teammate Fernando Alonso led most of the race, but the situation changed when he stopped in the pits, presumably with the right front wheel not properly attached. Michael Schumacher finished the race shortly after Alonso, as the race was marred by a crash.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Per paskutinius tris mėnesius daugiau nei 80 sumtųjų buvo paleista iš centrinės areštinės pastato prieš tai jiems nepateikus jokių teisėtų kaltinimų. Šių metų balandžio mėnesį teisėjas Glynnas pateikė įstaigai nurodymą išleisti ilgiau nei 24 valandas laikomus suimtuosius, jeigu jų neišklausė teismo įgaliotinis. Įgaliotinis nustato užstato sumą, jei skiriama, ir įformina areštavusio pareigūno suformuluotus kaltinimus. Tada kaltinimai įvedami į valstijos kompiuterių sistemą, kur byla yra stebima. Teismo posėdis taip pat nurodo greitojo teismo, į kurį įtariamasis turi teisę, datą.
mt: 80 people were released from the central jail in the past three months without being charged with any crime. In April this year, Judge Glynn ordered the facility to hold suspects for more than 24 hours if they were not interviewed by a magistrate. The magistrate determines the bail amount, if any, and informs the arresting officer of the charges. The charges are then entered into the state computer system, where the case is monitored. The court also sets the date for a preliminary hearing, to which the defendant is entitled.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin taip pat sakė, kad pareigūnai nusprendė atšaukti antrąjį rinkimų etapą, kad afganai nepatirtų su kitais rinkimais susijusių išlaidų ir grėsmės saugumui. Diplomatai teigė, kad Afganistano konstitucijoje jie rado pakankamai neaiškumų, kad nuotėkį pripažintų nereikalingu. Tai prieštarauja ankstesniems pranešimams, kuriuose teigiama, kad paskutinio rinkimų turo atšaukimas prieštarautų konstitucijai.
mt: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the second round of voting to avoid the costs and risks of holding another election. Diplomats said they found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to declare the runoff unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports that canceling the final round of voting would violate the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: Nuo Pakistano nepriklausomybės įgijimo nuo britų valdymo 1947 m. Pakistano prezidentas paskyrė „politinius agentus“ valdyti Federaciškai administruojamas genčių teritorijas (angl. FATA), kurios veikia beveik visiškai autonomiškai. Šie agentai atsakingi už vyriausybės ir teisminių paslaugų pagal Pakistano Konstitucijos 247 straipsnį teikimą.
mt: 1947, after Pakistan gained independence from British rule, the Pakistani president appointed "political agents" to govern Federally Administered Tribal Areas (FATA), which operate almost entirely autonomously. These agents are responsible for the provision of government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution.
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: Filmas, kuriame vaidino Ryanas Goslingas ir Emma Stone, buvo nominuotas visose svarbiausiose kategorijose. Goslingas ir Stone buvo nominuoti geriausio aktoriaus ir aktorės apdovanojimams. Kitos nominacijos: geriausias filmas, režisierius, kinematografija, kostiumų dizainas, montažas, originalus garso takelis, scenografija, garso montažas, garso suvedimas ir originalus scenarijus. Dvi dainos iš filmo, „Audition“ („The Fools Who Dream“) ir „City of Stars“, gavo nominacijas už geriausią originalią dainą. „Lionsgate“ studija gavo 26 nominacijas – daugiau nei bet kuri kita studija.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated in all major categories. Gosling and Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress awards. Other nominations: Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing, and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the film, "Audition" ("The Fools Who Dream") and "City of Stars", were nominated for Best Original Song. The Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations – more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: „NHK“ taip pat pranešė, kad Niigatos prefektūroje esanti Kashiwazaki Kariwa atominė elektrinė veikė normaliai. „Hokuriku Electric Power Co.“ nereikalauja, kad elektrinė būtų „uždaryta“ 1 ir 2 reaktoriuose. Pranešama, kad 9 400 namų regione nėra vandens, o maždaug 100 – elektros. Kai kurie keliai buvo sugadinti, nukentėjusiuose rajonuose nutrūko susisiekimas geležinkeliu, o Išikavos prefektūros Noto oro uostas tebėra uždarytas.
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally.  Hokuriku Electric Power Co. does not require the plant to be "closed" in reactors 1 and 2. It is reported that 9,400 homes in the region are without water, and about 100 are without electricity. Some roads were damaged, and transportation by rail was disrupted in affected areas, and Noto Airport in Ishikawa Prefecture is still closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Nutekintame dokumente nurodomas ginčas dėl sienų, kurių Palestina nori atsižvelgdama į sienas, buvusias iki 1967 m. Viduriniųjų Rytų karo. Mažėjant graikų kalbos žinioms, Vakarai atsidūrė nuo savo graikų filosofinių ir mokslinių šaknų. Izraelis reikalauja nuolatinio kariuomenės buvimo slėnyje dešimt metų, kai bus pasirašyta sutartis, o Palestinos autonomija sutinka, kad tai būtų tik penkerius metus.
mt: The leaked document outlines a dispute over borders, which would be based on the pre-1967 borders of the West Bank. As the Greek language knowledge declines, the West is cut off from its Greek philosophical and scientific roots. Israel demands a permanent military presence in the valley for ten years after the signing of the agreement, while the Palestinian autonomy agrees that it would be only five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: Gimęs Honkonge, Ma studijavo Niujorko universitete ir Harvardo teisės mokykloje ir gavo „žaliąją kortelę“, leidimą nuolat gyventi Amerikoje. Hsieh rinkimų metu norėjo pasakyti, kad Ma gali palikti šalį krizės metu. Hsieh taip pat nurodė, kad fotogeniškas Ma turi daugiau išorinio patrauklumo nei vidinio turinio. Nepaisant šių kaltinimų, Ma lengvai laimėjo išreikšdamas paramą artimesniems ryšiams su Kinijos žemynine dalimi.
mt: Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and received a "green card," allowing him to live in the United States permanently. Ma campaigned on the idea that Ma could leave the country in times of crisis. Ma also indicated that the photogenic Ma had more external appeal than internal content. Despite these criticisms, Ma easily won by expressing support for closer ties with the mainland of China.
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Paaiškėjus, kad daug šeimų ieško teisinės pagalbos kovojant su iškeldinimais, kovo 20 d. nuo būsto sukčių nukentėjusiems asmenims buvo surengtas susitikimas Rytų įlankos bendruomenės teisės centre. Kai nuomininkai pradėjo dalytis tuo, kas jiems nutiko, daugelis įsitraukusių šeimų staiga suprato, kad Carolyn Wilson iš Ouklando būsto administracijos (angl. OHA) pavogė jų užstatus ir paspruko iš miesto. „Lockwood Gardens“ gyventojų nuomone, iškeldinimas gali grėsti dar 40 ar daugiau šeimų, nes, jų žiniomis, OHA policija Oklande ieško kitų socialinių būstų, kurie užimti neteisėtai.
mt: 20 March, a meeting was held at the East Bay Community Law Center for families affected by the recent evictions. When the tenants began to share what had happened to them, many of the families suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson from the Oakland Housing Authority (OHA) had stolen their status and fled the city. The tenants of Lockwood Gardens believe that the evictions could affect up to 40 or more families, as they know that OHA police in Oakland are looking for other social housing that is occupied illegally.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Po lenktynių Keselowskis išlieka asmeninės įskaitos lyderiu, turinčiu 2 250 taškų. Septyniomis šimtosiomis atsilikęs Johnsonas su 2,243 yra antras. Trečias Hamlinas, atsiliekantis dvidešimt taškų, bet penkiais taškais lenkiantis Bowyerį. Kahne'as ir Truexas jaun. yra penktas ir šeštas su atitinkamai 2220 ir 2207 taškais. Stewartas, Gordonas, Kensethas ir Harvickas užėmė dešimt aukščiausių pozicijų automobilių ralio čempionate, šį sezoną likus dar keturioms lenktynėms.
mt: After the race Keselowski remains the points leader with 2,250. Johnson, who is seven hundred behind, is second with 2,243. Hamlin, who is third, is twenty points behind Bowyer, who is fourth. Kahne and Truex are fifth and sixth with 2,220 and 2,207 points respectively. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick are in the top ten in the NASCAR Sprint Cup Series points standings, with four races remaining in the season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Manoma, kad tai penktas kartas istorijoje, kai žmonės pamato chemiškai patvirtintą į Žemę nukritusią Marso medžiagą. Patvirtinta, kad iš maždaug 24 000 žinomų į Žemę nukritusių meteoritų marsiškos kilmės buvo tik apie 34. Penkiolika šių uolų priskiriama praėjusią liepą vykusiam meteoritų lietui. Kai kurie akmenys, kurie Žemėje labai reti, parduodami mokant nuo 11 000 USD iki 22 500 USD už unciją; tai maždaug dešimt kartų brangiau nei kainuoja auksas.
mt: It is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have seen chemically verified Martian material fall to Earth. It was confirmed that only about 34 of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites that fell to Earth were of Martian origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower that occurred last October. Some stones, which are very rare on Earth, are sold for $11,000 to $22,500 per ounce; this is about ten times more expensive than gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Buvo planuojama, kad sužeistą Felipe Massa pakeis Schumacheris, kuris baigė karjerą 2006 m. ir yra septynis kartus laimėjęs Formulės 1 čempionatą. Brazilas patyrė rimtą galvos traumą po avarijos per 2009 m. Vengrijos „Grand Prix“. Massa nedalyvaus mažiausiai iki 2009 m. sezono pabaigos.
mt: Felipe Massa was scheduled to replace Michael Schumacher, who retired in 2006 and is a seven-time Formula One champion. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury in a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa will not compete at least until the end of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Iki dabar AOL galėjo vystyti tiesioginių pranešimų rinką savo tempu dėl didelio paplitimo Jungtinėse Valstijose. Dėl šio susitarimo šios laisvės gali nebelikti. „Yahoo!“ ir „Microsoft“ paslaugų vartotojų skaičius kartu sudėjus lygus „AOL“ klientų skaičiui.
mt: AOL could develop its own instant messaging network at its own pace because of its popularity in the United States. This agreement may not allow that. The number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft services together equals the number of AOL clients.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Dėl sprogusio sprogmens po automobiliu šalia policijos būstinės žuvo du policijos pareigūnai ir sužeista daugiau nei dvidešimt kitų asmenų. Valdytojo biuras nurodė, kad devyniolika iš sužeistųjų buvo policijos pareigūnai. Policija nurodė įtarianti, kad už ataką atsakingas „Daesh“ (ISIL) aktyvistas.
mt: 2 police officers were killed and more than 20 others were injured when a bomb exploded near a police station. The governor's office said 19 of the injured were police officers. Police said they were investigating a suspected ISIL activist.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Antradienį buvęs Masačusetso gubernatorius Mittas Romney'is laimėjo Floridos respublikonų partijos preliminarinius prezidento rinkimus, surinkęs daugiau kaip 46 proc. balsų. Antras su 32 proc. liko buvęs JAV Atstovų rūmų pirmininkas Newtas Gingrichas. Kadangi Floridoje taikoma balsų persvaros sistema, visų jos penkiasdešimties delegatų balsai atiteko Romniui ir leido jam tapti respublikonų partijos nominanto rinkimų lyderiu.
mt: On Tuesday, former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party's presidential primary, garnering more than 46 percent of the vote. The second place finisher with 32 percent was former U.S. House Speaker Newt Gingrich. Because Florida uses a winner-take-all system, all 50 of its delegates will go to Romney, making him the Republican Party's presumptive nominee.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: Buvęs JAV Atstovų Rūmų pirmininkas Newtas Gingrichas, Teksaso gubernatorius Rickas Perry ir kongreso atstovė Michele Bachmann užėmė atitinkamai ketvirtą, penktą ir šeštą vietas. Paskelbus rezultatus, Gingrichas gyrė Santorumą, tačiau išsakė griežtų žodžių Romney'iui, kurio vardu Ajovoje prieš Gingrichą buvo transliuojamos neigiamos kampanijos reklamos. Peris pareiškė, kad jis: „grįš į Teksasą įvertinti šio vakaro susitikimo su frakcija rezultatus, nuspręsti, ar yra jam yra šansų lenktyniauti šiose lenktynėse“, – bet vėliau pareiškė, kad jis ir toliau lenktyniaus ir konkuruos sausio 21 d. Pietų Karolinos pirminiuose rinkimuose. Bachmann, rugpjūtį laimėjusi neoficialų balsavimą „Ames Straw Poll“, nutarė nutraukti kampaniją.
mt: 2012 Republican presidential candidate Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann took fourth, fifth and sixth place respectively. After announcing the results, Gingrich praised Santorum, but expressed harsh words to Romney, whose name was being used in negative campaign ads against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry said he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus and decide if he has a chance to compete in these caucuses", but later said he would continue to compete and would run in the South Carolina primary on January 21. Bachmann, who won the unofficial Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: Stoties interneto svetainėje laida apibūdinama kaip „senamadiškas radijo teatras, kuriam būdingi naujoviški, šokiruojantys ir moksliukiški siužeto vingiai!“ Iš pradžių ši laida buvo transliuojama tik ilgą laiką veikiančioje interneto radijo svetainėje „TogiNet Radio“, kur daugiausia dėmesio buvo skiriama pokalbiams radijuje. 2015 m. pabaigoje „TogiNet“ kaip pagalbinę stotį įkūrė „AstroNet“ radiją. Iš pradžių laidoje dalyvavo aktoriai įgarsintojai mėgėjai iš rytinio Teksaso.
mt: The station's website describes it as "a retro radio drama, with a twist! The show features a unique, shocking, and science fiction-y plot!" Originally, the show was broadcast only on the internet radio station "TogiNet Radio", which was active for a long time. In late 2015, "TogiNet" created "AstroNet" as a secondary station. Initially, the show featured actors and voice actors from East Texas.
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."
