src: „Turime 4 mėnesių amžiaus peles, kurios sirgo diabetu, o dabar neserga“, – pridūrė jis. Halifakse (Naujoji Škotija) įsikūrusio Dalhauzio universiteto medicinos profesorius ir Kanados diabeto asociacijos mokslinio padalinio vadovas dr. Ehudas Uras įspėjo, kad moksliniai tyrimai dar tik prasideda. Kaip ir kai kurie kiti ekspertai, jis skeptiškai vertina galimybę išgydyti diabetą ir atkreipia dėmesį, kad šie duomenys netaikomi sergantiesiems 1 tipo diabetu.
mt: “We have four-month-old puppies that were diabetic and now are not,” he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, and chairman of the scientific section of the Canadian Diabetes Association, cautioned that research is just beginning. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about the possibility of curing diabetes and points out that these data are not applicable to people with type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: „Twin Otter“ vakar bandė nusileisti Kokodoje kaip „Airlines PNG“ skrydis CG4684, tačiau jau kartą tokį bandymą nutraukė. Maždaug dešimt minučių prieš tai, kai turėjo nusileisti antruoju bandymu, jis dingo. Avarijos vieta buvo surasta šiandien ir ji taip sunkiai pasiekiama, kad du policininkai buvo išleisti džiunglėse, jog pėsčiomis pasiektų vietą ir paieškotų likusių gyvųjų. Paieškas sutrukdė tas pats blogas oras, kaip ir tas, kuris privertė leistis avariniu būdu.
mt: A Twin Otter attempted to land at Kokoda yesterday as PNG Airlines flight CG4684, but aborted the landing attempt for the second time. Ten minutes before it was due to land for the second attempt, it disappeared. The crash site was found today and is so remote that two police officers were sent into the jungle to walk to the site and search for survivors. The search was hampered by the same bad weather that forced the emergency landing.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: „Laimei, man nieko nenutiko, bet išvydau baisų vaizdą, kai žmonės bandė išdaužti langus, kad galėtų ištrūkti. Žmonės daužė stiklą kėdėmis, bet langai nedužo. Vienas iš stiklų pagaliau sudužo ir jie pradėjo lipti pro langą“, – pasakojo išlikęs gyvas Franciszek Kowal.
mt: "I'm glad I'm okay, but I saw a terrible sight, when people were trying to break the windows to get out. People were breaking the glass with their chairs, but the windows didn't break. One of the windows finally broke and they started climbing out the window," said survivor Franciszek Kowal.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: Tropinė audra „Danielle“, ketvirtoji 2010 m. Atlanto vandenyno uraganų sezono audra, susiformavo Atlanto vandenyno rytuose. Audros, esančios maždaug 3 000 mylių atstumu nuo Majamio (Florida), vėjo greitis siekia 40 myl./h (64 km/h). Nacionalinio uraganų centro mokslininkai prognozuoja, kad trečiadienį „Danielle“ sustiprės iki uragano lygio. Kadangi audra toli nuo sausumos, vis dar sunku įvertinti jos galimą poveikį Jungtinėms Valstijoms arba Karibams.
mt: Tropical Storm Danielle, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, formed in the Atlantic Ocean east of the Lesser Antilles. The storm was about 3,000 miles (4,800 km) east of Miami, Florida, and had winds of 40 mph (64 km/h). National Hurricane Center scientists forecast Danielle to strengthen into a hurricane on Tuesday. Because the storm was far from land, it was too early to assess its potential impact on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Dr. Lee taip pat išreiškė susirūpinimą dėl pranešimų, kad vaikai Turkijoje dabar užsikrečia A (H5N1) paukščių gripo virusu, tačiau nesuserga. Jis pažymėjo, kad iš kai kurių tyrimų matyti, jog liga turi tapti mažiau mirtina, kad galėtų sukelti pasaulinę epidemiją. Baiminamasi, kad ligoniai, kuriems pasireiškia silpni gripo simptomai, gali toliau gyventi įprastą gyvenimą ir taip užkrėsti daugiau žmonių.
mt: Dr. Lee also expressed concern over reports that children in Turkey are now infected with the A (H5N1) avian flu virus, but are not sick. He noted that from some studies it is seen that the disease is becoming less fatal, and could cause a global epidemic. We fear that patients who show mild flu symptoms can continue to live a normal life and thus infect more people.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Rugpjūčio 9 d. naktį taifūno „Morakot“ centras buvo maždaug septyniasdešimt kilometrų nuo Kinijos Fudziano provincijos. Apskaičiuota, kad taifūnas juda Kinijos link vienuolikos km/h greičiu.
mt: 9 August night, the center of typhoon Morakot was about seventy miles from the Fujian province of China. It is estimated that the typhoon moves towards China at a speed of twelve km/h.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: JAV Prezidentas Džordžas V. Bušas atvyko į Singapūrą lapkričio 16 d. rytą, taip pradėdamas savaitę truksiantį turą po Aziją. Jį pasitiko Singapūro ministro pirmininko pavaduotojas Wong Kan Seng, o prekybos ir terorizmo problemas jis aptarė su Singapūro ministru pirmininku Lee Hsien Loong. Po pralaimėjimų savaitės kadencijos vidurio rinkimuose Bušas papasakojo publikai apie prekybos Azijoje plėtrą.
mt: 16 November 2004, US President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore in the morning, thus beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng, and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the mid-term elections, Bush told the public about the growth of trade in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Šiandieniniame pranešime vyriausybė papildė šių metų kovą duotą įsipareigojimą finansuoti papildomus vagonus. Pridėjus dar 300 vagonų, iš viso jų įsigyta 1 300, kad būtų galima sumažinti perpildymo problemą.
mt: In today's statement, the government added to its commitment to finance additional wagons made last month. Adding another 300 wagons, a total of 1,300 wagons have been purchased to reduce the overloading problem.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: Ji pasakė: „Nėra jokios žvalgybos informacijos, leidžiančios manyti, kad netrukus įvyks išpuolis. Tačiau grėsmės lygio sumažinimas nereiškia, kad pavojus dingo iš esmės“.
mt: She said: "There is no intelligence to suggest an imminent attack. But the reduction in threat level does not mean the threat has gone away."
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Martelly'is vakar prisiekė iš devynių narių sudarytoje laikinojoje rinkimų taryboje (CEP). Martelis su Laikinąja rinkimų taryba susitinka penktą kartą per ketverius metus. Praėjusį mėnesį prezidento komisija rekomendavo ankstesnės Laikinosios rinkimų tarybos atsistatydinimą kaip priemonių paketo, skirto šaliai pereiti prie naujų rinkimų, dalį. Komisija buvo Martelly reakcija į išplitusius protestus prieš režimą, prasidėjusius spalio mėnesį. Nesurengus rinkimų, kai kurių net nuo 2011 metų, kilo protestai su smurto protrūkiais.
mt: Martelly took the oath before the nine-member interim electoral council (CEP) yesterday. Martelly has met with the interim electoral council five times in the past four years. Last month, the president's commission recommended the resignation of the previous interim electoral council as part of a package of measures to move the country to new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to the widespread protests against the regime that began in October. Without elections, some of which have been held since 2011, protests with violent outbreaks have occurred.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: „USA Gymnastics“ pritaria JAV olimpinio komiteto laiškui ir sutinka, kad olimpinei šeimai yra būtina skatinti saugią aplinką visiems sportininkams. Sutinkame su Jungtinių Valstijų olimpinio ir paralimpinio komiteto (USOC) teiginiu, kad mūsų sportininkų ir klubų interesų ir jų sporto labui padėtų reikšmingi pokyčiai mūsų organizacijoje, o ne organizacijos panaikinimas. „USA Gymnastics“ remia nepriklausomą tyrimą, kuris gali atskleisti, kaip tokio masto išnaudojimas, apie kurį drąsiai papasakojo Larry'o Nassaro aukos, galėjo tokį ilgą laiką likti nepastebėtas, ir yra pasirengusi taikyti būtinus ir tinkamus pakeitimus. „USA Gymnastics bei Jungtinių Valstijų olimpinis ir parolimpinis komitetas turi tą patį tikslą – padaryti gimnastiką ir kitas sporto šakas kuo saugesnes, kad atletai galėtų siekti savo svajonių saugioje, pozityvioje ir įgalinančioje aplinkoje.
mt: "USA Gymnastics" agrees with the letter from the U.S. Olympic Committee and agrees that it is important to encourage a safe environment for all athletes. We agree with the United States Olympic and Paralympic Committee's statement that significant changes in our organization, not the dissolution of our organization, would be in the best interests of our athletes and clubs and their sport. "USA Gymnastics" supports an independent investigation that can reveal how such abuse, as bravely recounted by Larry Nassar's victims, could have gone undetected for so long, and we are prepared to implement necessary and appropriate changes. "USA Gymnastics and the United States Olympic and Paralympic Committee have the same goal – to make gymnastics and other sports safer so athletes can pursue their dreams in a safe, positive, and enabling environment."
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: JAV karinis jūrų laivynas taip pat teigė tiriantis incidentą. Taip pat pranešime jie teigia: „Įgula šiuo metu stengiasi rasti geriausią būdą, kaip saugiai ištraukti laivą“. „Avenger“ klasės priešmininis laivas, kuris yra pakeliui į Puerto Prinsesą, esančią Palavane. Jis priklauso JAV karinio jūrų laivyno septintajai flotilei ir yra Sasebe, Nagasakyje, Japonijoje.
mt: The U.S. Navy also said it was investigating the incident. It also said in the statement: "The crew is currently working to find the best way to safely remove the aircraft." The Avenger-class escort ship, which is en route to Puerto Princesa, Palawan. It belongs to the Seventh Fleet of the U.S. Navy and is based in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan.
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Šeštadienio vakarą Jungtinių Valstijų prezidentas Donaldas Trumpas per atstovą spaudai perduotame pareiškime pranešė, kad JAV kariai paliks Siriją. Šis pranešimas buvo paskelbtas po to, kai Trampas telefonu pasikalbėjo su Turkijos prezidentu Redžepu Tajipu Erdoanu. Turkija taip pat priimtų saugoti suimtus ISIS kovotojus, kuriuos, pasak pranešimo, Europos valstybės atsisakė repatrijuoti.
mt: On Friday evening, United States President Donald Trump announced through a spokesperson that US troops would leave Syria. This announcement was made after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan. Turkey would also take custody of ISIS fighters, which, according to the statement, European states refused to repatriate.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Į tą vietovę išsiųsta koalicijos ir afganų karių, kad užtikrintų saugumą, į pagalbą išsiųstas kitas koalicijos orlaivis. Avarija įvyko aukštai, kalnuotoje vietovėje; manoma, kad ją sukėlė šaudę priešai. Avarijos vietos paieškos darbams trukdo blogos oro sąlygos ir atšiauri vietovė.
mt: A coalition and Afghan troops were sent to the area to secure the site, and another coalition aircraft was sent to assist. The crash occurred in a mountainous area, and it is believed that it was caused by enemy fire. Bad weather and harsh terrain were hampering the search for the crash site.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: 1963 m. pastačius užtvanką buvo sustabdyti sezoniniai potvyniai, paskleidžiantys nuosėdas visoje upėje. Nuosėdos buvo reikalingos smėlio seklumoms ir paplūdimiams, tapusiems laukinės gamtos buveine, susidaryti. Todėl dvi žuvų rūšys išnyko, o dar dviem kitoms, įskaitant kuprotąją gilą, iškilo išnykimo pavojus. Nors po potvynio vandens lygis kils tik už kelių pėdų, pareigūnai tikisi, kad užteks pasroviui atstatytų smėlio juostų.
mt: 1963 saw the construction of a dam to stop seasonal flooding, which spread silt throughout the river. The silt was needed to create sandbars and beaches, which became a haven for wildlife. As a result, two species of fish went extinct, and two others were threatened with extinction. Although the water level rises only a few feet after the flood, officials hope that the sandbars will be enough to restore the beach.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: Nairobyje (Kenija) įsikūrusi Jungtinių Valstijų ambasada įspėjo, kad „ekstremistai iš Somalio“ planuoja pradėti savižudžių sprogdinimus Kenijoje bei Etiopijoje. JAV teigia, kad gavo informacijos iš neatskleidžiamo šaltinio, kurioje nurodoma, kad savižudžiai sprogdintojai susprogdins „žymius objektus“ Etiopijoje ir Kenijoje.
mt: The United States embassy in Nairobi (Kenya) warned that "Somali extremists" plan to start suicide bombings in Kenya and Ethiopia. The US says it received information from an undisclosed source that suicide bombers will "target prominent sites" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: Nairobyje (Kenija) įsikūrusi Jungtinių Valstijų ambasada įspėjo, kad „ekstremistai iš Somalio“ planuoja pradėti savižudžių sprogdinimus Kenijoje bei Etiopijoje. JAV teigia, kad gavo informacijos iš neatskleidžiamo šaltinio, kurioje nurodoma, kad savižudžiai sprogdintojai susprogdins „žymius objektus“ Etiopijoje ir Kenijoje.
mt: The United States embassy in Nairobi (Kenya) warned that "Somali extremists" plan to start suicide bombings in Kenya and Ethiopia. The US says it received information from an undisclosed source that suicide bombers will "target prominent sites" in Ethiopia and Kenya.
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: Garsūs Graikijos advokatai Sakis Kechagioglou ir George Nikolakopoulos buvo uždaryti Atėnų kalėjime „Korydallos“, pripažinus juos kaltais dėl kyšininkavimo ir korupcijos. Dėl to kilo didelis skandalas Graikijos teisinėje bendruomenėje – buvo atskleisti neteisėti veiksmai, kuriuos ankstesniais metais atliko teisėjai, advokatai ir teisininkai. Prieš kelias savaites, kai informaciją populiarioje „Alpha TV“ televizijos laidoje „Zoungla“ paskelbė žurnalistas Makis Triantafylopoulos, parlamento narys ir teisininkas, Petros Mantouvalos buvo atstatydintas, nes jo biuro nariai buvo susiję su papirkinėjimu ir korupcija. Be to, aukščiausias teisėjas Evangelosas Kalousis buvo įkalintas, pripažinus jį kaltu dėl korupcijos ir nemoralaus elgesio.
mt: Famous Greek lawyers Saki Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos were imprisoned in Athens' Korydallos prison, after being found guilty of bribery and corruption. This caused a major scandal in the Greek legal community – it was revealed that judges, lawyers and legal officials had been involved in illegal activities in previous years. A few weeks ago, when journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos revealed the information in the popular Alpha TV show "Zoungla", parliament member and lawyer Petros Mantouvalos was dismissed, as his office was linked to bribery and corruption. In addition, the highest judge Evangelos Kalousis was imprisoned, after being found guilty of corruption and immoral behavior.
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthappa surinko daugiausiai iningų taškų per 70 metimų tik su 41 kamuoliukais, pataikydamas 11 po keturis ir 2 po šešis. Viduriniosios kategorijos mušėjams Sachinui Tendulkarui ir Rahului Dravidui sekėsi gerai ir kartu jie atliko šimtą bėgimų. Tačiau pralaimėjusi kapitono vartus Indija laimėjo tik 36 taškus, pralaimėjo 7 vartus ir baigė kėlinį.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the most runs in 70 balls with 41 fours, hitting 11 of them for six and 2 for four.  Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid did well in the middle order and both completed 100 runs.  But India lost 7 wickets and ended the innings with 36 runs.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Praėjusį mėnesį, kalbėdamas su „Wikinews“, bendrųjų reikalų administratorius Adamas Cuerdenas išreiškė nepasitenkinimą dėl pašalinimo. „Jis [Velsas] tiesiog mums melavo nuo pat pradžių. Pirma, apsimesdamas, kad tai buvo daroma dėl teisėtų priežasčių. Antra, apsimesdamas, kad klausė mūsų iki pat savo meno panaikinimo.“ Kilus bendruomenės pykčiui sukurta strategija dėl svetainės, kurioje laikoma milijonai laikmenų su atviro naudojimo licencija, seksualinio turinio.
mt: Last month, speaking to Wikinews, Adam Cuerden, a member of the Wikimedia Foundation's Board of Trustees, expressed his dissatisfaction with the removal. "He [Wales] has been lying to us from the beginning. First, pretending that it was being done for legitimate reasons. Second, pretending that he was asking our opinion before his resignation." A strategy was created in response to the community's anger with the site, which is home to millions of pages with an open use license, sexual content.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: Ne visi palaikė moterų reitingų įtraukimą. 2004 m. Olimpinio sidabro medalio laureatas Amiras Kanas teigė: „Giliai širdyje manau, kad moterys neturėtų kovoti. Tokia mano nuomonė“. Nors buvo pareiškęs tokių komentarų, jis teigė remsiantis Didžiosios Britanijos sportininkus 2012 m. olimpinėse žaidynėse, kurios bus surengtos Londone.
mt: 2004 Olympic silver medalist Amr Kanawal did not support the inclusion of women's ratings. He said, "Deep in my heart, I believe women should not compete. Such is my opinion." Despite making such comments, he said he supported the British athletes at the 2012 Olympics, which will be held in London.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peteris Lenzas, 13 m. motociklininkas, mirė po avarijos Indianapolio trasoje. Važiuodamas apšilimo ratą, Lenzas nukrito nuo motociklo ir į jį atsitrenkė kitas lenktynininkas Xavieras Zayatas. „Dieną jie yra vėsesni už aplinkinius paviršius, o naktį - šiltesni. Avarijos metu Zajatas traumų nepatyrė.
mt: 13-year-old Peter Lenz died after a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While riding a pace lap, Lenz fell off his motorcycle and was hit by another racer, Xavier Zayat. "During the day they are cooler than the surrounding surfaces, and at night - warmer. In the crash Zayat was uninjured.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Skrydis lėktuvu gali būti gąsdinančia patirtimi visų amžiaus ir socialinių grupių žmonėms, ypač jeigu anksčiau jiems neteko skristi arba teko išgyventi traumuojantį įvykį. To nereikėtų gėdytis, ši baimė niekuo nesiskiria nuo žmonių patiriamų kitų baimių ir antipatijų. Kai kuriems žmonės žinojimas, kaip veikia orlaivis ir kas vyksta skrydžio metu, gali padėti įveikti baimę, kurios pagrindas yra nežinomybė ar negebėjimas valdyti situacijos.
mt: A flight in an aircraft can be a frightening experience for people of all ages and social groups, especially if they have previously lost the ability to fly or have experienced a traumatic event. This fear should not be taken lightly, this fear is no different from the fears and antipathies people experience. Some people know how an aircraft works and what happens during a flight, this can help overcome the fear, whose basis is ignorance or inability to control the situation.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Šiais laikais kelionės lėktuvu retai užsakomos tiesiai iš skrydžių bendrovės – pirmiausia ieškoma kainų ir jos lyginamos. Kartais to paties skrydžio kaina skirtinguose paieškos sistemose gali smarkiai skirtis, todėl verta palyginti paieškos rezultatus, o prieš perkant bilietą dar žvilgterėti į pačių avialinijų svetainę.
mt: Today, a direct flight from an airline is rarely booked – first, prices are sought and compared. Sometimes the price of the same flight can vary greatly on different search engines, so it is worth comparing the search results, and before buying a ticket, take a look at the airline's website.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Siuntų pristatymo įmonėms gerai mokama už greitą pristatymą. Dažnai laikas yra itin svarbus pristatant verslo dokumentus, prekes ar atsargines dalis skubaus remonto atveju. Kai kuriems maršrutams didesnės bendrovės turi savo lėktuvus, tačiau dėl kitų maršrutų ir mažesnėms įmonėms iškilo problema. Siunčiant prekes oro transportu, kai kuriuose maršrutuose iškrovimas ir muitinis įforminimas užtrukdavo ne vieną dieną. Vienintelis greitesnis būdas buvo siųsti siuntinį kaip registruotą bagažą. Oro linijų bendrovių taisyklės neleis siųsti bagažo be keleivio, štai kur prasideda jūsų vaidmuo.
mt: Shipping companies are well paid for fast delivery. Often time is very important when delivering business documents, goods or spare parts in an emergency repair. Some routes have their own aircraft, but for other routes and smaller companies, the problem arose. When shipping goods by air, customs clearance and loading took more than one day in some routes. The only faster way was to send a shipment as registered luggage. Airlines' rules do not allow you to send luggage without a passenger, that's where your role begins.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Turėtumėte atidžiai rinktis dažnai skraidančių keleivių programą siūlančią oro linijų bendrovę, priklausančią oro linijų aljansui. Nors galite manyti, kad palankiau prisijungti prie tų oro linijų, kuriomis skrendate dažniausiai, turėtumėte žinoti, kad siūlomos privilegijos dažnai skiriasi, o, pasirinkus kitas tos pačios bendrovės oro linijas, gali būti skiriama daugiau skridimo taškų.
mt: You should carefully choose an airline that offers frequent flyer programs, belonging to an airline alliance. While you may think it is better to join the airlines you fly with most often, you should know that the offered privileges often differ, and, by choosing other airlines of the same alliance, you may be offered more flight destinations.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Gerkite alkoholinius gėrimus saikingai. Alkoholis kiekvieną veikia skirtingai, ir žinoti savo ribą yra labai svarbu. Galimas ilgalaikis nesaikingo alkoholio vartojimo poveikis sveikatai gali apimti kepenų pažeidimą ir net apakimą bei mirtį. Potencialus pavojus didėja vartojant nelegaliai pagamintą alkoholį. Nelegalaus alkoholio sudėtyje gali būti pavojingų priemaišų, įskaitant metanolį, nuo kurio galima apakti ar mirti, pavartojus net mažas dozes.
mt: Drink responsibly. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limits is important. The long-term effects of excessive alcohol consumption can include liver damage and even death. The risk increases when drinking illegally produced alcohol. Illegal alcohol may contain dangerous additives, including methanol, which can cause blindness or death, even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Kanalų rajonas (olandų: Grachtengordel) yra garsus XVII a. rajonas, išsidėstęs aplink Amsterdamo Binnenstadą. Dėl unikalios kultūrinės ir istorinės vertės visas rajonas yra pripažintas UNESCO Pasaulio paveldo objektu, o jame esančio nekilnojamojo turto vertės yra vienos didžiausių šalyje.
mt: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is a famous 17th-century district, located around the Amsterdam Binnenstad. Due to its unique cultural and historical value, the entire district is recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site, and the value of the real estate within it is one of the largest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Kromo kalva, 12 km į pietvakarius nuo Siem Reapo. Ši ant kalvos esanti šventykla buvo pastatyta 9-ojo amžiaus pabaigoje, valdant karaliui Jasovarmanui. Dėl niūrios šventyklos atmosferos ir Tonlesapo ežero vaizdo verta kopti į kalvą. Šį apsilankymą patogu suderinti su pasiplaukiojimu laivu po ežerą. Norint įeiti į šventyklą, reikalingas bilietas „Angkor Pass“, todėl vykdami į Tonle Sapą nepamirškite paso.
mt: 12 km south-west of Siem Reap. This temple on the hill was built at the end of the 9th century, under King Yasovarman. The temple's atmosphere and the view of Tonle Sap lake make it worth climbing the hill. This visit can be combined with a boat trip on the lake. To enter the temple, you need a "Angkor Pass", so don't forget to buy it when visiting Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Kromo kalva, 12 km į pietvakarius nuo Siem Reapo. Ši ant kalvos esanti šventykla buvo pastatyta 9-ojo amžiaus pabaigoje, valdant karaliui Jasovarmanui. Dėl niūrios šventyklos atmosferos ir Tonlesapo ežero vaizdo verta kopti į kalvą. Šį apsilankymą patogu suderinti su pasiplaukiojimu laivu po ežerą. Norint įeiti į šventyklą, reikalingas bilietas „Angkor Pass“, todėl vykdami į Tonle Sapą nepamirškite paso.
mt: 12 km south-west of Siem Reap. This temple on the hill was built at the end of the 9th century, under King Yasovarman. The temple's atmosphere and the view of Tonle Sap lake make it worth climbing the hill. This visit can be combined with a boat trip on the lake. To enter the temple, you need a "Angkor Pass", so don't forget to buy it when visiting Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antarktida – šalčiausia vieta Žemėje, plytinti aplink Pietų ašigalį. Turistinės iškylos kainuoja brangiai, reikalauja fizinio pasirengimo ir gali vykti tik vasaros metu lapkritį–vasarį ir tik pusiasalyje, salose ir Roso jūroje. Vasarą daugiausia tose vietose maždaug penkiasdešimtyje bazių čia gyvena pora tūkstančių darbuotojų; žiemą jų lieka nedaug. Antarktidos krašto giluma yra negyvenama plynaukštė, padengta 2–3 km ledo. Kartais specialistai skrenda į žemyno gilumą norėdami palaipioti po kalnus arba pasiekti Pietų polių, kur yra didelė bazė.
mt: Antartica is the coldest place on Earth, surrounding the South Pole. Tourist bases are expensive, require physical fitness, and can only be visited in the summer months of November to March, and only in the peninsula, islands, and Ross Sea. In the summer, there are about 50 bases with a few thousand workers; in the winter, there are few. The continental shelf is a barren plateau, covered by 2–3 km of ice. Sometimes specialists fly to the continental shelf to drill through the mountains or reach the South Pole, where there is a large base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Senosios observatorijos šiais laikais paprastai nebenaudojamos ir yra tapusios muziejais ar mokymo vietomis. Kadangi šviesos tarša jų suklestėjimo metu nebuvo tokia problema, kokia yra šiandien, jos dažniausiai yra miestuose ar universitetų miesteliuose, ir jas lengviau pasiekti nei tas, kurios pastatytos moderniais laikais. Dauguma šiuolaikinių moksliniams tyrimams naudojamų teleskopų yra milžiniški įrenginiai, įrengti atokiose vietovėse, kuriose vyrauja palankios atmosferos sąlygos.
mt: Old observatories are now usually unused and have become museums or educational sites. Because light pollution was not as much of a problem when they were built, they are usually located in cities or university towns, and are easier to access than those built in modern times. Most modern telescopes used for scientific research are huge instruments, located in remote areas with good atmospheric conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Dėl to, kad Oklandas apima du uostus, jame yra daug paplūdimių. Populiariausi plyti trijose srityse. North Shore paplūdimiai (North Harbour rajone) yra prie Ramiojo vandenyno ir driekiasi nuo Long Bay šiaurėje iki Devonporto pietuose. Beveik visi jie yra smėlio paplūdimiai, kuriuose saugu maudytis, ir daugelyje jų galima rasti pavėsį po išlaikiosiomis mirutėmis. Tamaki Drive paplūdimiai yra Vaitematos įlankoje, prestižiniuose Mission Bay ir St Heliers priemiesčiuose Oklando centre. Kartais tai būna sausakimši šeimos paplūdimiai su daugybe pakrantėje įsikūrusių parduotuvių. Maudytis yra saugu.
mt: Because Auckland has two airports, there are many beaches. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. Almost all of them are sand beaches, where it is safe to swim, and many of them have a tide pool after the low tide. Tamaki Drive beaches are in Waitemata Harbour, in the prestigious Mission Bay and St Heliers suburbs of central Auckland. Sometimes this is a family safe swimming beach with many shops on the waterfront. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Atsiminkite, kad lankotės masinėse kapavietėse, vietoje kuri turi neapsakomai didelę reikšmę didelei pasaulio gyventojų daliai. Vis dar yra daug gyvų vyrų ir moterų, išgyvenusių šį laikotarpį, ir dar daugiau tų, kurių artimieji čia buvo nužudyti ar nualinti iki mirties, tiek žydai, tiek kitų tautų žmonės. Šioje vietoje būkite orūs, rimti ir rodykite pagarbą, kurios ji nusipelno. Nejuokaukite apie holokaustą arba nacius. Nedarkykite aplinkos ant pastatų tepliodami grafiti.
mt: Remember that you are in a mass grave, not a tourist attraction, which has great significance to a large portion of the world's population. There are still many living men and women who survived this period, and many more whose relatives were killed or maimed to death, both Jews and people of other nations. Be respectful, be serious, and show the respect that it deserves. Do not joke about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the environment by lighting fires on the buildings.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Pagalbinės kalbos yra dirbtinės arba sudarytos kalbos, sukurtos siekiant palengvinti bendravimą tarp žmonių, kuriems kitaip būtų sunku bendrauti. Tai ne lingua franca – šiuo terminu vadinamos natūralios, tikros kalbos, dėl įvairių priežasčių tapusios pagrindinėmis kalbomis, kuriomis susikalba skirtingomis kalbomis kalbantys žmonės.
mt: Auxiliary languages are constructed or engineered languages created to facilitate communication between people who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are not lingua francas – a term used to describe natural, true languages, for various reasons, become the main languages, with which people speaking different languages communicate.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Jei Baltijos jūros šiaurinėje dalyje plaukiate žiemą, pasidomėkite kajutės vieta, nes plaukiant per ledą galimas didelis triukšmas. Į kruizą po Sankt Peterburgą įeina pasivaikščiojimai po senamiestį. Kruizo keleiviams nereikia įsigyti vizos (peržiūrėkite sąlygas).
mt: If you are sailing in the northern part of the Baltic Sea in winter, pay attention to the location of your cabin, as sailing through ice is possible. Cruising to St. Petersburg includes walking tours of the old town. Cruisers do not need to obtain a visa (check the requirements).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Oficialios Barselonos kalbos – katalonų ir ispanų kalbos. Maždaug pusė gyventojų pirmenybę teikia katalonų kalbai, didžioji dalis gyventojų supranta šią kalbą, o ispanų kalbą moka faktiškai visi gyventojai. Tačiau daugelis ženklų yra katalonų kalba, nes pagal įstatymus ši kalba yra pirmoji oficiali kalba. Visgi, ispanų kalba plačiai vartojama viešajame transporte ir kitose vietose. Reguliarūs metro pranešimai skaitomi tik katalonų kalba, tačiau apie neplanuotus sustabdymus automatinė sistema praneša įvairiomis kalbomis: ispanų, anglų, prancūzų, arabų ir japonų.
mt: Official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About half of the population prefers Catalan, most of the population understands it, and everyone speaks Spanish. However, most signs are in Catalan, as it is the first official language by law. Spanish is widely used in public transportation and other places. Regular metro announcements are read in Catalan, but about unplanned stops, the automated system announces in several languages: Spanish, English, French, Arabic, and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Šiandien išsivysčiusiose šalyse ištaigingos nakvynės su pusryčiais teikimas išsivystė į tam tikrą meno formą. Mes nemanome, kad tai yra geras dalykas sunaikinti parduotuves, bet mes čia egzaminą visi kartu. Geriausios tokios vietos turės prabangiausią patalynę, galbūt rankomis siūtą antklodę arba senovinę lovą. Pusryčiams gali būti patiekiamos regiono sezoninės gerybės arba specialus šeimininko patiekalas. Tai gali būti istorinis senas pastatas su antikvariniais baldais, išpuoselėta teritorija ir baseinu.
mt: Today, in developed countries, the practice of providing breakfast with the room has evolved into a certain art form. We don't think it's a good thing to destroy stores, but we're here to test it together. The best places will have the most luxurious room, perhaps a hand-laid canopy or an antique bed. Breakfast can be served regional seasonal delicacies or a special host dish. This can be an historic old building with antique furniture, a landscaped area and a pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Kinijos Pekino mieste bus rengiamos 2022 m. žiemos olimpinės žaidynės, ir dėl to jis taps pirmuoju miestu, kuriame vyko tiek vasaros, tiek žiemos olimpinės žaidynės. Beidzinge vyks atidarymo bei uždarymo ceremonijos ir renginiai uždarose ledo arenose. Kiti slidinėjimo renginiai vyks Taizičengo slidinėjimo teritorijoje Zhangjiakou, apie 220 km (140 mylių) nuo Pekino.
mt: 2022 Winter Olympics will be held in Beijing, China, making it the first city to host both summer and winter Olympics. The opening and closing ceremonies and events will be held in the indoor arenas of Beidagang. Other skiing events will be held in the skiing area of Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Paukščių gripu gali užsikrėsti paukščiai ir žinduoliai. Užregistruota mažiau nei tūkstantis žmonių susirgimų atvejų, tačiau kai kurie iš jų baigėsi mirtimi. Dažniausiai tai susiję su žmonėmis, kurie dirba su naminiais paukščiais, tačiau tam tikras pavojus kyla ir paukščių stebėtojams.
mt: Birds can contract the virus from birds and mammals. Less than a thousand human cases have been reported, but some have ended in death. Most commonly this is associated with people who work with domestic birds, but some risk is also present for bird watchers.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Vikingai Rusijos teritorijos vandens keliais pasiekė Juodąją ir Kaspijos jūrą. Dalis šių maršrutų yra vis dar naudojami. Specialius leidimus gali būti sunku gauti, todėl patikrinkite, ar jų reikia. Baltosios ir Baltijos jūrų kanalas jungia Arkties vandenyną su Baltijos jūra per Onegos, Ladogos ežerus ir Sankt Peterburgą, daugiausia upėmis ir ežerais. Onegos ežeras taip pat jungiasi su Volga, todėl atplaukti iš Kaspijos jūros per Rusija vis dėlto įmanoma.
mt: Viking ships have reached the Black and Caspian seas through Russian waterways. Some of these routes are still in use. Special permits may be difficult to obtain, so check if they are needed. The White and Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean with the Baltic Sea through Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega also connects with Volga, so reaching from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Imigracijos patikros punktas įprastai yra pirmoji stotelė išlipus iš lėktuvo, laivo ar kitos transporto priemonės. Kai kuriuose tarptautiniuose traukiniuose patikros vyksta važiuojant, todėl lipant į vieną iš tokių traukinių reikėtų turėti galiojantį asmens tapatybės dokumentą. Traukiniuose su miegamaisiais vagonais pasus gali surinkti konduktorius, kad nepažadintų jūsų iš miego.
mt: Immigration checkpoints are usually the first stop after disembarking from a plane, ship or other transport. In some international trains, the checks are done while the train is moving, so you should have a valid ID document when boarding one of these trains. Conductors on trains with sleeping cars can wake you up if you haven't checked in.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: Paprastai Singapūre itin saugu, čia labai lengva orientuotis, o atvykus galima nusipirkti beveik bet ko. Tačiau, atsidūrę viršutinėje tropinėje juostoje, keletą laipsnių į šiaurę nuo pusiaujo, turėsite iškęsti tiek karštį (visada), tiek stiprią saulę (kai dangus neapniukęs, rečiau).
mt: Singapore is usually very safe, and it is easy to get around, and you can buy almost anything. However, being in the upper tropical belt, a few degrees north of the equator, you will have to endure both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is not overcast, rarely).
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Vokiečių kepiniai yra labai geri, o Bavarijoje jie yra gana sodraus skonio ir įvairūs, panašūs į pietinės kaimynės Austrijos. Įprasti vaisiniai pyragaičiai, kurie su obuolių įdaru kepami ištisus metus, o su vyšnių ir slyvų įdaru – vasarą. Daug vokiškų kepinių yra su migdolais, lazdyno riešutais ir kitokiais riešutais. Populiarūs pyragaičiai dažnai valgomi su stipria kava. Jei norite paragauti mažų, tačiau turtingo skonio pyragaičių, išbandykite kepinius, kurie skirtinguose regionuose vadinami Berliner, Pfannkuchen arba Krapfen.
mt: German pastries are very good, and Bavarian ones are quite sweet and varied, similar to the southern neighbor Austria. Traditional fruit-filled pastries are baked with pears all year round, and with cherries and plums in the summer. Many German pastries are filled with almonds, hazelnuts, and other nuts. Popular pastries are often eaten with strong coffee. If you want to get small, but rich in taste pastries, try the cakes that are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen in different regions.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Jei dėl būtinybės, gyvenimo būdo ar iššūkio pasaulį norite pamatyti pigiai, yra keli būdai, kaip tai padaryti. Iš esmės išskiriamos dvi kategorijos: dirbama keliaujant arba bandoma apriboti išlaidas. Šiame straipsnyje daugiausia dėmesio skiriama pastarajai kategorijai. Jei norėdami sumažinti išlaidas iki minimumo galite paaukoti komforto, laiko ir nuspėjamumo, pasidomėkite minimalaus biudžeto kelionėmis. Pateikiant šiuos patarimus, laikoma, kad keliautojai nevogs, nedarys pažeidimų, nedalyvaus nelegalioje rinkoje, neprašys išmaldos ir kitaip neišnaudos kitus žmones, siekdami naudos sau.
mt: If you want to see the world on a budget, there are a few ways to do it. Essentially, there are two categories: working while traveling or trying to limit expenses. This article focuses on the latter. If you want to minimize expenses to the bare minimum, you can sacrifice comfort, time, and spontaneity. When giving these tips, it is assumed that travelers will not beg, commit crimes, buy from the black market, ask for a bailout, and otherwise take advantage of others in order to benefit themselves.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Bafalo–Pitsbergo greitkelio atkarpoje tarp Point Mariono ir Fermonto vairavimo sąlygos pačios sudėtingiausios, nes čia kelias vingiuoja per miškingas vietoves. Jei nesate važiavę šalies keliais, būkite budrūs: vyrauja statūs nuolydžiai, siauros juostos ir staigūs posūkiai. Paskelbti greičio ribojimai yra smarkiai žemesni nei pateikti ankstesniuose ar tolesniuose skyriuose – įprastai 35–40 mph (56–64 km/h) – ir griežas jų laikymasis yra dar svarbesnis. Keista, bet mobilusis ryšis čia daug stipresnis negu kitose kelio atkarpose, pvz., „Pennsylvania Wilds“.
mt: The stretch of the Buffalo–Pittsburgh Turnpike between Point Marion and Farmington has the most challenging driving conditions, as the road winds through wooded areas. If you haven't driven in the state before, be cautious: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sudden curves are common. Posted speed limits are much lower than in previous or subsequent sections – typically 35–40 mph (56–64 km/h) – and strict adherence to them is even more important. Oddly, but mobile phone coverage is much stronger here than in other sections, such as "Pennsylvania Wilds".
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Kanjoningas – nusileidimas į kanjono dugną, kuris yra arba sausas, arba pilnas vandens. Leidimasis kalnų upe apima plaukimo, kopimo ir šokinėjimo elementus, tačiau tam nereikia daug mokytis arba turėti gerą fizinę formą (palyginti su kopimu į uolas, nardymu su akvalangu arba kalnų slidinėjimu).
mt: Whitewater – a descent into a riverbed, which may be either dry or full of water. Rafting down a mountain river includes elements of paddling, climbing and jumping, but does not require much training or good physical shape (compared to climbing a rock, swimming with a snorkel or mountain skiing).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: Ilga kelionė autostrada nuosavu automobiliu neabejotinai žavi savo paprastumu. Skirtingai nei su didesnėmis transporto priemonėmis, jūs tikriausiai jau esate susipažinę su savo automobilio valdymu ir žinote jo ribas. Pastačius palapinę privačioje teritorijoje arba bet kurio dydžio mieste galima sulaukti nepageidautino dėmesio. Trumpai tariant, nuosavu automobiliu keliauti patogu, bet su juo gana sudėtinga stovyklauti. Galima stovyklauti ir su automobiliu, jei turite didelį mikroautobusą, visureigį, sedaną arba universalą su atlenkiamomis sėdynėmis.
mt: A long road trip in your own car is undoubtedly attractive for its simplicity. Unlike with larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with the operation of your car and know its limits. Setting up camp on private land or in a small town can result in unwanted attention. To summarize, it is convenient to travel in your own car, but it is difficult to camp with it. It is possible to camp with a car, if you have a large minibus, a van, a sedan or a universal with foldable seats.
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Dabartinį Kasablankos miestą berberų žvejai įkūrė X a. pr. Kr., jį finikiečiai, romėnai ir merenidai naudojo kaip strateginį uostą, kuris buvo žinomas Anfos pavadinimu. Portugalai ją sunaikino ir atstatė pavadinę Kaza Branka, bet apleido po žemės drebėjimo 1755 m. Maroko sultonas atstatė miestą kaip Daru l-Badya, o Kasablankos pavadinimą jam suteikė Ispanijos pirkliai, įkūrę čia prekybos bazes. Kasablanka – viena neįdomiausių apsipirkimo vietų Maroke. Aplink senąją Mediną nesunku rasti vietų, kuriose prekiaujama tokiais tradiciniais marokietiškais gaminiais kaip tadžinai, keramika, odos gaminiai, kaljanai ir įvairiausi niekučiai, tačiau visa tai skirta turistams.
mt: The city of Casablanca was founded by Berber pirates in the 10th century BC, and was used as a strategic port by the Phoenicians, Romans and Merinids. The Portuguese destroyed and rebuilt it as Casa Branca, but abandoned it after the 1755 Lisbon earthquake. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya, and the name Casablanca was given to it by Spanish merchants who established trading posts there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting shopping destinations in Morocco. Around the old Medina it is easy to find places where traditional Moroccan goods such as tajines, ceramics, leather goods, carpets and assorted junk are sold, but all of this is for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Šiaurėje glūdi ranka pasiekiamas romantiškas ir įspūdingas Sintros miestas, kurį tarp užsieniečių išgarsino lordo Bairono nepaprasti pasakojimai apie jo didybę. 403 „Scotturb“ autobusas reguliariai vyksta į Sintrą, sustodamas prie Uolos kyšulio. Keliaudami į šiaurę, taip pat galite aplankyti didžiąją Fatimos Švč. Mergelės Marijos šventyklą, visame pasaulyje žinomą kaip Marijos apsireiškimų vietą.
mt: 403 "Scotturb" buses run regularly to Sintra, stopping at the Cape of the Rock. Travelling north, you can also visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima, known worldwide as the site of the apparitions of the Virgin Mary.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: 1994 m. etniškai armėniškas Azerbaidžano Kalnų Karabacho regionas pradėjo karą prieš azerius. Su Armėnijos parama įkurta nauja respublika. Vis dėlto nė viena valstybė, net pati Armėnija, oficialiai jos nepripažįsta. Diplomatiniai ginčai dėl regiono ir toliau gadina Armėnijos bei Azerbaidžano santykius.
mt: 1994: The predominantly ethnic Armenian region of Nagorno-Karabakh in Azerbaijan began a war against Azerbaijan. With Armenian support, a new republic was established. However, no state, not even Armenia, officially recognizes it. Diplomatic disputes over the region continue to strain Armenian and Azerbaijani relations.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Viena iš Šarlotės (Šiaurės Karolina) stipriųjų pusių yra tai, kad joje gausu kokybiškų galimybių šeimoms. Gyventojai iš kitų vietovių kaip pagrindinę persikėlimo čia priežastį dažnai nurodo palankumą šeimai, o lankytojams miestu dažnai lengva mėgautis su vaikais. Per pastaruosius 20 metų vaikams tinkamų galimybių Šarlotės gyvenamuosiuose kvartaluose labai padidėjo. Šarlotės šeimos paprastai nesinaudoja taksi, nors tam tikromis aplinkybėmis taksi paslaugų gali prireikti. Jei yra daugiau nei 2 keleiviai, taikomas papildomas mokestis, todėl šis variantas gali būti brangesnis, nei būtina.
mt: One of Charlotte's (North Carolina) strong points is that it has a lot of good family-friendly options. People from other places often cite family-friendliness as the main reason for moving there, and visitors to the city often enjoy themselves with children. Over the past 20 years, the number of family-friendly options in Charlotte's residential neighborhoods has increased significantly. Charlotte families usually don't use taxis, but taxi services may be needed in some cases. If there are more than two passengers, an additional fee is applied, so this option may be more expensive than necessary.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Viena iš Šarlotės (Šiaurės Karolina) stipriųjų pusių yra tai, kad joje gausu kokybiškų galimybių šeimoms. Gyventojai iš kitų vietovių kaip pagrindinę persikėlimo čia priežastį dažnai nurodo palankumą šeimai, o lankytojams miestu dažnai lengva mėgautis su vaikais. Per pastaruosius 20 metų vaikams tinkamų galimybių Šarlotės gyvenamuosiuose kvartaluose labai padidėjo. Šarlotės šeimos paprastai nesinaudoja taksi, nors tam tikromis aplinkybėmis taksi paslaugų gali prireikti. Jei yra daugiau nei 2 keleiviai, taikomas papildomas mokestis, todėl šis variantas gali būti brangesnis, nei būtina.

If there are more than two passengers, an additional fee is applied, so this option may be more expensive than necessary.

src: Prieš atvykstant ispanams 16 amžiuje, šiaurinę Čilę valdė inkai, o vietiniai araukanai (mapučiai) gyveno centrinėje ir pietinėje Čilėje. Mapučiai buvo viena iš paskutiniųjų nepriklausomų Amerikos vietinių tautų, kurių iki Čilės nepriklausomybės paskelbimo iki galo neasimiliavo ispaniškai kalbanti valdžia. Nors Čilė nepriklausomybę paskelbė 1810 m. (vykstant Napoleono karams, dėl kurių Ispanija keletą metų liko be veikiančios centrinės valdžios), lemiama pergalė prieš Ispaniją buvo pasiekta tik 1818 m.
mt: 16-year-old Spaniards arrived in northern Chile, ruled by the Incas, and the local Araucanians (Mapuches) lived in central and southern Chile. The Mapuches were one of the last independent American indigenous peoples, whose assimilation into the Spanish-speaking government was not complete until the declaration of Chilean independence in 1810 (during the Napoleonic Wars, during which Spain was without a functioning central government for several years). The decisive victory over Spain was not achieved until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre (tai reiškia „penkios žemės“) sudaro penki maži Italijos Ligurijos regione esantys pakrantės miesteliai: Riomadžorė, Manarola, Kornilija, Vernaca ir Monteroso. Jie yra įtraukti į UNESCO Pasaulio paveldo objektų sąrašą. Per amžius žmonės atsargiai statė terasas ant tvirto, stataus landšafto iki pat uolų, iš kurių atsiveria vaizdas į jūrą. Dalis to žavesio yra matomos korporacinės plėtros nebuvimas. Miestelius jungia takai, traukiniai ir laivai, o automobiliai negali jų pasiekti iš išorės.
mt: Cinque Terre (meaning "five lands") consists of five small villages in the Ligurian region of Italy: Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza, and Monterosso. They are listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Over the centuries people have carefully built terraces on the rugged landscape, up to the very edge of the cliffs, from which one can see the sea. Some of this charm is due to the lack of corporate development. The villages are connected by paths, trains, and boats, and cars cannot reach them from outside.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: Žiemą dažniausios nelaimingų atsitikimų priežastys yra slidūs keliai, šaligatviai ir ypač laiptai. Jums reikia bent jau avalynės su tinkamu padu. Vasariniai batai ant ledo ir sniego paprastai būna labai slidūs. Netinkami būna net ir kai kurie žieminiai batai. Šablonas turi būti pakankamai gilus – 5 mm (1/5 col.) ar gilesnis, o medžiaga – pakankamai minkšta šaltoms temperatūroms. Kai kuriuose batuose yra dygliai, taip pat yra dygliuota papildoma įranga, skirta slidžioms sąlygoms; ji tinka daugeliui batų, tik kulnams arba ir kulnams, ir padui. Kulnai turi būti žemi ir platūs. Keliuose ar takuose dažnai pribarstyta smėlio, žvyro ar druskos (kalcio chlorido) sukibimui pagerinti.
mt: Winter is the most common time for accidents, and the most common causes are icy roads, sidewalks, and especially stairs. You need at least a pair of boots with a suitable sole. Vasariniai batai ant ledo and snow are usually very slippery. Even some winter boots are not suitable. The tread should be deep enough – 5 mm (1/5 col.) or deeper, and the material should be soft enough for cold temperatures. Some boots have treads, and there is treaded extra equipment for icy conditions; it fits most boots, but only for the soles or both soles and the tread. The soles should be low and wide. Roads and paths are often salted with sand, gravel, or salt (calcium chloride) to improve traction.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: Kuko Salos yra salų šalis, esanti laisvojoje asociacijoje su Naująja Zelandija, ji yra Polinezijoje, pietinio Ramiojo vandenyno viduryje. Tai – salynas, kurį sudaro 15 salų, išsidėsčiusių 2,2 mln. km2 ploto vandenyno dalyje. Būdamos toje pačioje laiko zonoje kaip ir Havajai salos dažnai laikomos „apatiniais Havajais“. Nors ir mažesnės, jos primena kai kuriems vyresniems lankytojams Havajus prieš jiems tampant valstija, kai dar nebuvo visų didelių turistinių viešbučių ir kitos plėtros. Kuko salose nėra miestų, jas sudaro 15 skirtingų salų. Pagrindinės yra Rarotonga ir Aitutaki.
mt: Cook Islands is a country in free association with New Zealand, it is in Polynesia, in the southern Pacific Ocean. It is a group of 15 islands, spread out over 2,2 million km2 of ocean area. Often considered the "lower islands" of Hawaii, they are in the same time zone as Hawaii. Although smaller, they resemble older Hawaii before it became a state, when there were not yet all the large tourist hotels and other development. There are no cities in the Cook Islands, they are made up of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki.
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."

src: Leidimus reikia rezervuoti iš anksto. Reikia turėti leidimą nakvoti Sirenoje. Sirena yra vienintelė prižiūrėtojų stotis, kurioje yra ne tik stovyklavietė, bet ir miegamosios patalpos ir siūlomas karštas maistas. La Leona, San Pedrilas ir Los Patosas siūlo tik stovyklavietę be maitinimo paslaugų. Leidimus patekti į parką galima gauti tiesiog Puerto Chimeneso reindžerių stotyje, tačiau ten neprimamos banko kortelės. Parko tarnyba (MINAE) neišduoda parko leidimų anksčiau nei likus mėnesiui iki numatomo atvykimo. „CafeNet El Sol“ siūlo rezervavimo paslaugą, kainuojančią 30 JAV dolerių arba 10 JAV dolerių už vienos dienos bilietus; išsami informacija pateikiama jos puslapyje apie Korkovadą.
mt: Reservations are required in advance. You need a permit to camp in Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that has not only a campground but also sleeping quarters and hot food offered. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos only offer a campground without food service. Permits to enter the park can be obtained directly at Puerto Chimeneas ranger station, but credit cards are not accepted there. The park service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than a month before the intended arrival date. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service, costing 30 US dollars or 10 US dollars per day tickets; detailed information is available on its page about Corcovado.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Slidžių žygiai: ši veikla taip pat vadinama slidinėjimu atokesnėse vietovėse arba slidžių turizmu. Tai susiję, bet paprastai neapima Alpių stiliaus slidinėjimo ar alpinizmo, pastaruoju užsiiminėjama statesnėse teritorijose ir tam reikia kietesnių slidžių bei batų. Galvokite apie slidinėjimo maršrutą kaip apie panašų kelionės pėsčiomis maršrutą. Esant geroms sąlygoms galėsite įveikti šiek tiek didesnį atstumą, nei eidami pėsčiomis, tačiau tik labai retais atvejais pasieksite lygumų slidinėjimo, kai be sunkios kuprinės slidinėjama paruoštose trasose, greičius.
mt: Sliding events: This activity is also known as backcountry skiing or ski touring. It is related, but usually does not include Alpine-style skiing or mountaineering, which require stiffer skis and boots. Think of a ski route as a similar hiking route. You can cover a bit more distance than on foot, but only rarely will you achieve flatland skiing, when skiing downhill on prepared trails without a heavy snowboard.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.
