src: Jei žiemą lankysitės Arktyje ar Antarktyje, pamatysite poliarinę naktį, kada saulė nepakyla virš horizonto. Tai – gera proga pamatyti šiaurės pašvaistę, nes dangus bus tamsus praktiškai visą parą. Kadangi šios vietos yra retai apgyvendintos ir todėl čia dažniausiai nekyla šviesinės taršos problemos, galėsite grožėtis žvaigždėmis.
mt: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic in winter, you will see the polar night, when the sun does not rise above the horizon. This is a good opportunity to see the northern lights, as the sky will be dark for most of the day. Because these areas are sparsely populated, and therefore the light pollution problem is not usually a problem, you can enjoy the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: Atokiose vietose, kur nėra mobiliojo ryšio, vienintelis variantas gali būti palydovinis telefonas. Palydovinis telefonas paprastai neatstoja mobiliojo telefono, nes, norėdami paskambinti, turite būti lauke, kad niekas neužstotų palydovo. Šią paslaugą dažnai naudojama laivininkystėje, įskaitant pramoginius laivus, ir ekspedicijose, kai reikia perduoti duomenis ir balsą. Jūsų vietinis telekomunikacijų tiekėjas turėtų jums suteikti daugiau informacijos apie prisijungimą prie šios paslaugos.
mt: In remote areas where there is no mobile coverage, the only option may be a satellite phone. A satellite phone does not replace a mobile phone, as you need to be outdoors to make a call, so no one blocks the satellite. This service is often used in shipping, including cruise ships, and expeditions, when it is necessary to transmit data and voice. Your local telecommunications provider should provide you with more information on how to connect to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Moldovos sostinė yra Kišiniovas. Vietinė kalba – rumunų, bet plačiai vartojama ir rusų kalba. Moldova yra daugiatautė respublika, nukentėjusi nuo etninio konflikto. 1994 m. po šio konflikto rytų Moldovoje buvo įkurta savavališkai pasiskelbusi Padniestrės Respublika, turinti savo vyriausybę ir valiutą, bet nepripažįstama jokios JT valstybės narės. Nepaisant nesėkmingų politinių derybų, atkurti šių dviejų Moldovos dalių ekonominiai ryšiai. Stačiatikybė yra pagrindinė Moldovos religija.
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chișinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely spoken. Moldova is a multiethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, after this conflict in eastern Moldova, the self-proclaimed Pridnestrovian Moldavian Republic was established, having its own government and currency, but unrecognized by any UN member state. Despite unsuccessful political negotiations, the economic ties between these two parts of Moldova have been restored. Orthodoxy is the main religion of Moldova.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: Montevidėjas yra į pietus nuo pusiaujo, todėl ten vasara, kai Šiaurės pusrutulyje žiema ir atvirkščiai. Montevidėjui būdingas subtropikų klimatas; vasaros mėnesiais temperatūra dažnai viršija +30 °C. Žiema gali būti apgaulingai žvarbi: temperatūra retai būna neigiama, tačiau dėl vėjo ir drėgmės atrodo šalčiau nei rodo termometras. Nėra itin lietingų ir sausų sezonų: lietaus kiekis ištisus metus būna maždaug vienodas.
mt: Montevideo is south of the equator, so it has summer when the Northern Hemisphere is in winter and vice versa. Montevideo has a subtropical climate; summer temperatures often exceed +30 °C. Winter can be surprisingly mild: temperatures rarely fall below zero, but the wind and humidity make it feel colder than the thermometer indicates. There are not very rainy and dry seasons: the amount of rain is about the same throughout the year.
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: Nepageidaujamos freskos ar keverzonės vadinamos grafičiais. Nors šis reiškinys toli gražu nėra naujas, dauguma žmonių tikriausiai jį sieja su jaunimu, niokojančiu viešąją ir privačiąją nuosavybę purškiamaisiais dažais. Tačiau šiandien yra žinomų grafitininkų, grafičiui skirtų renginių ir sienų, ant kurių galima piešti „legaliai“. Šiame kontekste grafičio piešiniai dažnai yra labiau panašūs į meno kūrinius, nei į neįskaitomus užrašus.
mt: Unwanted graffiti or taggings are called "graffiti". Although this phenomenon is not new, most people associate it with youth, defacing public and private property with aerosol paints. However, there are known graffiti artists, graffiti events and walls that can be legally painted on. In this context, graffiti paintings are often more similar to works of art than to unaccounted for scribblings.
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Kai kuriuose muzikos festivaliuose didžioji dauguma dalyvių nusprendžia įsikurti festivalio teritorijoje, nes mano, kad tai neatsiejama festivalio patirties dalis. Jei norite būti arti veiksmo, turėsite atvykti anksti, kad gautumėte stovyklavietę arčiau muzikos. Nepamirškite, kad net jei pasirodymai pagrindinėse scenose baigėsi, festivalyje gali būti numatyta vietų, kuriose muzika gros iki vėlaus vakaro. Kai kuriuose fesitvaliuose įrengiamos specialios stovyklavietės šeimoms su mažais vaikais.
mt: At many music festivals, most attendees decide to camp on the festival grounds, as they believe it is an integral part of the festival experience. If you want to be close to the action, you should arrive early to get a campsite closer to the music. Don't forget that even if the main stages have finished, there may be areas where music goes on until late at night. Some festivals have special family camping areas for families with small children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Kadangi daugelis nedidelių gyvenviečių yra nutolusios nuo miestų, naktinių pramogų galėsite rasti tik nukeliavę į Albukerką arba Santa Fė. Tačiau beveik visi anksčiau išvardyti kazino patiekia gėrimus, o kai kurie jų siūlo žinomų prekių ženklų pramogas (pirmiausia didžiausių, esančių Albukerko ir Santa Fė apylinkėse). Svarbu žinoti: mažų miestelių barai ne visada yra geriausios vietos leisti laiką ne vietiniams. Pirmiausia šiaurinėje Naujosios Meksikos dalyje yra rimtų problemų dėl vairavimo išgėrus ir daug tokių vairuotojų yra prie mažų miestelių barų.
mt: Because many small towns are far from cities, you'll have to drive to Albuquerque or Santa Fe to find any nightlife. However, most of the casinos mentioned above serve alcohol, and some of them offer name-brand entertainment (primarily the largest ones in the Albuquerque and Santa Fe areas). It's important to know that not all bars in small towns are the best places to spend time if you're not a local. First of all, there are serious problems with drunk driving in northern New Mexico, and many of those drivers are at small-town bars.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: Kadangi daugelis nedidelių gyvenviečių yra nutolusios nuo miestų, naktinių pramogų galėsite rasti tik nukeliavę į Albukerką arba Santa Fė. Svarbu žinoti: mažų miestelių barai ne visada yra geriausios vietos leisti laiką ne vietiniams. Pirmiausia šiaurinėje Naujosios Meksikos dalyje yra rimtų problemų dėl vairavimo išgėrus ir daug tokių vairuotojų yra prie mažų miestelių barų.
mt: Because many small towns are far from cities, you'll have to drive to Albuquerque or Santa Fe to find any nightlife. However, most of the casinos mentioned above serve alcohol, and some of them offer name-brand entertainment (primarily the largest ones in the Albuquerque and Santa Fe areas). It's important to know that not all bars in small towns are the best places to spend time if you're not a local. First of all, there are serious problems with drunk driving in northern New Mexico, and many of those drivers are at small-town bars.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: Pagrindinis vietinis alus yra „Number One“, nors jis ir nėra kompleksinis alus, bet labai švelnus ir gaivus. Kitas vietinis alus – „Manta“. Galima rinktis iš daugybės rūšių prancūziško vyno, bet Naujosios Zelandijos ir Australijos vynas gali sužavėti labiau. Vietinį vandentiekio vandenį gerti visiškai saugu, bet, jei bijote, lengva rasti vandens buteliukuose. Australams kavos su pienu (angl. „flat white“) idėja yra svetima. Mažas kiekis juodos kavos yra espresas, kapučinas patiekiamas su grietinėle (neplakta) ant viršaus, o arbata – be pieno. Karštas šokoladas, atitinkantis Belgijos standartus. Vaisių sultys nors ir brangios, tačiau puikios.
mt: The main local beer is "Number One", though it is not a lager, but very smooth and refreshing. Another local beer is "Manta". You can choose from a wide range of French wines, but New Zealand and Australian wines can be more exciting. Tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but if you are worried, bottled water is easy to find. Australians are not fond of the idea of coffee with milk (a "flat white"). A small amount of black coffee is espresso, cappuccino is served with froth on top, and tea is without milk. Hot chocolate is to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are expensive, but good.
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: Gvaraniai buvo svarbiausia čiabuvių grupė, gyvenusi dabartinėje rytų Paragvajaus teritorijoje – jie buvo pusiau klajokliai medžiotojai, kurie taip pat užsiėmė žemės ūkiu, iš kurio prasimaitino. Čako regione gyveno kitų vietinių genčių, pvz., Gvajkurai ir Pajagvai, kurios išgyveno medžiodamos, rinkdamos gėrybes ir žvejodamos. 16 amžiuje Paragvajus, kuris anksčiau vadintas „Milžiniška Indijos provincija“, atsirado Ispanijos užkariautojams susidūrus su vietinių gyventojų grupėmis. Ispanai pradėjo tris šimtmečius besitęsusią kolonizaciją. Nuo Asunsjono įkūrimo 1537 metais Paragvajui pavyko išsaugoti savo vietinį charakterį ir tapatybę.
mt: The Guaraní were the most important of the Chacoan tribes, living in what is now eastern Paraguay, who were semi-nomadic hunter-gatherers who also practiced agriculture, from which they subsisted. In the Chaco region lived other indigenous groups, such as the Guaycuru and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century, Paraguay, previously known as the "Provincia Misional", was created by Spanish conquistadors encountering indigenous groups. The Spanish began a three-century-long colonization. From the founding of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay managed to preserve its indigenous character and identity.
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: Paryžiečių reputacija yra tokia, kad jie egocentriški, nemandagūs ir arogantiški. Nors dažnai tai neteisingas stereotipas, su paryžiečiais greičiau pavyks sutarti, jei elgsitės kuo mandagiau, tarsi „bien élevé“ (gerai išauklėtu -(a)). Tai žymiai labiau padės įsilieti į visuomenę. Atžari paryžiečių išorė greitai išgaruos, jei laikysitės paprasto mandagumo.
mt: Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often an unfair stereotype, it helps to get along with Parisians if you act as if you are "bien élevé" (well brought up). This will help you fit in much better. The Parisian accent will quickly disappear if you speak with a normal accent.
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: „MetroRail“ priemestiniuose traukiniuose, kursuojančiuose Keiptaune ir aplink jį, siūlomos dvi klasės: „MetroPlus“ (pirmoji klasė) ir „Metro“ (trečioji klasė). „MetroPlus“ yra patogesnis, mažiau apkrautas ir šiek tiek brangesnis variantas, tačiau vis tiek pigesnis už įprastus metro bilietus Europoje. Kiekviename traukinyje yra ir „MetroPlus“, ir „Metro“ vagonų. „MetroPlus“ vagonai visada būna Keiptauno pusėje esančiame traukinio gale.
mt: "MetroRail" trains in Cape Town and its suburbs offer two classes: "MetroPlus" (first class) and "Metro" (third class). "MetroPlus" is a more convenient, less crowded and slightly more expensive option, but still cheaper than standard European metro tickets. Each train has "MetroPlus" and "Metro" cars. "MetroPlus" cars are always at the front of the train on the Cape Town side.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Keliautojai gali susidurti su jų gimtajame regione nebūdingais gyvūnų parazitais. Parazitai gali sugadinti maistą, sukelti susierzinimą arba blogiausiu atveju sukelti alerginę reakciją, paskleisti nuodus ar platinti infekcijas. Pačios infekcinės lygos arba pavojingi gyvūnai, galintys sužeisti arba užmušti žmones jėga, paprastai nelaikomi kenkėjais.
mt: Travelers may encounter unfamiliar animal parasites in their home region. Parasites can contaminate food, cause discomfort, or in the worst case cause allergic reactions, spread disease, or transmit infections. The most infectious classes of parasites or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people with force are not usually considered pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Kiekvienoje vietinėje parduotuvėlėje yra daugybė išankstinio mokėjimo telefono kortelių, kurias galima naudoti taksofonuose arba įprastuose telefonuose. Nors daugelis kortelių yra tinkamos skambinti bet kur, kai kurios turi palankius skambučių tarifus tik konkrečioms šalių grupėms. Šios paslaugos paprastai pasiekiamos nemokamu telefonu numeriu, kuriuo galima skambinti iš daugumos telefonų.
mt: In each local store there are many prepaid phone cards, which can be used in payphones or regular phones. Some cards have favorable calling rates to certain country groups. These services are usually reached by a toll-free number, which can be dialed from most phones.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Plitvicų ežerų nacionaliniame parke yra daug miškų, kuriuose auga daugiausiai bukai, eglės bei kėniai, jam būdingas Alpių ir Viduržemio jūros regiono augalijos mišinys. Dėl įvairaus mikroklimato, dirvožemio skirtumų ir skirtingo aukščio joje randama itin plati augalų bendruomenių įvairovė. Teritorija taip pat pasižymi ypač didele gyvūnų ir paukščių rūšių įvairove. Be daugelio kitų paplitusių rūšių, ten taip pat galima sutikti retų gyvūnų, pavyzdžiui, Europos rudąjį lokį, vilką, erelį, pelėdą, lūšį, laukinę katę ir kurtinį.
mt: The park is covered by forests, mainly beech, spruce and fir, typical of the Alpine and Mediterranean regions. Due to the various microclimates, soil types and altitudes, a very high diversity of plant communities can be found. The area is also notable for its high diversity of animal and bird species. In addition to many other common species, it is also possible to find rare animals, such as the Eurasian lynx, wolf, eagle, fox, badger, deer, wildcat and marten.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: Žiniasklaidos priemonės nuolat meluoja apie to paskirtį teigdamos, kad tikslas „išvengti piratavimo“. Iš tiesų regionų kodai neturi jokios įtakos neteisėtam kopijavimui; disko kopiją pabičiui bus galima paleisti bet kokiame įrenginyje, kuriame veikia originalus diskas. Tikrasis siekis yra suteikti šioms įmonėms didesnę rinkų kontrolę; svarbiausia – pelno generavimas.
mt: Media outlets continue to lie about the purpose of the region codes, claiming that the goal is to "avoid piracy". In fact, region codes have no effect on illegal copying; a copy of a disc can be played on any device that plays the original disc. The real goal is to give these companies greater control over their markets; most importantly, profit generation.
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Imigracinės patikros paprastai nėra arba ji tik formali, kai grįžtate į gimtąją šalį, tačiau muitinės patikra būti varginanti. Įsitikinkite, ką galite ir ko negalite įsinešti ir deklaruokite viską, kas teisiškai apribojama.
mt: Immigration checks are usually either non-existent or just a formality when returning to your home country, but customs checks can be frustrating. Make sure you know what you can and can't bring in and declare everything that is legally restricted.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Kočamo slėnis yra pagrindinė kopimo į kalnus vietą Čilėje, žinoma kaip Pietų Amerikos Josemitis, kuriame yra daugybė didelių granito sienų ir stačių uolų. Nuo viršūnių atsiveria kvapą gniaužiantis vaizdas. Alpinistai iš viso pasaulio nuolat kuria naujus maršrutus, nes uolos yra begalinės.
mt: Kochamo Canyon is the main climbing area in Chile, known as the South American Yosemite, where there are many large granite walls and steep cliffs. From the tops, a view of the intoxicating scenery opens. Climbers from all over the world are constantly creating new routes, because the rocks are endless.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Jei norite skristi aplink pasaulį tik pietiniu pusrutuliu, skrydžių ir kelionės tikslų pasirinkimas yra ribotas dėl užjūrio maršrutų trūkumo. Nė viena oro transporto įmonių sąjunga nesiūlo visų trijų skrydžių per vandenyną pietų pusrutulyje (o „SkyTeam“ nesiūlo nė vieno iš jų). Tačiau „Star Alliance“ aprėpia viską, išskyrus rytinę pietinio Ramiojo vandenyno dalį nuo Santjago iki Taičio, kur skraido „LATAM Oneworld“. Jei norite praleisti Pietų Ramųjį vandenyną ir Pietų Amerikos vakarinę pakrantę, šis skrydis nėra vienintelis variantas (žr. toliau).
mt: If you want to fly around the world only in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of overwater routes. None of the airline alliances offer all three Southern Hemisphere overwater flights (and "SkyTeam" doesn't offer any of them). However, "Star Alliance" covers everything except the eastern part of the South Pacific from Santiago to Taipei, where "LATAM Oneworld" flies. If you want to skip the South Pacific and the South American west coast, this flight is not the only option (see below).
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: Visame pasaulyje yra beveik 200 ekskursijų bėgant organizacijų. Daugelis jų veikia savarankiškai. „Global Running Tours“ perėmėja „Go Running“ turi dešimčių turistinio bėgimo paslaugų teikėjų tinklus keturiuose žemynuose. Prie Barselonoje įkurtos „Running Tours Barcelona“ ir Kopenhagoje įkurtos „Running Copenhagen“ greitai prisijungė Prahoje įsikūrusi „Running Tours Prague“ ir kitos.
mt: There are almost 200 running tours worldwide run by various organizations. Many of them are independent.  "Global Running Tours" franchisee "Go Running" has networks of dozens of tour operators in four continents.  "Running Tours Barcelona" and "Running Copenhagen" based in Barcelona and Copenhagen respectively, quickly joined "Running Tours Prague" based in Prague and others.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

Prie Barselonoje įkurtos „Running Tours Barcelona“ ir Kopenhagoje įkurtos „Running Copenhagen“ greitai prisijungė Prahoje įsikūrusi „Running Tours Prague“ ir kitos.

src: Safaris turbūt yra labiausiai turistus pritraukianti ir išskirtinė lankytojų pramoga Afrikoje. Terminas „safaris“ plačiai vartojamas norint apibūdinti keliavimą sausuma, siekiant pamatyti stulbinamą Afrikos laukinę gamtą, ypač savanoje. Kai kurie gyvūnai, pvz., drambliai ir žirafos, dažnai prieina prie automobilių, todėl juos gerai matysite ir naudodami standartinę įrangą. Liūtai, gepardai ir leopardai kartais yra drovūs, ir geriau juos matysite per žiūronus. Safarį vaikščiojant (dar vadinamą „pasivaikščiojimu po krūmynus“, „žygio safariu“ arba ėjimu „pėdomis“) sudaro žygis, užtrunkantis kelias valandas arba kelias dienas.
mt: Safaris are probably the most popular tourist attraction and unique visitor experience in Africa. The term “safari” is widely used to describe travel by vehicle, seeking to see the amazing African wildlife, especially in savanna. Some animals, such as antelopes and giraffes, often approach vehicles, so you will see them well and using standard equipment. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy, and you will see them better through binoculars. A walk safari (also known as “walking through the bushes”, “hiking safari” or “walking safari”) is a hike lasting several hours or several days.
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Ekskursijos yra pigesnės didesnėms grupėms, todėl jei esate vienas ar tik su vienu draugu, pabandykite paieškoti bendraminčių, kad sudarytumėte 4–6 žmonių grupę ir pasiektumėte mažesnę kainą vienam žmogui. Tačiau dėl to nereikėtų per daug rūpintis, nes aplinkui dažnai būna pakankamai turistų. Atrodo, kad tai labiau yra būdas žmonėms apgaulingai įtikinti, kad jie turi mokėti daugiau.
mt: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you are one or just with one friend, try to look for fellow travelers to form a group of 4–6 people and get a lower price per person. However, don't worry too much about this, as there are usually enough tourists around. It seems that this is more of a way for people to trick others into thinking they have to pay more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Nors San Francisko ekonomika yra susijusi su tuo, kad miestas yra pasaulinio lygio turistų lankoma vieta, ji yra diversifikuota. Didžiausi užimtumo sektoriai yra profesinės paslaugos, valdymas, finansai, prekyba ir turizmas. Dažnas miesto vaizdavimas muzikoje, filmuose, literatūroje ir populiariojoje kultūroje padėjo jį bei kai kuriuos jo objektus išgarsinti visame pasaulyje. San Franciskas sukūrė plačią turizmo infrastruktūrą, kuri apima daug viešbučių, restoranų ir geriausių konferencijų salių. San Fransiskas taip pat yra viena iš geriausių šalies vietų, jei norite išbandyti kitą Azijos virtuvę: korėjiečių, tajų, indų ir japonų.
mt: San Francisco's economy is closely tied to tourism, which is a mainstay of the city's economy. Its fiscal year 2005–2006 operating budget is $6.5 billion. San Francisco has a diversified service economy, with employment spread widely over many industries and professions. In the first quarter of 2006, the Department of Labor reported that the San Francisco area has the second-highest job growth among major cities (after the Dallas/Fort Worth metroplex), and the highest job growth among cities with populations over 500,000. The city is responsible for the welfare of its homeless population, which is among the largest and most visible in the United States. The San Francisco economy is based on four main industries: tourism, the financial industry, high technology, and the creative industries. The port of San Francisco is the largest on the West Coast north of San Diego, and the sixth-largest in the United States. The city has a strong tourist economy, being one of the most popular destinations in the United States. In 2006, San Francisco attracted 24 million tourists, of which 2.5 million were overseas visitors. The city's main tourist attractions include the Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz, the cable cars, the San Francisco Ferry Building, and the city's historic cable cars. The city is also well known for its liberal politics, and is the home of the United Nations Charter, the United Nations, and the United Nations Plaza. The city is also home to the United Nations headquarters, the United Nations Plaza, and the United Nations Plaza Hotel. The city is also home to the United Nations headquarters, the United Nations Plaza, and the United Nations Plaza Hotel. The city is also home to the United Nations headquarters, the United Nations Plaza, and the United Nations Plaza Hotel. The city is also home to the United Nations headquarters, the United Nations Plaza, and the United Nations Plaza Hotel. The city is also home to the United Nations headquarters, the United Nations Plaza, and the United Nations Plaza Hotel. The city is also home to the United Nations headquarters, the United Nations Plaza, and the United Nations Plaza Hotel. The city is also home to the United Nations headquarters, the United Nations Plaza, and the United Nations Plaza Hotel. The city is also home to the United Nations headquarters, the United Nations Plaza, and the United Nations Plaza Hotel. The city is also home to the United Nations headquarters, the United Nations Plaza, and the United Nations Plaza Hotel. The city is also home to the United Nations
ref: While San Francisco's economy is linked to it being a world-class tourist attraction, its economy is diversified. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: Išankstinis užsakymas suteikia keliautojui ramybę, nes žino, kad turės kur nakvoti, kai pasieks kelionės tikslą. Kelionių agentūros dažnai yra sudariusios sutartis su konkrečiais viešbučiais, nors jūs per kelionių agentūrą galite užsisakyti ir kitas apgyvendinimo vietas, pavyzdžiui, stovyklavietes. Kelionių agentai paprastai siūlo paketus, į kuriuos įtraukti pusryčiai, transportavimas į oro uostą ir iš jo arba netgi jungtinio skrydžio ir viešbučio paketus. Jie taip pat gali jums rezervuoti vietą, jei reikia laiko pagalvoti apie pasiūlymą ar gauti kitų dokumentų, reikalingų lankomoje šalyje (pvz., vizą). Nors bet kokie pakeitimai arba prašymai pirmiausia turi būti teikiami kelionių agentūrai, o ne tiesiogiai viešbučiui.
mt: An advance booking gives the traveler peace of mind, knowing that he or she will have a place to stay when reaching the destination. Travel agencies often have contracts with specific hotels, though you can book through a travel agency other accommodations, such as campgrounds. Travel agents usually offer packages, which include breakfast, airport transfers or even a combination of flight and hotel packages. They can also reserve a room for you, if you need time to think about the offer or to get other documents needed for the trip (e.g. visa). Any changes or requests should first be made to the travel agency, not directly to the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Teksto vertimo realiuoju laiku programos – tai programos, kurios gali automatiškai versti didelius teksto segmentus iš vienos kalbos į kitą. Kai kurios šios kategorijos programos gali netgi išversti užsienio kalbos tekstus, esančius ženkluose arba kituose realaus pasaulio objektuose, kai naudotojas į juos nukreipia išmanųjį telefoną. Vertimo moduliai buvo smarkiai patobulinti ir dabar teikia daugiau ar mažiau teisingą vertimą (o nesuprantamą tekstą – labai retai), tačiau reikia šiek tiek atidumo, nes vertimas vis dėlto gali būti visiškai neteisingas. Viena iš žinomiausių šios kategorijos programėlių yra „Google Translate“, leidžianti versti neprisijungus, kai atsisiunčiami reikalingos kalbos duomenys.
mt: Real-time translation software is software that can automatically translate large text segments from one language to another. Some of these programs can even translate foreign language text when you point your smartphone at it. Translation modules have been greatly improved and now offer more or less accurate translation (and unintelligible text is very rare), but you need to be patient, as the translation may be completely wrong. One of the most well-known programs of this category is "Google Translate", which allows you to translate without logging in, when downloading the necessary language data.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Lavinos nėra anomalija; statūs šlaitai išlaiko tik nedaug sniego, o jo perteklius nuslenka kaip lavina. Problema ta, kad sniegas yra lipnus, todėl, kad jis nušliaužtų, reikia tam tikro stimulo, o kai šiek tiek sniego nušliaužia, tai gali paskatinti nušliaužti ir likusį. Kartais priežastis būna saulės tirpdomas sniegas, kartais truputis snygio, kartais natūralesni veiksniai, dažnai žmogus.
mt: The avalanche is not an anomaly; the steep slopes retain only a little snow, and its surplus slides down as an avalanche. The problem is that the snow is soft, so it needs some stimulus to slide, and when a little snow slides, it can trigger the rest to slide. Sometimes the cause is the sun melting the snow, sometimes a little snowfall, sometimes natural factors, often man.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: Troškinys yra patiekalas, kurio pagrindą sudaro žolelės ir prieskoniai, o taip pat mėsa ir daržovės. Karis gali būti „sausas“ arba „šlapias“, tai priklauso nuo to, kiek jame skysčio. Šiaurės Indijos ir Pakistano gilumos regionuose kario patiekaluose dažnai naudojamas jogurtas; pietų Indijoje ir kituose subkontinento pakrantės regionuose dažniau naudojamas kokosų pienas.
mt: A curry is a dish of meat, fish, or vegetables in a spiced sauce, which is usually heavily seasoned with curry powder. A curry can be "wet" or "dry", depending on the amount of sauce. In the northern Indian and Pakistani Himalayan regions, yogurt is often used in curries; in the southern Indian and other subcontinent coastal regions, coconut milk is more often used.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Pietų ašigalio traversas (arba kelias) yra 1600 km ilgio kelias nuo Makmerdo stoties Roso jūros pakrantėje iki ašigalio. Tai – suspaustas sniegas su pripildytais ir vėliavomis pažymėtais įtrūkimais. Juo galima važiuoti tik specialiais traktoriais, traukiančiais roges su degalais ir atsargomis. Jie nebuvo labai vikrūs, todėl kelias vedė aplink transantarktinius kalnus ant plokščiakalnio.
mt: 1600 km long South Pole traverse is a road from McMurdo Station on the coast of Ross Sea to the South Pole. It is a compressed snow with filled and marked with flags crevasses. It can be driven only by special trucks, pulling roges with fuel and supplies. They were not very frequent, so the road led around transantarctic mountains on a plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Pasiekti Pietų Afriką automobiliu yra puikus būdas pamatyti visą regiono grožį ir pasiekti vietas, kurių neaprėpia įprasti turistiniai maršrutai. Kruopščiai suplanavus tai galima padaryti įprastu automobiliu, tačiau labai rekomenduojama važiuoti keturių varančiųjų ratų automobiliu, o daugelį vietų galima pasiekti tik turint keturių varančiųjų ratų automobilį su aukšta ratų baze. Planuodami nepamirškite, kad, nors Pietų Afrikoje padėtis yra stabili, ji tokia ne visose kaimyninėse šalyse. Vizų reikalavimai ir kaina skiriasi atsižvelgiant į tautą ir gali priklausyti nuo to, iš kokios šalies atvykstate. Kiekviena šalis turi unikalių įstatymų, kuriuose nurodoma, kokios avarinės priemonės turi būti automobilyje.
mt: Driving in South Africa is a great way to see the whole region and get to places that are not covered by the usual tourist routes. Carefully planning it, it is possible to do it in a regular car, but it is highly recommended to drive a four-wheel drive car, and many places can only be reached with a four-wheel drive car with a high ground clearance. Planning, do not forget that, although the situation in South Africa is stable, it is not so in all neighboring countries. Visa requirements and cost vary depending on the country you are coming from. Each country has unique regulations that specify what emergency equipment must be in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: Kitų žmonių daiktų gabenimas. Savo krepšių niekada neišleiskite iš akių, ypač kirsdami valstybės sieną. Galite būti naudojami kaip narkotikų pervežėjai net to nežinodami ir už tai jūsų gali laukti dideli nemalonumai. Tai apima laukimą eilėje, nes bet kada, neįspėjus gali būti naudojami narkotikų ieškantys šunys. Kai kurios šalys taiko itin griežtas bausmes net ir pirmą kartą nusižengusiems; gali būti taikomos daugiau nei 10 metų laisvės atėmimo ar net mirties bausmė. Į neprižiūrimus krepšius taikosi vagys ir jie taip pat gali pritraukti institucijų, reaguojančių į su bombomis susijusias grėsmes, dėmesį.
mt: Carrying other people's belongings. Never lose sight of your bags, especially when crossing state borders. You may be used as drug mules even if you don't know it and you may face serious consequences. This includes waiting in line, as you may be used as drug-sniffing dogs at any time without notice. Some countries impose very harsh penalties even for first-time offenders; sentences of more than 10 years in prison or even death may be imposed. Unattended bags are targeted by thieves and may also attract the attention of institutions responding to bomb threats.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Ryte pripildykite namus sodriu kavos aromatu, o vakare išgerkite atpalaiduojančios ramunėlių arbatos. Atostogaudami namuose turite laiko pasilepinti ir skirti keletą papildomų minučių kam nors ypatingam pasiruošti. Jei jaučiatės drąsiau, pasinaudokite galimybe išspausti ar sumaišyti keletą glotnučių: galbūt atrasite paprastą gėrimą, kurį galėsite pasiruošti pusryčiams, kai grįšite prie savo kasdienio režimo. Jei gyvenate mieste, kuris pažymi įvairialype alkoholio vartojimo kultūra, apsilankykite baruose ar užeigose, esančiose tuose rajonuose, kūriuose būnate retai.
mt: Wake up to the aroma of coffee in the morning, and end the day with a cup of soothing tea. While you're at home, you have time to prepare and set aside a few extra minutes for someone special. If you feel brave, take advantage of the opportunity to mix a few cocktails: you may find a simple drink that you can prepare for breakfast when you return to your daily routine. If you live in a city that celebrates the culture of alcohol consumption, visit bars and pubs in areas where you rarely are.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: Iš Haldorsviko kaimo atsiveria vaizdai į netoliese esančią Eisturojaus salą ir jame yra neįprasta aštuonkampė bažnyčia. Bažnyčios šventoriuje kai kurie kapai papuošti įdomiomis marmurinėmis karvelių skulptūromis. Verta pusvalandį pasivaikščioti po intriguojantį kaimą.
mt: From the village of Haldorsvik, views of the nearby island of Eysturoy and its unusual octagonal church can be seen. Some of the graves in the churchyard are adorned with interesting marble sculptures of chickens. It's worth spending a quarter of an hour walking around the intriguing village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Nors trumpam keliaujant į tam tikras šalis kaip turistui ar verslo reikalais vizos nereikia, tarptautinis studentas paprastai jose praleidžia daugiau laiko nei eilinis turistas. Apskritai, norėdami gyventi bet kurioje užsienio šalyje ilgesnį laiką, iš anksto turėsite pasirūpinti viza. Studentų vizoms paprastai taikomi kitokie reikalavimai ir prašymų teikimo procedūros negu įprastoms turistų arba verslo vizoms. Daugelyje šalių jums reikės pasiūlymo laiško iš institucijos, kurioje norite studijuoti, bei įrodymo, kad turite pakankamai lėšų pragyventi bent pirmuosius kurso metus. Išsamius reikalavimus galite sužinoti institucijoje ir šalies, kurioje norite mokytis, imigracijos skyriuje.
mt: While you may not need a visa to visit certain countries as a tourist or for business, an international student will typically spend more time there than a regular tourist. In general, if you want to live in any country for a longer period of time, you will need to apply for a visa in advance. Student visas typically have different requirements and application procedures than regular tourist or business visas. In many countries, you will need a letter of invitation from the institution you wish to study at, and proof that you have enough money to live for at least the first year of your course. You can find out the specific requirements at the institution and the country you wish to study in, at the immigration department.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Jei nuspręsite žygiuoti per atogrąžų mišką, ypač vasarą jums reikės saugotis uodų. Net jei važiuojate per subtropinį atogrąžų mišką automobiliu, kelių sekundžių, kol atidarysite duris lipdami į transporto priemonę, užteks, kad uodai patektų su jumis į vidų.
mt: If you decide to hike through a rainforest, especially in the summer, you will need to be wary of mosquitoes. Even if you are driving through a subtropical rainforest in a car, a few seconds, while you are opening the door to get into the vehicle, will be enough for mosquitoes to get in with you.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Sundarbanai yra didžiausias ištisų mangrovių plotas visame pasaulyje, besidriekiantis 80 km (50 myl.) link Bangladešo ir Indijos nuo pakrantės į krašto gilumą. Sundarbanai – UNESCO pasaulio paveldo objektas. Miško dalis, esanti Indijos teritorijoje, yra vadinama Sundarbanų nacionaliniu parku. Miškus sudaro ne tik mangrovių pelkės, bet ir keletas paskutinių dar likusių galingų džiunglių medynų ir krūmynų, kadaise augusių Gangetijos lygumoje. Sundarbans užima 3 850 km² plotą, kuriame maždaug vieną trečdalį sudaro vandens / pelkių plotai. Nuo 1966 m. Sundarbanuose karaliauja gyvūnai. Manoma, kad dabar šioje teritorijoje gyvena apie 400 karališkųjų Bengalijos tigrų ir apie 30 000 aksių.
mt: Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) along the coast of Bangladesh and India from the Bay of Bengal. Sundarbans is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest in India is called Sundarbans National Park. The forest is not only made up of mangrove swamps, but also a few remaining large jungle forests and thickets that once grew in the Ganges Delta. Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 km² (1,490 sq mi), of which about one third is water / swamp. Since 1966, Sundarbans has been ruled by animals. It is believed that about 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 deer live in this territory.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Pasaulyje egzistuoja daugiau nei 5 000 skirtingų kalbų, daugiau nei dvidešimčia iš jų kalba 50 milijonų ar daugiau žmonių. Taip pat parašytus žodžius dažnai lengviau suprasti negu pasakytus. Tai ypač taikytina adresams, kuriuos dažnai sunku suprantamai ištarti. Nemažoje dalyje šalių praktiškai visi gyventojai laisvai kalba angliškai, o dar didesniame skaičiuje šalių gyventojai turi ribotas anglų kalbos žinias, ypač jaunimas. Įsivaizduokite, jei pavyks, mančesterietį, bostonietį, jamaikietį ir sidnėjietį, sėdinčius prie vakarienės stalo Toronto restorane. Jie vieni kitus linksmina istorijomis iš gimtųjų miestų, jas pasakodami savo išskirtiniu akcentu ir vietiniu žargonu.
mt: There are more than 5,000 different languages in the world, more than a hundred of which are spoken by more than 50 million people. It is also easier to understand written words than spoken ones. This is especially true for addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce. In a large number of countries, almost all inhabitants speak English freely, and in a larger number of countries, inhabitants have limited knowledge of the English language, especially the youth. Imagine if it were possible for a Mancunian, a Bostonian, a Jamaican, and a Sydneysider to sit at a dinner table in a Toronto restaurant. They would tease each other with stories from their hometowns, telling them in their distinctive accent and local slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Pasaulyje egzistuoja daugiau nei 5 000 skirtingų kalbų, daugiau nei dvidešimčia iš jų kalba 50 milijonų ar daugiau žmonių. Taip pat parašytus žodžius dažnai lengviau suprasti negu pasakytus. Tai ypač taikytina adresams, kuriuos dažnai sunku suprantamai ištarti. Nemažoje dalyje šalių praktiškai visi gyventojai laisvai kalba angliškai, o dar didesniame skaičiuje šalių gyventojai turi ribotas anglų kalbos žinias, ypač jaunimas. Įsivaizduokite, jei pavyks, mančesterietį, bostonietį, jamaikietį ir sidnėjietį, sėdinčius prie vakarienės stalo Toronto restorane. Jie vieni kitus linksmina istorijomis iš gimtųjų miestų, jas pasakodami savo išskirtiniu akcentu ir vietiniu žargonu.
mt: There are more than 5,000 different languages in the world, more than a hundred of which are spoken by more than 50 million people. It is also easier to understand written words than spoken ones. This is especially true for addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce. In a large number of countries, almost all inhabitants speak English freely, and in a larger number of countries, inhabitants have limited knowledge of the English language, especially the youth. Imagine if it were possible for a Mancunian, a Bostonian, a Jamaican, and a Sydneysider to sit at a dinner table in a Toronto restaurant. They would tease each other with stories from their hometowns, telling them in their distinctive accent and local slang.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Autobusai iš rajono autobusų stoties (per upę) išvyksta visą dieną, nors dauguma autobusų, ypač vykstantys į rytus ir Džakarą / Bumtangą, išvyksta tarp 06:30 ir 07:30. Kadangi tarpmiestiniai autobusai dažnai būna pilni, bilietą rekomenduojama įsigyti prieš keletą dienų. Į daugelį rajonų važiuoja patogūs ir tvirti japoniški autobusiukai „Coaster“. Bendri taksi yra greita ir patogi priemonė nuvykti į netoliese esančias vietas, pavyzdžiui, Parą (Nu 150) ir Punaką (Nu 200).
mt: Buses from the bus station (across the river) leave all day, though most buses, especially those going east and to Jakarta/Bandung, leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As intercity buses are often full, it is recommended to buy a ticket a few days in advance. Comfortable and sturdy Japanese Coaster buses go to many districts. Shared taxis are a quick and convenient way to get to nearby places, e.g. Par (Nu 150) and Punak (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: Atsižvelgiant į sudėtingą pasiekiamumą, „Timbuktu“ virto metafora, apibūdinanti egzotiškas ir tolimas salas. Šiandien Timbuktu yra skurdus miestas, tačiau jo reputacija traukia turistus; mieste yra oro uostas. 1990 m. jis buvo įtrauktas į pasaulio paveldo vietų, kurioms gresia pavojus dėl dykumos smėlio, sąrašą. Tai buvo viena iš pagrindinių stotelių specialioje Henry'io Louiso Gateso PBS laidoje „Afrikos pasaulio stebuklai“. Miestas yra visiškai kitoks nei kiti šalies miestai, nes turi daugiau arabiško, o ne afrikietiško stiliaus.
mt: Because of its remoteness, "Timbuktu" has become a metaphor for exotic and distant places. Today Timbuktu is a poor town, but its reputation attracts tourists; the town has an airport. In 1990 it was added to the World Heritage List of sites in danger due to desert sand. It was one of the main stops in the special Henry Louis Gates PBS show "African World Wonders". The town is completely different from other Malian towns, as it has more Arab, rather than African, style.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Paralimpinės žaidynės vyks nuo 2021 m. rugpjūčio 24 d. iki rugsėjo 5 d. Kai kurie renginiai vyks kitose Japonijos vietose. Tokijas bus vienintelis Azijos miestas, surengęs dvejas vasaros olimpines žaidynes. Žaidynės buvo surengtos 1964 m. Jei skrydžius ir nakvynę 2020 metams užsisakėte prieš paskelbiant nukėlimą, gali būti, kad pakliuvote į keblią padėtį. Atšaukimo politikos nuostatos skiriasi, bet, kovo pabaigos duomenimis, dauguma bendrovių atšaukimo dėl koronaviruso politikos netaiko 2020 m. liepos mėnesiui, kai turėjo vykti olimpinės žaidynės. Tikimasi, kad daugelio renginių bilietai kainuos nuo 2500 JPY iki 130 000 JPY, o įprastų bilietų kaina bus maždaug 7000 JPY.
mt: 2020 Summer Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5. Some events will be held in other Japanese cities. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to host two Summer Olympics. The games were held in 1964. If you booked flights and accommodation before the postponement, you may be in a difficult situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of the end of July, most companies did not apply the cancellation policy for the coronavirus in July 2020, when the Olympics were to be held. It is expected that the tickets for most events will cost from 2500 JPY to 130 000 JPY, and the average ticket price will be about 7000 JPY.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: Tornadas yra besisukantis labai žemo slėgio oro stulpas, aplinkinį orą įsiurbiantis į vidų ir į viršų. Viesulas sukelia stiprų vėją (neretai siekiantį 100–200 mylių per valandą) ir gali į orą pakelti ir nusinešti sunkius daiktus. Jie prasideda kaip iš audros debesų besileidžiantys piltuvai ir palietę žemę tampa tornadais.
mt: A tornado is a rapidly rotating column of air that is in contact with both the surface of the Earth and a cumulonimbus cloud or, in dry areas, a cumulus cloud. They are often visible as a funnel-shaped cloud extending from the base of a cumulonimbus cloud toward the ground. Tornadoes come in many sizes but typically eat up to 1.6 kilometres (0.99 mi) in diameter, are vortices with rotation around a center in the range 2 to 54 metres per second (4.5 to 121.0 mph), and typically last less than an hour. A tornado may be preceded by a rawl or a dust devil.
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Jei šaliai, kurioje lankysitės, bus pradėtas taikyti įspėjimas dėl keliavimo, tai gali turėti įtakos jūsų kelionės sveikatos draudimui ar kelionės atšaukimo draudimui. Taip pat galbūt norėsite pasitikrinti ir kitų šalių, o ne tik savo, vyriausybių patarimus, tačiau jų patarimai skirti jų piliečiams. Kaip vieną iš pavyzdžių galima paminėti tai, kad Amerikos piliečiai Artimuosiuose Rytuose gali susidurti su įvairiomis situacijomis, susijusiomis su europiečiais ir arabais. Patarimuose pateikiama trumpa informacija apie politinę situaciją šalyje. Pateiktos nuomonės dažnai yra paviršutiniškos, bendro pobūdžio ir labai supaprastintos palyginus su kitur prieinama išsamia informacija.
mt: If the country you are visiting has issued a travel warning, this may affect your travel insurance or trip cancellation insurance. You may also want to check the advice of other countries, not just your own, but their advice is for their citizens. As an example, American citizens in the Middle East may encounter various situations involving Europeans and Arabs. The advice is usually brief information about the political situation in the country. The opinions are often superficial, general and very simplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Kelionių agentūros veikia nuo XIX a. Kelionių agentas paprastai yra geras pasirinkimas kelionei, kuri apima daugiau nei ankstesnę keliautojo patirtį gamtoje, kultūroje, kalboje ar mažas pajamas gaunančiose šalyse. Nors daugelis agentūrų nori reguliarių užsakymų, dauguma agentų specializuojasi tam tikrų tipų, tam tikro biudžeto kelionėse arba kelionėse į tam tikras vietas. Geriau naudotis agento, kuris dažnai užsako į jūsų panašias keliones, paslaugomis. Svetainėje ar vitrinoje peržiūrėkite, kokias keliones siūlo agentas.
mt: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is often a good choice for a trip that includes more than the average tourist's experience in nature, culture, language or low-income countries. While most agencies want regular orders, most agents specialize in certain types, certain budget trips or trips to certain places. Use an agent who often orders similar trips to yours. Check out the website or window for the trips the agent offers.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: Prieš kelionę ir keliaujant reikėtų turėti omenyje daugelį dalykų. Keliaudami tikėkitės, kad viskas nebus taip, kaip yra „namuose“. Manieros, įstatymai, maistas, eismas, apgyvendinimas, standartai, kalba ir t. t. tam tikru mastu skirsis nuo ten, kur gyvenate. Tai turite turėti omenyje visada, kad nenusiviltumėte ar galbūt neliktumėte nepatenkinti vietiniais veikimo būdais.
mt: Before you go and while you are traveling, you should keep in mind many things. Traveling, you should believe that everything will not be as it is at home. Manners, laws, food, behavior, accommodation, standards, language and so on will differ to some extent from where you live. You should always keep in mind that you will not be disappointed or perhaps left unsatisfied by local ways of doing things.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Jei pirmą kartą keliaujate besivystančioje šalyje ar naujoje pasaulio dalyje, nenuvertinkite galimo kultūrinio šoko. Daugelį tvirtų ir pajėgių keliautojų įveiks besivystančio pasaulio kelionių naujumas, nes gali greitai atsirasti daug kultūrinių skirtumų. Ypač pirmosiomis dienomis pasvarstykite apie paišlaidavimą vakarietiško stiliaus ir kokybės viešbučiams, maistui bei paslaugoms, kurie padės aklimatizuotis. Nemiegokite ant matraso ar pripučiamo čiužinio, patiesto ant žemės, jei gerai nepažįstate vietinės gyvūnijos. Jei ketinate stovyklauti, pasiimkite sulankstomą lovelę ar hamaką, kad apsisaugotumėte nuo gyvačių, skorpionų ir t. t.
mt: If you are visiting a developing country or a new part of the world for the first time, don't be too shocked by the cultural differences. Many strong and capable travelers can handle the newness of the developing world, as long as they can quickly adapt to the cultural differences. Consider the cost of Western-style and quality hotels, food, and services, which will help you acclimate. Don't sleep on a mat or a bed that is too soft, if you don't know the local wildlife. If you plan to camp, bring a mosquito net or hammock to protect yourself from mosquitoes, scorpions, and the like.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: Pasidarykite ir visada turėkite poliso ir draudiko kontaktinės informacijos kopijas. Juose turi būti draudiko el. pašto adresas ir tarptautinis telefono numeris, skirti konsultacijoms, įgaliojimams gauti ir prašymams pateikti. Turėkite kopiją savo bagaže ir internete (nusiųskite sau priedą el. paštu arba laikykite „debesyje“). Jei keliaujate su nešiojamuoju kompiuteriu ar planšete, saugokite kopiją jo arba jos atmintyje arba diske (prieinamame ir be interneto ryšio). Taip pat duokite poliso / kontaktų kopijas bendrakeleiviams ir namuose likusiems giminaičiams ar draugams, kurie nori padėti.
mt: 1. Make and always have copies of your insurance and agent contact information. It should include the agent's email address and international phone number for consultations, authorizations, and requests. Have a copy in your luggage and online (send yourself an attachment via email or keep it "in the clouds"). If you are traveling with a portable computer or tablet, keep a copy of it or its memory or disk (accessible and without internet connection). Also give copies of your insurance/contact information to fellow travelers and family members at home who want to help.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Pasidarykite ir visada turėkite poliso ir draudiko kontaktinės informacijos kopijas. Juose turi būti draudiko el. pašto adresas ir tarptautinis telefono numeris, skirti konsultacijoms, įgaliojimams gauti ir prašymams pateikti. Turėkite kopiją savo bagaže ir internete (nusiųskite sau priedą el. paštu arba laikykite „debesyje“). Jei keliaujate su nešiojamuoju kompiuteriu ar planšete, saugokite kopiją jo arba jos atmintyje arba diske (prieinamame ir be interneto ryšio). Taip pat duokite poliso / kontaktų kopijas bendrakeleiviams ir namuose likusiems giminaičiams ar draugams, kurie nori padėti.
mt: 1. Make and always have copies of your insurance and agent contact information. It should include the agent's email address and international phone number for consultations, authorizations, and requests. Have a copy in your luggage and online (send yourself an attachment via email or keep it "in the clouds"). If you are traveling with a portable computer or tablet, keep a copy of it or its memory or disk (accessible and without internet connection). Also give copies of your insurance/contact information to fellow travelers and family members at home who want to help.
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: Yra daug skirtingų filmų formatų, kurie buvo naudojami daug metų. Labiausiai paplitusi 35 mm juosta (36 mm ir 24 mm negatyvas). Prireikus ją gana lengva pakeisti, o vaizdo įrašo raiška gana panaši į šiuolaikinių DSLR kamerų raišką. Kai kuriose vidutinio formato juostinėse kamerose naudojamas 6 x 6 cm formatas, tiksliau – 56 x 56 mm negatyvas. Taip suteikiama skiriamoji geba, kuri yra beveik keturis kartus didesnė už 35 mm negatyvo skiriamąją gebą (3136 mm2 palyginti su 864).
mt: 35 mm film (36 mm and 24 mm negative) is the most widely used format for many years. It is easy to change and the image quality is very similar to modern DSLR cameras. In some medium format cameras, the 6 x 6 cm format is used, that is, a 56 x 56 mm negative. This provides a resolution that is almost four times greater than the resolution of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 compared to 864).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Lengviausias būdas pradėti kelionių aprašymo verslą – tobulinti savo įgūdžius kelionių tinklaraštyje. Kai jausite, kad mokate formatuoti ir redaguoti žiniatinklyje, galėsite pradėti kurti savo svetainę.
mt: The easiest way to start a travel writing business is to improve your skills in travel blogging. When you feel you are learning how to format and edit in the newsroom, you can start building your website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Namuose, dėl nuolatinio vietinių bakterijų poveikio, didelė tikimybė, kad jau turite joms imunitetą. Tačiau kitose pasaulio vietose, kuriose bakteriologinė fauna jums nepažįstama, yra didesnė tikimybė, kad susidursite su problemomis. Be to, esant šiltesniam klimatui bakterijos greičiau dauginasi ir ilgiau išgyvena be žmogaus organizmo. Tai yra „Delio pilvo“, faraono prakeiksmo, Montesumos keršto ir kt. bausmės. Kaip ir kvėpavimo takų problemos šalto klimato zonose, žarnyno problemos karšto klimato zonose yra gana dažnos ir daugeliu atvejų ne tik sukelia daug nepatogumų, bet ir yra išties pavojingos.
mt: At home, due to constant local bacteria, there is a high probability that you already have immunity to them. However, in other parts of the world where you are not familiar with the bacteriological fauna, there is a greater likelihood that you will encounter problems. In addition, in warmer climates, bacteria multiply faster and live longer without a human body. This is the "Delio's belly", the curse of the pharaoh, Montesuma's revenge and other punishments. As with breathing problems in cold climate zones, intestinal problems in hot climate zones are quite common and in many cases not only cause a lot of discomfort, but are actually very dangerous.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
