src: Europa yra santykinai mažas žemynas, tačiau jame yra daug nepriklausomų šalių. Įprastomis aplinkybėmis keliaujant per kelias šalis reikėtų kelis kartus teikti paraiškas dėl vizų ir stoti pasienio punktuose pasui patikrinti. Tačiau šiuo atžvilgiu Šengeno zona veikia kiek panašiai kaip viena šalis. Kol liksite šioje zonoje, paprastai galėsite kirsti sienas neturėdami dar kartą pereiti pasų kontrolės punktų. Panašiai, turint Šengeno vizą, nereikia kreiptis į kiekvieną Šengeno erdvės valstybę narę dėl vizų – taip sutaupoma laiko, pinigų ir išvengiama popierizmo.
mt: Europe is a relatively small continent, but it has many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, traveling through several countries would require several applications for visas and stops at border checkpoints. However, the Schengen Area works somewhat like one country. As long as you remain in this area, you can usually cross borders without having to go through passport control again. Similarly, having a Schengen visa does not require you to apply to each Schengen Area country for visas – this saves time, money, and paper.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Tutanchamono kapas (KV62). KV62 vadinama viena įžymiausių kapaviečių Slėnyje, Hovardo Karterio 1922 m. atrastoje beveik nepaliestoje karališkoje jaunojo faraono laidojimo vietoje. Tačiau lyginant su daugeliu kitų karalių kapų, Tutanchamono kapo lankyti iš esmės neverta, nes jis daug mažesnis, jo puošyba kuklesnė. Visiems, norintiems pamatyti, kokia žala buvo padaryta bandant išimti mumiją iš karsto, teks nusivilti, nes matosi tik mumijos galva ir pečiai. Pasakiškų turtų kape nebėra – jie išgabenti į Kairo Egipto muziejų. Pranešama, kad vienas turtingiausių pasaulio žmonių Allenas investavo didelę dalį savo turtų į jūrų tyrinėjimą ir pradėjo savo paieškas, kad surastų musashi visą gyvenimą dominantį karą.
mt: Tutankhamun's tomb (KV62). KV62 is one of the most famous tombs in the Valley, discovered by Howard Carter in 1922 in an almost intact royal burial place of the young pharaoh. However, compared to many other kings' tombs, Tutankhamun's tomb is much smaller and its decoration is less impressive. For those who want to see what damage was done trying to remove the mummy from the coffin, they will have to be disappointed, as only the mummy's head and shoulders are visible. There are no treasures in the tomb – they were taken to the Cairo Egyptian Museum. It is reported that one of the richest people in the world Allen invested a large part of his wealth in ocean exploration and began his search to find musashi the dominant war throughout his life.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Boveno sala yra populiari vienadienėms arba savaitgalio išvykoms – galima paplaukioti kanoja, eiti į kalnų žygį, apsipirkti, apsilankyti restorane ir kt. Ši autentiška bendruomenė įsikūrusi Howe Sound, netoli Vankuverio, ją lengvai pasieksite reguliariai kursuojančiais vandens taksi, išvykstančiais iš Granvilio salos, esančios Vankuverio centre. Tiems, kurie mėgsta užsiėmimus lauke, būtina leistis į žygius palei Sea to Sky Corridor. Visleryje (1,5 val. kelio nuo Vankuverio) yra brangu, tačiau jis yra žymus dėl 2010 m. žiemos olimpinių žaidynių. Žiemą galite mėgautis geriausia slidinėjimo vieta Šiaurės Amerikoje, o vasarą išbandykite autentiškas keliones kalnų dviračiais.
mt: Boveno Island is a popular day trip or weekend getaway – you can paddle a canoe, hike in the mountains, shop, dine out and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound, near Vancouver, and is easily accessible by regular water taxi from Granville Island, in the heart of Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, the Sea to Sky Corridor is a must. The Whistler (1.5 hours from Vancouver) is a pricey but famous destination for the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter you can enjoy the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try authentic mountain biking.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Viktoria Folsas yra miestelis vakarinėje Zimbabvės dalyje, kitapus sienos nuo Livingstono (Zambija) ir netoli Botsvanos. Miestelis yra prie pat krioklių, ir jie yra pagrindinis lankytinas objektas, tačiau šioje populiarioje turistinėje vietoje tiek nuotykių ieškotojams, tiek ekskursijų mėgėjams gausu galimybių ilgesnei viešnagei. Lietinguoju sezonu (nuo lapkričio iki kovo) vandens lygis pakyla, todėl krioklys atrodo įspūdingiau. Tikrai sušlapsite, jeigu pereisite tiltą arba eisite takais, vingiuojančiais šalia krioklių. Kita vertus, taip tikrai nutiks, nes vandens lygis yra toks aukštas, kad pačius krioklius gali būti sunku pamatyti – visur vanduo!
mt: Victoria Falls is a town in western Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone (Zambia) and near Botswana. The town is near the falls, and they are the main tourist attraction, but this popular tourist destination has plenty of options for the adventurous and the sightseer alike. During the rainy season (November to March) the water level rises, making the falls look more impressive. You will definitely get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the paths near the falls. On the other hand, this is definitely going to happen, because the water level is so high that you may not be able to see the falls – water is everywhere!
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: Įprastos fotografijos taisyklės taip pat, o galbūt net labiau, taikomos vaizdo įrašymui. Jei jau neleidžiama ko nors fotografuoti, nebus leidžiama ir filmuoti. Jei naudojate bepilotę skraidyklę, iš anksto sužinokite, ką galite filmuoti ir kokių leidimų ar papildomų licencijų reikia. Bepilotės skraidyklės skraidinimas prie oro uosto arba virš žmonių beveik visada yra bloga mintis, net jei tai ir legalu jūsų vietovėje.
mt: The same rules apply to video recording, and perhaps even more so. If you are not allowed to take a picture, you are not allowed to film. If you are using a drone, find out beforehand what you can film and what permissions or additional licenses you need. Flying a drone near an airport or over people is almost always a bad idea, even if it is legal in your area.
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Registracija yra papildomas vizos suteikimo proceso reikalavimas. Kai kuriose šalyse turite užregistruoti savo buvimą ir adresą, kuriuo apsistojate, vietinėse valdžios institucijose. Tam gali reikėti užpildyti formą vietiniame policijos skyriuje ar apsilankyti imigracijos tarnyboje. Daugelyje šalių, kuriose galioja toks įstatymas, registracija užsiima vietos viešbučiai (nepamirškite pasiteirauti). Kitais atvejais registruotis turi tik tie, kurie apsistoja ne turistų apgyvendinimo vietose. Tačiau tokiu atveju įstatymai yra daug neaiškesni, todėl apie tai išsiaiškinkite iš anksto.
mt: Registration is an additional visa requirement in some countries. In some countries, you must register your stay and address with local government institutions. This may require filling out a form at the local police station or visiting the immigration office. In many countries where this law applies, registration is handled by local hotels (don't forget to ask). In other cases, only those staying in non-tourist accommodation are required to register. However, laws in these cases are often unclear, so check in advance.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

mt: Registration is an additional visa requirement in some countries. In some countries, you must register your stay and address with local government institutions. This may require filling out a form at the local police station or visiting the immigration office. In many countries where this law applies, registration is handled by local hotels (don't forget to ask). In other cases, only those staying in non-tourist accommodation are required to register. However, laws in these cases are often unclear, so check in advance.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Savanoriavimas keliaujant yra puikus būdas kažką pakeisti, tačiau svarbu ne tik davimas. Gyvenimas ir savanoriavimas užsienio šalyje yra puikus būdas pažinti kitokią kultūrą, susipažinti su naujais žmonėmis, sužinoti apie save, įgyti perspektyvos pojūtį ir net išsiugdyti naujų įgūdžių. Be to, tai nekenkia biudžetui ir suteikia galimybę kur nors ilgiau pasilikti, nes daug darbo pasiūlymų savanoriams apima būstą bei maistą, o kartais net mokamas nedidelis atlyginimas.
mt: Volunteering abroad is a great way to make a difference, but it's important to give as well as take. Living and volunteering abroad is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, gain a new perspective, and even pick up new skills. Plus, it doesn't hurt your budget and it gives you the opportunity to stay longer, as many volunteer opportunities for volunteers include housing and meals, and sometimes even a small stipend.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: Kelionė į Volto Disnėjaus pasaulį daugybei amerikiečių šeimų yra tarsi piligriminė kelionė. „Tipiškas“ apsilankymas apima skrydį į tarptautinį Orlando oro uostą, važiavimą autobusu į „Disney“ viešbutį, maždaug savaitę neišeinant iš „Disney“ teritorijos ir grįžimą namo. Yra daugybė galimų variantų, tačiau dauguma žmonių, kalbėdami apie Disnėjaus pasaulį, omenyje turi būtent tai. Dauguma internetu parduodamų bilietų per aukcionų svetaines, pavyzdžiui, „eBay“ ar „Craigslist“, dalinai naudojami kaip kelių dienų visų parkų bilietai. „Disney“ draudžiama ši įprasta veikla: bilietų negalima pakeisti.
mt: A trip to Walt Disney World is like a pilgrimage for many American families. A "typical" visit includes a flight to Orlando International Airport, a bus ride to the Disney hotel, a week or so not leaving the Disney property, and a return home. There are many options, but most people, when talking about Disney World, have this in mind. Most of the tickets sold on the Internet auction sites, such as eBay or Craigslist, are partially used as multi-day park tickets. Disney prohibits this common practice: tickets cannot be exchanged.
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Kiekvieną, planuojantį lankytis šalyje, kuri gali būti laikoma karo zona, turi išmokyti profesionalai. Interneto paieškoje įrašę „priešiškos aplinkos kursai“ tikriausiai rasite vietinės įmonės adresą. Kursai įprastai daug išsamiau išnagrinėja visus čia aptartus klausimus, paprastai suteikdami praktinės patirties. Kursas paprastai trunka 2–5 dienas ir apima žaidimus vaidmenimis, daug pirmosios pagalbos bei kartais mokymą apie ginklus. Knygos ir žurnalai, kuriuose kalbama apie išgyvenimą laukinėje gamtoje, yra populiarūs, tačiau leidinių, kuriuose būtų rašoma apie karo zonas, yra nedaug.
mt: Each person planning to visit a country that can be considered a war zone should be trained by professionals.  Searching the internet for "hostile environment training" will likely find the address of a local company.  Courses typically delve into the issues discussed here in greater detail, often providing practical experience.  Courses typically last 2–5 days and include role-playing games, a lot of first aid, and sometimes training on weapons.  Books and magazines about survival in the wild are popular, but there are few publications about war zones.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Vandenį valyti galima skirtingais būdais, kai kurie iš jų yra veiksmingesni kovojant su konkrečiomis grėsmėmis. Kai kuriose vietose vandenį užtenka virinti minutę, kitose reikia kelių minučių. Filtrų efektyvumas skiriasi. Jei dėl to nerimaujate, verčiau iš patikimos įmonės įsigykite vandens sandariai uždarytame butelyje.
mt: Water can be purified in different ways, some of which are more effective in combating specific threats. In some places, water can be boiled for a minute, in others for several minutes. The effectiveness of filters varies. If you are concerned, buy water from a reputable company in a sealed bottle.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Atgalinės srovės yra į krantą lūžtančių bangų grįžtantis srautas, dažnai pasitaikančios prie rifų ir pan. Grįžtanti srovė dėl povandeninės topologijos susikoncentruoja keliose gilesnėse vietose. Čia gali susiformuoti greita gilyn nešanti srovė. Dažniausia žūstama dėl nuovargio bandant plaukti prieš srovę, o tai gali būti neįmanoma. Vos tik išplaukiate iš srovės, grįžti atgal yra sunkiau nei įprastai. Pabandykite nukreipti kur nors, kur jūsų dar kartą nepavyko sugauti, arba, priklausomai nuo jūsų įgūdžių ir nuo to, ar jus pastebėjo, galbūt norėsite laukti gelbėjimo.
mt: Back eddies are the returning current of breaking waves, often seen near reefs and the like. The returning current concentrates in a few deeper areas due to the underwater topography. Here a fast moving current can form. Most people drown from exhaustion trying to swim against the current, and this can be impossible. Just getting out of the current is harder than usual. Try to aim somewhere where you won't be caught again, or, depending on your skills and whether you were noticed, perhaps you want to wait for rescue.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Vidaus vandens keliai gali būti gera atostogų tema. Pavyzdžiui, aplankyti Luaros slėnio pilis, Reino slėnį arba leistis į kruizą po įdomius miestus palei Dunojų ar plaukti Erio kanalu. Jie taip pat apibrėžia maršrutus populiariais pėsčiųjų ir dviračių takais.
mt: Inland waterways can be a great vacation theme. For example, visit the Louvre Palace, the Rhine Valley or take a cruise along the Danube or Rhine River. They also define routes popular pedestrian and bicycle paths.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Šiaurėje regioną riboja Sachelis, o pietuose ir vakaruose – Atlanto vandenynas. Moterys: rekomenduojama, kad visos moterys keliautojos sakytų, jog yra susituokusios, nepaisant jų faktinės šeiminės padėties. Be to, patartina mūvėti žiedą (tik ne tokį, kuris atrodytų labai brangus. Moterys turi suprasti, kad dėl kultūrų skirtumų jos gali patirti tai, ką galbūt laikytų priekabiavimu. Kas nors gali imti sekti iš paskos, sugriebti už rankos ar pan. Ryžtingai atstumkite vyrus ir nebijokite laikytis savo nuostatų (kultūrų skirtumai nereiškia, kad taip elgtis derama).
mt: In the north, the region is bordered by Sachel, and to the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: it is recommended that all women travelers say that they are married, regardless of their actual marital status. In addition, it is advised to wear a ring (not one that looks very expensive. Women should understand that due to cultural differences, they may experience what might be considered harassment. Someone may follow you, grab your hand or something. Be assertive in discouraging men and do not hesitate to follow your own rules (cultural differences do not mean that this is acceptable).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Laukiniai gyvūnai yra daugiausiai iššūkių fotografui kelianti tema, reikalaujanti sėkmės, kantrybės, patirties ir geros įrangos. Laukinės gamtos fotografija dažnai laikoma savaime suprantamu dalyku, tačiau kalbant apie bet kokią fotografijos rūšį galima teigti, kad nuotrauka yra verta tūkstančio žodžių. Norint fotografuoti laukinius gyvūnus dažnai reikalingas ilgas teleobjektyvas, tačiau norint fotografuoti, pavyzdžiui, paukščių pulką ar smulkų gyvūnėlį, reikia kitokio objektyvo. Daugelį egzotinių gyvūnų sunku surasti, o parkuose kartais galioja taisyklės dėl fotografimo komerciniams tikslams. Laukiniai gyvūnai gali būti drovūs arba agresyvūs. Aplinka gali būti šalta, karšta ar kitaip priešiška.
mt: Wild animals are one of the most challenging subjects for a photographer to capture, requiring patience, skill, and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often considered self-explanatory, but any type of photography can be said to be worth a thousand words. A long telephoto lens is often needed to photograph wild animals, but to photograph, for example, a bird flock or small animal, a different lens is needed. Many exotic animals are difficult to find, and in parks there are often rules against photography for commercial purposes. Wild animals can be shy or aggressive. The environment can be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Kiekvienas, kuris ketina važiuoti aukštose platumose ar per kalnų perėjas, turėtų apsvarstyti sniego, ledo ar neigiamos temperatūros galimybę. Ledu ir sniegu padengtuose keliuose maža trintis, todėl neįmanoma važiuoti lyg pliku asfaltu. Siaučiant pūgai per trumpą laiką gali iškristi tiek sniego, kad nepavyks pajudėti. Matomumą gali riboti krentantis arba pustomas sniegas, taip pat rasojantys arba apledėję automobilio langai. Kita vertus, ledas ir sniegas yra įprastinės sąlygos daugelyje šalių, o eismas nenutrūkstamai juda ištisus metus.
mt: Anyone planning to drive in high altitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice or sub-zero temperatures.  Snow and ice covered roads have little traction, so it is impossible to drive like on a smooth asphalt road.  A blizzard can drop so much snow in a short time that it is impossible to move.  Visibility can be reduced by falling or melting snow, as well as snow-covered or frosted car windows.  On the other hand, snow and ice are normal conditions in many countries, and driving never stops for a whole year.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Paprastai dirbant užsienyje, išskyrus diplomatus, pajamų mokestį reikia mokėti toje šalyje, kurioje gyvenate. Pajamų mokestis skirtingose šalyse formuojamas skirtingai, mokesčių tarifai ir laipteliai taip pat labai skiriasi priklausomai nuo šalies. Kai kuriose federacinėse valstybėse, tokiose kaip JAV ir Kanada, pajamų mokestis renkamas tiek federaliniu, tiek vietiniu lygmeniu, todėl tarifai ir apmokestinimo pakopos gali skirtis kiekviename regione.
mt: When you are working abroad, except for diplomats, you have to pay income tax in the country where you live. Income tax is formed differently in different countries, tax tariffs and brackets also vary greatly depending on the country. In some federal states, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is collected both at the federal and local level, so tariffs and tax brackets can vary in each region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

Income tax is formed differently in different countries, tax tariffs and brackets also vary greatly depending on the country. In some federal states, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is collected both at the federal and local level, so tariffs and tax brackets can vary in each region.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Pasaulinė paroda (dažnai vadinama tiesiog „Ekspo“) yra didelis tarptautinis menų ir mokslo festivalis. Šalys dalyvės nacionaliniuose paviljonuose pristato menines ir edukacines ekspozicijas, kuriomis siekia pademonstruoti pasaulio problemas ar savo kultūrą ir istoriją. Tarptautinės sodininkystės parodos yra specializuoti renginiai, kuriuose eksponuojami augalai, botanikos sodai ir kiti su augalais susiję dalykai. Nors teoriškai jie gali vykti kasmet (tol, kol vyksta skirtingose šalyse), praktiškai – ne. Šie renginiai paprastai trunka 3–6 mėn. ir vyksta ne mažesnėse nei 50 ha teritorijose.
mt: The World's Fair (often referred to simply as "Expo") is a large international event typically featuring exhibition of cultural, economic, and scientific innovations. Nations participate in national pavilions presenting artistic and educational exhibits, which aim to demonstrate the world's problems or their culture and history. International horticultural exhibitions are specialized events, where plants, botanical gardens and other plant-related items are exhibited. Although theoretically they can be held annually (as long as they are held in different countries), in practice they do not. These events usually last 3–6 months and are held on sites of at least 50 ha.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Nors daugelis parko gyvūnų mato žmones, vis dėl to gamta yra laukinė ir gyvūnų negalima šerti bei kaip nors jiems trukdyti. Kaip prašo parko administracija, išlaikykite bent 100 jardų / metrų atstumą nuo lokių ar vilkų ir 25 jardų / metrų atstumą nuo visų kitų laukinių gyvūnų! Bizonai, briedžiai, lokiai ir beveik visi stambūs gyvūnai, kad ir kokie draugiški jie atrodytų, gali užpulti. Kiekvienais metais dešimtys lankytojų būna sužeisti, nes neišlaiko tinkamo atstumo. Šie gyvūnai yra dideli, laukiniai ir potencialiai pavojingi, todėl duokite jiems erdvės. Be to, atminkite, kad kvapai pritraukia meškas ir kitus laukinius gyvūnus, todėl venkite nešiotis ar gaminti kvapius maisto produktus ir laikykite stovyklavietę švarią.
mt: While most park animals are used to seeing people, nature is wild and animals should not be fed or otherwise interfered with. As requested by park administration, please maintain at least 100 yards / meters away from bears or wolves and 25 yards / meters away from all other wild animals! Bison, bighorn sheep, bears, and nearly all large animals, no matter how friendly they may appear, can attack. Every year, dozens of visitors are injured because they do not maintain proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them space. Also, remember that scents attract coyotes and other wild animals, so refrain from carrying or making scented food products and keep your campsite clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
